EVTDESC_MNM_6250_A: I have pondered my mission to train an apprentice in the shadowy arts of assassination and I'm considering my own [assassin_protege_1.GetFirstName]. [assassin_protege_1.GetSheHeCap] has been illustrating a steely determination in some matters, and I think [assassin_protege_1.GetSheHe]'s more clever than [assassin_protege_1.GetSheHe] lets on... It could be a dangerous path, but under my wing, perhaps [assassin_protege_1.GetSheHe] could excel?
EVTDESC_MNM_6250_B: A youngster has been caught red-handed trying to pickpocket me today. My guards are furious with the child, but noting the quiet defiance in [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] eyes, I am reminded of myself. Remembering the mission assigned to me by the Assassins, I wonder if the child is as sly as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] seems  perhaps this incident could benefit us all?
EVTOPTB_MNM_6250: Maybe [assassin_protege_2.GetTitledFirstName] would be better suited for this...
EVTOPTD_MNM_6250: Let [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] go! I have a special interest in this lost soul.
EVTOPTE_MNM_6250: Take the urchin away  one does not simply steal from the [Root.GetTitle]!
EVTOPTE_MNM_6250_TT: You ignore the opportunity to train an apprentice for §Ythe Assassins§!. The child is imprisoned for [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] crimes.\n
EVTOPTF_MNM_6250: I can't be bothered with this right now.
EVTOPTF_MNM_6250_TT: You ignore the opportunity to train an apprentice for the Assassins.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6252: Bolstered by my tutelage [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] is growing into a confident young [assassin_protege.GetBoyGirl]. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] reads everything I throw at [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] and [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] seems eager to learn more about our beliefs... The next step for [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] should be chosen carefully.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6252: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] should focus on cultural adaption, for infiltration missions.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6252_TT: You will encourage the scheming skills of §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_6252: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] could probably use more practice with the dagger.
EVTOPTB_MNM_6252_TT: You will encourage the martial skills of §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_6252: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] needs to know balance in all [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] areas of expertise.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6252_TT: You will strive for a well-balanced training for §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6253_A: The rigorous training I set up for [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] continues to yield promising results  in addition to subtly befriending several foreign diplomats at court, [assassin_protege.GetTitledName] has been studying the books fervently, even in candlelit hours. I believe it is time for a test of some sort.
EVTDESC_MNM_6253_B: The combat training I set up for [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] continues to yield promising results  in addition to having spent rigorous amounts of time in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] practice grounds, [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] clearly outmatches any opponents [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] own age. I believe a test is in order.
EVTDESC_MNM_6253_C: The rigorous schedule I set up for [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] continues to yield promising results  in addition to demonstrating a knack for foreign languages, [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] is proving increasingly proficient in [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] combat training. I believe it is time for a test of some sort.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6253: I'll have my associates arrange some sort of test.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6253_TT: This outcome will be influenced by the various skills of §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6254_A: It was a [Root.GetWeatherAdjective] midnight when the hired thugs descended upon [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]. The reports state that [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] somehow managed to talk [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] way out of it, convincing the attackers that they had the wrong target. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] then sent them on a wild goose-chase around the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], which I am told lasted hours.
EVTDESC_MNM_6254_B: [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] expertly handled the surprise attack I planned out, striking the thugs down with frightening precision. When I explained that the men [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] had beaten, one even killed, had been working on my orders, [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] cocked an eyebrow at me before leaning back in [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] chair, smiling.
EVTDESC_MNM_6254_C: The hired thugs I sent to ambush [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] came back bruised and confused tonight. When I confront my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] calmly explains that [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] made them see the error of their ways. "One will likely die from the injury", I say. [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] nods slowly, before returning to [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] book.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6254_TT: The Assassins will be pleased to hear of your protege, §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6255_A: [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] noticed the thugs coming and managed to sneak into a building to hide. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] caused quite a ruckus as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] stumbled into the bedroom of a local merchant and his wife. The escape from there was hasty, but I suppose I'm not entirely disappointed in [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] surviving the ambush.
EVTDESC_MNM_6255_B: [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] noticed the thugs coming and eagerly drew [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] blade on them. The fight that ensued left both parties wounded, but at least [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] survived the ambush. I'll have to talk to [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] about the optimal points of attack on the human body, however.
EVTDESC_MNM_6255_C: It was a [Root.GetWeatherAdjective] midnight when the hired thugs descended upon [assassin_protege.GetFirstName]. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] attempted to fool them by claiming my orders had changed, that the ambush was called off. While I am impressed that [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] saw through the test, [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] did not sell it completely, and instead ended up with running away in panic.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6255: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]'s good, but [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] still has a lot to learn.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6255_TT: You believe in [assassin_protege.GetHerHim]. The Assassins will be informed of your apprentice, §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6256: It was a [Root.GetWeatherAdjective] night when the hired thugs descended upon [assassin_protege.GetFirstName]. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] apparently tried to talk [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] way out of the situation, but the attackers were not so easily charmed... They were not supposed to injure [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] badly, but something must have gone wrong.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6256: Oh, poor [assassin_protege.GetFirstName]. I thought you had potential.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6256_TT: The life of an Assassin is not an easy one but it would seem §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! was not ready for it. The Assassins will be informed of your failure.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_6256: This hurts more than I thought it would.
EVTOPTB_MNM_6256_TT: The life of an Assassin is not an easy one but it would seem §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! was not ready for it.\nThe Assassins will be informed of your loss.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6258: The time has come for me to confess my love for the one true god.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6258: I'll scream it from the top of my lungs!
EVTOPTB_MNM_6258: I'll join the religion in secret.
EVTDESC_MNM_6259_A: Over the past few months, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has deeply impressed both me and my order. The Assassins have informed me that I should be proud to have been the guardian of this faithful young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
EVTDESC_MNM_6259_B: In spite of [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] injuries, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has proven [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself], both to me and my order. The Assassins have informed me that they are pleased with my training of the faithful young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
EVTDESC_MNM_6259_C: The death of my dear apprentice took me by surprise, but what is worse is the complete silence I have been met with from the Assassins. I can only assume that they are disappointed  all I can do is wait for a new mission.
EVTDESC_MNM_6259_D: Over the past few months, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has impressed both me and my order. The Assassins have informed me that as soon as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] has agreed to convert to our faith, they will share in my pride as guardians of this remarkable young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
EVTDESC_MNM_6259_E: In spite of [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] injuries, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has proven [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself], both to me and my order. The Assassins have informed me that as soon as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] has agreed to convert to our faith, they will consider my mission to train the young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman] complete.
EVTDESC_MNM_6259_F: The death of my dear apprentice took me by surprise, but what is worse is the complete silence I have been met with from the Assassins. I can only assume that they are disappointed  all I can do is wait for a new mission.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6259_TT: You will complete your mission to train an apprentice.
EVTOPTB_MNM_6259_TT: You will complete your mission to train an apprentice.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6259: I will wait for further instructions.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6259_TT: You fail your mission to train an apprentice.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_6259_TT: You will complete your mission to train an apprentice.
EVTOPTE_MNM_6259_TT: You will complete your mission to train an apprentice.
EVTOPTF_MNM_6259: The Assassins want nothing to do with you right now.
EVTOPTF_MNM_6259_TT: You fail your mission to train an apprentice.\n
6252_CONVERT_APPRENTICE_TT: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! will offer [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself] up to Allah and convert to the religion of Shia Islam.
EVTDESC_MNM_6260_A: My child, and apprentice in the shadowy arts of assassination, has been the victim of an unexpected turn of events and a most untimely death. I could be beside myself with pain, but I must focus on recovering from the loss, while the Assassins are informed of my predicament.
EVTDESC_MNM_6260_B: My apprentice in the shadowy arts of assassination has been the victim of an unexpected turn of events and a most untimely death. The Assassins will be informed of my loss and predicament.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6260_TT: You fail your mission to train an apprentice.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7001_A: I'm having dinner and plenty of drinks with [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledName] tonight. It's lovely, yet what I am most charmed by is [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] [satanists_recruiter.GetHerselfHimself]. Why else would I not immediately stop our conversation, which has slowly begun to touch upon some almost heretical ideas, questioning the salvation of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
EVTOPTA_7001: If we do not ask questions, why did [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] make us curious?
EVTOPTA_7001_TT: You think it's a great discussion, fueled by alcohol or not.\n
EVTOPTB_7001: We should not speak of this, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTB_7001_TT: You would never question the authority of the almighty.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7002_A: Meeting with [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously question the absolute power of [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] almighty [satanists_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]... Thankfully, it seems that my carefully chosen words had the desired effect on [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim]. From [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] glittering eyes I got the distinct impression that [satanists_recruit.GetSheHe] enjoyed the philosophical aspect of our conversion.
EVTDESC_MNM_7002_B: Meeting with [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously question the absolute power of [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] almighty [satanists_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]... Regretfully, it seems that my words only irritated my [satanists_recruit.GetRootRelation]  from the steely look [satanists_recruit.GetSheHe] finally gave me, I should probably steer clear of [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim] for now.
EVTOPTA_7002_TT: Continue your endeavor to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [Root.Society.GetName].\n
EVTOPTB_7002: I'm not sure [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] sentiments were sincere...
EVTOPTB_7002_TT: You end your endeavor to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [Root.Society.GetName].\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7003_A: Walking the palisades of my [Root.GetCapitalHolding] I am joined by [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. I find myself agreeing with a lot of the concepts [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe] presents  the futility of prayer particularly resonates with me. Suddenly, [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe] turns to me and presses a small leather pouch into my hand. "My [Root.GetLordLady], will you carry this with you, for protection?"
EVTOPTA_7003: I'll keep it hidden, and I thank you, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTA_7003_TT: You encourage the advances made by §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTB_7003: What is this? I should call you a [satanists_recruiter.GetDWMagician]!
EVTDESC_MNM_7004_A: I've arranged a run-in with [From.GetTitledFirstName] on the palisades of [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCapitalHolding] today. [From.GetHerHisCap] face lights up upon seeing me and we stay out talking for hours. I offer [From.GetHerHim] a protection spell, in a leather pouch  of course, I do not explain the content... Yet [From.GetSheHe] smiles, accepting the token.
EVTDESC_MNM_7004_B: I've arranged a run-in with [From.GetTitledFirstName] on the palisades of [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCapitalHolding] today. [From.GetHerHisCap] face darkens when I again attempt to discuss my world views. I then offer [From.GetHerHim] my favorite protection spell, a chicken leg in a leather pouch  I thought it was harmless enough, but [From.GetSheHe] refuses to accept the gift.
EVTOPTA_7004: [From.GetSheHeCap] just needs one more little push.
EVTOPTB_7004: It's been interesting, but I don't think [From.GetSheHe] is ready for more.
EVTOPTC_7004: This has been a wasted effort  [From.GetFirstName] is locked in [From.GetHerHis] views.
EVTDESC_MNM_7005: What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie? [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of a pentagram. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] lied to Adam in the Garden of Eden. Reject the Tyrant deity and let [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] guide your steps..."
EVTOPTA_7005: You truly are a [satanists_recruiter.GetDWMagician] then? Can you [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin]?
EVTOPTA_7005_TT: You ask §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! how you can begin your journey into this forbidden knowledge.\n
EVTOPTB_7005: That is blasphemy, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName]! Leave my sight, before I call the guards!
EVTOPTB_7005_TT: You dismiss §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! offer and pretend it never happened.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7006: When I revealed the brand on my lower arm, expecting the final hook to sink in, [From.GetFirstName] staggered backwards in shock and made a hand gesture for protection. "That is blasphemy, [Root.GetFirstName]" [From.GetSheHe] said, eyes wide. "Leave my sight, before I call the guards!" [From.GetSheHe] called and it was with reluctance, albeit hastily, that I left.
EVTOPTA_7006: If I can't turn [From.GetHerHim], no one can.
EVTDESC_MNM_7007: When I proceeded to reveal the brand on my lower arm, certain that the final hook would sink in, [From.GetFirstName] inhaled sharply, worrying me for a second. "You truly are a [Root.GetDWMagician] then", [From.GetSheHe] says, eager and relieved. "Can you help me [From.GetDWReasonToJoin]?" [From.GetSheHe] continues, eyes pleading.
EVTOPTA_7007: Patience, [From.GetSisterBrother]. We will speak more soon.
EVTOPTA_7007_TT: Write a letter to the coven about §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! induction. [satanists_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]§! will handle it from here.
EVTDESC_MNM_7008: We might... If you offer yourself up to [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil], you will be granted powers [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] has kept from us humans. Fingering the leather pouch in my pocket, I slowly nod. "Oh, and I think you'll enjoy it..." [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe] said, with a knowing smile.
EVTOPTA_7008: If there is any chance it'll [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin], I will.
EVTOPTA_7008_TT: §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! leaves you alone for now  the coven will be in contact with you.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7009_A: It has been some time since [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] was in contact with me. I have been mulling over [satanists_recruiter.GetPossPronoun] words. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] told Adam he would die if he ate of the forbidden fruit... [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] lied. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] lie.
EVTDESC_MNM_7009_ALT: It has been some time since [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] was in contact with me. I have been pondering what [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] would think of me for venturing down this path, but [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] has already offered me more support than [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] ever has. I have begun studying books on the occult and so far I'm finding the views preached at the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] to be narrow-minded, at best.
EVTOPTA_7009: Their lies are meant to hold us back!
EVTOPTA_7009_TT: You continue to await further instruction.\n
EVTOPTB_7009: I can't believe I have been so gullible.
EVTOPTC_7009: I am beginning to feel that I have been missing out...
EVTOPTD_7009: Why must we always put the needs of others before our own...?
EVTDESC_MNM_7010_A: I found some cryptic scrawlings written in blood on my bedroom door this morning. The guards say they haven't seen anyone enter during the night and I dare not ask my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] to decipher it. Yet, I think I understand... The pentagram... the mark of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName].
EVTOPTA_7010: Of course, the bargain must be struck!
EVTOPTA_7010_TT_1: You carve a pentagram into your arm, just like the one §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! showed you.\n
EVTOPTA_7010_TT_2: You cut your into your arm, a star surrounded by a circle, a symbol from your forbidden studies.
EVTOPTB_7010: My immortal soul... What if I'm wrong?
EVTOPTB_7010_TT: You order your servants to scrub the door clean, putting to rest any rumors this could stir up.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7014:
[Root.GetSisterBrotherCap] [Root.GetFirstName],
We have received word of your dedication and desire to join the legion of the True Lord. Await the messenger.

Let the Dark One guide you.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_7014_TT: You will be on the look-out for "the messenger".\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7015: I've met an intriguing and hypnotically beautiful [From.GetManWoman] at court. Apparently, this [From.GetFirstName] is a foreign diplomat? I engaged [From.GetHerHim] in conversation for the first time today, and we spoke at length about [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]. I was shocked when [From.GetSheHe] carefully pulled up [From.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing the mark of Lucifer.
EVTDESC_MNM_7015_ALT: I've met an intriguing and hypnotically beautiful [From.GetManWoman] at court. Apparently, this [From.GetFirstName] is a foreign diplomat? I engaged [From.GetHerHim] in conversation for the first time today, and we spoke at length about [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]. I was shocked when [From.GetSheHe] carefully pulled up [From.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing the mark of [From.GetDWDevil].
EVTDESC_MNM_7016: The [satanists_inductor.GetSocietyRank] smiles. "I'm pleased to find you not only a charming [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName], but also one capable of intellectual discourse. The brethren value the pursuit of knowledge, you see, in addition to more... earthly pursuits." [From.GetHerHisCap] smile turns into a predatory grin as [From.GetSheHe] continues: "We'll soon see exactly how committed you are..."
EVTOPTA_7016: I... What do you need me to do?
EVTOPTA_7016_TT: §Y[satanists_inductor.GetTitledFirstName]§! offers no reply, instead taking you by the hand.
EVTDESC_MNM_7017_A: [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName] escorts me to my bedchamber. I hesitate upon entering, finding it flooded with light, as candles form a circle around my bed. Several hooded figures surround the room, chanting in unison. "Fear not, [Root.GetSisterBrother]. Power and pleasure  these are the gifts of [satanists_inductor.GetDWDevil]."
EVTOPTA_7017: I like the sound of that!
EVTOPTC_7017: I can't do this! I'm a married [Root.GetManWoman]!
EVTOPTB_7017_TT: You refuse this demonic ritual and try to escape!\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7018: When I wake up the cloaked figures are gone and [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName] is lying next to me, a smile tugging at the corner of [satanists_inductor.GetHerHis] mouth. "Welcome to [satanists_inductor.Society.GetName],  [Root.GetTitledFirstName]", [satanists_inductor.GetSheHe] says. I hold [satanists_inductor.GetHerHim] close, wondering how I will look back on this moment.
EVTOPTA_7018: I wish you had found me sooner.
EVTDESC_MNM_7019_A: I let go of [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]'s hand and [satanists_inductor.GetHerHis] smile vanishes. "What are you doing?", the beautiful creature asks. "I'm sorry, [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]. This is not my path." [satanists_inductor.GetSheHeCap] takes my hand again, but only kisses it gently before turning away. "Only the [satanists_inductor.GetDWDevil] knows. I will remember you, [Root.GetFirstName]." [satanists_inductor.GetSheHeCap] hesitates, before adding: "I think you're special."
EVTOPTA_7019: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] may punish me for it, but I'll remember you, too.
EVTOPTA_7019_TT: With some help from some of your most loyal guards §Y[satanists_inductor.Society.GetName]§! are discretely escorted away from your [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. "Lost travelers", you explain.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7019_B: My eyes dart wildly around the ungodly scene. The [satanists_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName] looks disappointed. My body finally unfreezes and I bolt for the door. "Brothers and sisters, follow [Root.GetHerHim]! [Root.GetFirstName], we can talk about this!" The voice echoes behind me, as I run away. What was I thinking, getting involved in the [Root.GetDWDarkMagic]?! As I flee, panic in my chest, I trip.
EVTOPTB_7019_TT: [satanists_inductor.Society.GetNameCap] escape from your [Root.GetCapitalHolding].\nYou are injured during the chaos.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7019_C: My eyes dart wildly around the ungodly scene. The evil [satanists_inductor.GetSeductressSeducer] rolls [satanists_inductor.GetHerHis] eyes as I bolt for the door. "Brothers and sisters, see to it that [Root.GetSheHe] doesn't do anything stupid." I don't make it far before I stumble and fall to the floor, a spear sticking out of my chest.
EVTOPTC_7019_TT: [satanists_inductor.Society.GetNameCap] escape from your [Root.GetCapitalHolding] and you are tragically killed during the chaos.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7020: [satanists_inductor.Society.GetNameCap] might not be as bad as I thought, I muse to myself. I sometimes wonder what would have happened had I decided to join them. And I wonder where that beautiful creature went off to. Some ungodly adventure, surely.
EVTOPTA_7020: My time is better spent far away from them.
EVTDESC_MNM_7022_A:
The [Root.GetDWDevil] has seen your good work, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
The recruit you sent us, [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], has now completed [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] induction into the coven. I thank you for this contribution  it will not be forgotten.

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_7022_B:
The [Root.GetDWDevil] knows what has happened, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
The recruit you sent us, [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], has proven to be disaster. We have spent significant resources in our attempt to induct [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim], all for naught. This lack of judgment will be remembered.

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
bandaged_arm_desc: This character has a mild injury, their lower arm being covered by bandage.
EVTDESC_37252: You are bent low over your [Root.GetEducationTool], struggling to stay focused and to keep your eyes open, when your [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetTitledFirstName] enters. [From.GetSheHeCap] crosses the room and inspects the [Root.GetEducationTool] over your shoulder. "Perhaps a fresh pair of eyes might prove helpful, dear [Root.GetHusbandWife]?"
EVTOPTB_37252: You don't think I can handle this on my own?
EVTDESC_37253: Your [From.GetHusbandWife] has received an education in [From.GetEducationSubject], like yourself, so [From.GetSheHe] quickly grasps the nuances of the problem as you explain it. The two of you set to work, discussing and comparing [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]. [From.GetFirstName] is a most competent [From.GetEducationRole]! Within the hour, you have laid the groundwork for a promising solution.
EVTOPTA_37253: A brilliant idea, [From.GetFirstName]! Have you any additional suggestions?
EVTOPTA_37253_TOOLTIP: Finish your work with the help of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTB_37253: Let us retire to the bedchamber, my dear...
EVTOPTB_37253_TOOLTIP: Leave your work for now and spend some quality time with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!...\n
assassins_borrow_money_desc: You may borrow money from the order if the Grand Master allows it. You are expected to pay back within a reasonable time.
assassins_borrow_money_tooltip: The Grand Master has sufficient funds.
assassins_pay_debt: Pay Back Debt to the Assassins
assassins_pay_debt_desc: Pay back the money you owe the Assassins.
EVTDESC_MNM_6005:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your generous gift to the Order shall not be forgotten. The money will come to good use in the defense against those who threaten the true faith. 

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6006_A:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the Order. I trust you send me the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold as soon as you receive this letter.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6006_B:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the Order. If you cannot spare the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold, I have another suggestion. The order is in unending need of champions and your [child_offer.GetRootRelation] [child_offer.GetFirstName] would make an excellent addition to our ranks.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6006_C:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the Order. If you cannot spare the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold, I have another suggestion. If you allow us to build a castle in [castle_offer.GetName] and aid us in its construction, your debt shall be forgotten.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_6006: Of course I shall pay back the gold I owe.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6006: The Order shall have a stronghold in [castle_offer.GetName].
EVTOPTD_MNM_6006_TOOLTIP: Do not to pay back the money you owe. Beware  the Grand Master will not take your refusal lightly.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6209_A: As the last servant makes their exit, I am finally alone. It has been a long, draining day. Longing for a few carefree moments, I reach for my cup and raise it to my mouth. Wait a moment... what is that smell? There is a faint, bitter note, almost fully disguised by the rich aroma of your drink...
EVTDESC_MNM_6209_B: Tired after a long day's work, I absentmindedly raise the cup to my mouth and drain it in one big swallow. I sigh with relief, savoring this one carefree moment. Then I notice the bitter aftertaste on my tongue...
EVTOPTA_MNM_6209_TOOLTIP_A: You search your chambers for clues...\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6210: It only takes me a moment to find it  on the tray from which I grabbed the cup is a sealed letter. I know that symbol. With shaking hands, I tear it open. "This is not your last day, [Root.GetFirstName]. Our patience, however, is not endless. We will claim that which we are owed. The money or your life  that is up to you."
EVTOPTA_MNM_6210: I cannot risk the fury of the Assassins.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6210_TOOLTIP: You pay back the money you owe.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_6210: A vulgar ploy! I do not fold so easily.
EVTOPTB_MNM_6210_TOOLTIP: You refuse to pay back the money you owe.\n

secretly_manichean_desc: This character practices Manichaeism in secret.
secretly_hinduism_desc: This character practices Hinduism in secret.
secretly_buddhism_desc: This character practices Buddhism in secret.
secretly_jain_desc: This character practices Jainism in secret.
secretly_norse_pagan_desc: This character practices Germanic Paganism in secret.
secretly_norse_pagan_reformed_desc: This character practices Germanic Paganism in secret.

secretly_west_african_pagan_desc: This character practices African Paganism in secret.
secretly_west_african_pagan_reformed_des: This character practices African Paganism in secret.
secretly_zun_pagan_desc: This character practices Zun Paganism in secret.

assassins_recruit_desc: Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is sympathetic to the cause of the order. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become an Assassin.
assassins_recruit_block_tooltip: Has not been approached by the Assassins previously.
EVTDESC_MNM_6020_A: Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and I are still deep in conversation. We are talking about religion, righteousness, how to do the right thing. [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] suggests that giving alms and fasting must surely bring mortals closer to the divine.
EVTDESC_MNM_6020_B: Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet I and [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] are still deep in conversation. We are discussing a hadith [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] just read. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] suggest that its narrator, Abu Hurairah, might be unreliable and asks if the hadiths recorded by Ali are not preferable.
EVTOPTA_6020_MUSLIM: Perhaps you are right. I tend to find more value in Ali's words.
EVTDESC_MNM_6021_A: I approached [From.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast last night, intending to figure out whether [From.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. We had a long, deep conversation and it seems like [From.GetFirstName] is of sound opinions!
EVTDESC_MNM_6021_B: Last night I approached [From.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast, intending to figure out whether [From.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. Unfortunately, as soon I steered the conversation towards the topics of the Prophet and his rightful heir, Ali, the narrow-minded [From.GetManWoman] became quite disagreeable...
EVTOPTA_6021: A good start. I shall continue my enquiries.
EVTOPTA_6021_TOOLTIP: Continue in your attempt to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the Assassins.
EVTOPTB_6021: This is not enough. Proceeding would be too great a risk.
EVTOPTC_6021: Me, a "[GetFromRootInsult]"? That [GetRootFromInsult] is one to talk!
EVTOPTB_6021_TOOLTIP: End your attempt to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the Assassins.
EVTDESC_MNM_6022_A: Since I had such a good time a few weeks back, I invited [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] to share an informal meal. Yet again the conversation found its way to the topic of religion and righteousness. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] expressed [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] admiration for those willing to give their life fighting for their beliefs.
EVTDESC_MNM_6022_B: Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and I are still deep in conversation. We are talking about religion, righteousness, how to do the right thing. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] expresses [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] admiration for those willing to give their life fighting for their beliefs.
EVTOPTA_6022: I agree, [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName]. If only I could be more like them.
EVTOPTB_6022: I have little regard for fanatics!
EVTDESC_MNM_6023_A: I was just about to draft an invitation when [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited me to dine with [From.GetHerHim]. We talked for many hours, even as the plates were emptied and the cups drained. As I praised those willing to die for their faith, [From.GetFirstName] agreed wholeheartedly, wishing [From.GetSheHe] could be more like them.
EVTDESC_MNM_6023_B: I was just about to draft an invitation when [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited you to dine with [From.GetHerHim]. The conversation flowed easily and [From.GetFirstName] expressed many admirable sentiments. However, when I mentioned those willing to die for their beliefs, [From.GetSheHe] sneered and condemned "such fanatics".
EVTOPTA_6023: I think the time has come to ask the question.
EVTOPTB_6023: Although I fear [From.GetFirstName] is unwilling to fight, [From.GetHerselfHimself].
EVTOPTC_6023: Fanatics? [From.GetFirstName] is blind to the righteousness of our ways!
EVTDESC_MNM_6024: We are quiet for a moment, both seemingly contemplating these devoted souls. Then [From.GetFirstName] looks up at me, a curious intensity in [From.GetHerHis] gaze. "That is not an impossible wish, [Root.GetFirstName]. Are you ready to kill and, if He wills it, get killed to defend the words of His Prophet and the rightful heir?"
EVTOPTA_6024: I am, [From.GetFirstName]. And you say there is a way?
EVTOPTA_6024_TOOLTIP: Ask §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! what you can do to serve a greater cause.
EVTOPTB_6024_TOOLTIP: Dismiss §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! question and end the dinner.
EVTDESC_MNM_6025: When I suggested there is a way for [From.GetTitledFirstName] to serve the greater good, [From.GetSheHe] only scoffed dismissively and changed the subject. Judging by the look [From.GetSheHe] gave me as I left, however, it seems as if [From.GetFirstName] is not so oblivious after all...
EVTOPTA_6025: [From.GetSheHeCap] is all grand words but lacks true courage. Disappointing.
EVTDESC_MNM_6026: When I suggested there is a way for [From.GetTitledFirstName] to serve the greater good, [From.GetHerHis] eyes lit up with a glimmer of hope. "I am ready, [Root.GetFirstName]. Please, if it is true, will you set me on this path?"
EVTOPTA_6026: Someone will get in touch with you shortly, [From.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTA_6026_TOOLTIP: Write a letter to the order about §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! induction. [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]§! will handle it from here.
EVTDESC_MNM_6027: I do, [Root.GetFirstName], says [From.GetTitledFirstName] with a solemn, almost ceremonial, voice. "There is an Order devoted to Allah and the rightful Caliph. One that defends those true of faith and bring vengeance to their persecutors. The Assassins are always in need of champions. Think it over, and someone might reach out..."
EVTOPTA_6027: Me, an Assassin? Perhaps this is my destiny...
EVTOPTA_6027_TOOLTIP: Think things over while you wait for someone to get in touch.
EVTDESC_MNM_6028: My eyes open, seeing only darkness. For a moment, my mind is blank, before the first thoughts get through the haze of sleep. Why did I wake up? A deep [Root.GetManWoman]'s voice cuts through the silence, startling me. "The time has come for you to profess your devoutness to Allah and the rightful imam Ali."
EVTOPTA_6028_TOOLTIP: Declare your devoutness to Allah and Ali.
EVTOPTB_6028: I will shout their names from the rooftops! Allahu akbar!
EVTOPTC_6028: I will carry out Allah's wishes in secret, no matter the risk.
EVTOPTC_6028_TOOLTIP: Secretly convert to Shia Islam. You may openly covert at a later time.\n
EVTOPTD_6028: I... I'm not sure I have what it takes.
EVTDESC_MNM_6029: Excellent. I turn my head towards the voice. A hooded figure steps out of the shadows by the [Root.GetChamberOpening] and a hand appears from underneath the cloak, holding out a piece of parchment. "Before we continue, you must sign this. A written pledge of allegiance to the Grand Master of the Assassins. A routine... safety measure."
EVTOPTA_6029: Of course. One moment, let me find a quill...
EVTOPTB_6029: But this could be used against me!
EVTOPTB_6029_TOOLTIP: Refuse to sign the pledge of allegiance.
EVTDESC_MNM_6030: As soon as I lift the tip of the quill from the parchment the hooded [Root.GetManWoman] snatches it from the desk. "The Grand Master will be pleased, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. You will receive an invitation to our stronghold, but for now, go back to bed. You will need the rest." The next moment, [Root.GetSheHe] is gone.
EVTOPTA_6030_TOOLTIP: Now all you can do is wait.
EVTDESC_MNM_6033:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
You are hereby invited to the Assassins stronghold in [inductor_rendezvous.County.GetName]. Arrive at the [inductor_rendezvous.GetHolding] of [inductor_rendezvous.GetName] in a fortnight's time. One of our people will collect you there. Until then, keep safe, and breath not a word of this meeting to any living soul.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6034: The journey to [inductor_rendezvous.GetName] was comfortable, however, the dwindling mountain path to the Assassins' stronghold was a torment to tread. As I finally arrive at the castle, my guide brings me to the main tower, where I am introduced to [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_MNM_6035: There is no time for pleasantries, not even a moment to catch my breath, before [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] leads me through another door, down a spiraling stone staircase. We descend in silence. The stair ends and the [From.GetSocietyRank] opens another door, revealing a gloomy basement room and a figure kneeling on the floor.
EVTDESC_MNM_6036_A: This, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] says solemnly as I enter, "is your test". With these words, [From.GetSheHe] pulls the hood from the [assassins_sacrifice.GetManWoman]'s head. It is [assassins_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName], my [assassins_sacrifice.GetRootRelation]! The shock in [assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHis] eyes must be mirroring my own. "This [assassins_sacrifice.GetManWoman] is an enemy of our faith. End [assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHim]." The [From.GetSocietyRank] offers me a dagger.
EVTDESC_MNM_6036_B: This, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] says solemnly as I enter, "is your test". With these words, [From.GetSheHe] pulls the hood from the [Root.GetManWoman]'s head. It is one of my servants! The chock in [Root.GetHerHis] eyes must be mirroring my own. "This [Root.GetManWoman] is an enemy of our faith. End [Root.GetHerHim]." The [From.GetSocietyRank] offers me a dagger.
EVTOPTA_6036: If it is the Grand Master's wish.
EVTOPTB_6036_TOOLTIP: You refuse and try to escape.\n
EVTOPTC_6036: I beg of you, let us go. I can pay you, I swear.
EVTOPTC_6036_TOOLTIP: Attempt to bribe §Y[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]§! into letting you and your intended victim go.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6037: The blood is still gushing from the infidel's limp body as I kneel in front of the [From.GetSocietyRank]. [From.GetSheHeCap] recites the oath of the Assassins and I repeat after [From.GetHerHim]. As [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] speaks the final words, inducting me into the order, [From.GetSheHe] smears the blood across my cheeks. "Stand up, Adherent [Root.GetFirstName]. Welcome to the Assassins."
EVTOPTA_6037: My life for Allah! Praised be the Assassins!
EVTDESC_MNM_6038_A: There is no time to think. As I accept the dagger from [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] I sink it into [From.GetHerHis] stomach. I free my intended victim and drag [assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHim] after me, up the stairs, without looking back once. You just keep running. By some miracle, no one intervenes.
EVTOPTA_6038: We might be safe for now, but for how long?
EVTOPTA_6038_TOOLTIP: You manage to escape from the assassins.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6038_B: I turn around and run. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s footsteps get closer behind me and as I reach the top of the stairs, [From.GetSheHe] grips a fistful of my mantle, pulling you down on top of [From.GetHerHis]. Vertigo. Crippling pain. Blind, manic frenzy. By some miracle, you manage to free yourself. You are alive. But for how much longer?
EVTOPTB_6038: They are... they are coming for me.
EVTDESC_MNM_6038_C: There is no time to think. As I accept the dagger from [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] I stab at [From.GetHerHim], without a moment's hesitation. The blade strikes only air. [From.GetSheHeCap] moves too quickly. I am on the floor, trapped under the weight of [From.GetHerHis] body. I plead for my life as [From.GetSheHe] wrestles the weapon from my hand.
EVTOPTC_6038: I... I panicked! Please! You... you have to believe me!
EVTDESC_MNM_6038_D: The look on [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s face is pure disappointment. "We had high hopes for you, [Root.GetFirstName], although it seems we were mistaken." I swallow. Loudly. "This cowardice makes you useless to us. Your gold, on the other hand..." As I leave, my intended victim in tow, my hands will not stop shaking.
EVTDESC_MNM_6039: You have no idea what happened as you wake up on the floor of your [Root.GetChamber], a taste of blood in your mouth and a pounding ache along the side of your face. Slowly, the memories come back. A hooded [Root.GetManWoman]... The Assassins. Perhaps you should consider yourself lucky, getting away with only a black eye.
EVTOPTA_6039: A life of secrecy might not be for me, after all.
EVTDESC_MNM_6041_A:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The recruit you sent us, [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName], has now completed [assassins_recruitee.GetHerHis] induction into the order. I thank you for this contribution  it will not be forgotten.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6041_B:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The recruit you sent us, [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName], proved to be disaster. We have spent significant resources in our attempt to induct [assassins_recruitee.GetHerHim], all for naught. This lack of judgment will be remembered.

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6202_WAR_ATTACKER:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I call upon you to defend the true faith. The vile infidel [assassins_target.GetTitledName] is waging war against [shiite_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. It is your duty to end [assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [assassins_target.GetHerHis] intolerable aggressions. Turn [assassins_target.GetHerHim] into an example to fill our enemies' hearts with dread.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6202_WAR_ATTACKER_VASSAL:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Yet again the true faith is threatened. The infidel [assassins_aggressor.GetTitledName] is waging war against [shiite_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. We have identified [assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName] as one of his key vassals. End [assassins_target.GetHerHim], [Root.GetSocietyRank], and show the [assassins_aggressor.GetTitle] what fate befalls the Assassins' enemies.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6202_WAR_ATTACKER_COMMANDER:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Yet again our faith is threatened. The infidel [assassins_aggressor.GetTitledName] is waging war against [shiite_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. We have identified [assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName] as one of his key commanders. End [assassins_target.GetHerHim], [Root.GetSocietyRank], and show the [assassins_aggressor.GetTitle] what fate befalls the Assassins' enemies.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6202_ASSAULTED_MEMBER:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

An unforgivable crime has been committed. The despicable [assassins_target.GetTitledName] has assaulted one of our own. We cannot let such an insult pass unanswered. Make [assassins_target.GetHerHim] suffer, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. [assassins_target.GetHerHisCap] death will make our enemies think twice before they repeat [assassins_target.GetHerHis] mistake.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6202_KILLED_MEMBER:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

An unforgivable crime has been committed. The despicable [assassins_target.GetTitledName] has murdered one of our own. We cannot let such an insult pass unanswered. Make [assassins_target.GetHerHim] suffer, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. [assassins_target.GetHerHisCap] death will make our enemies think twice before they repeat [assassins_target.GetHerHis] mistake.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6202_MARKED_FOR_DEATH:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I call upon you to take a life in the name of the Order. [assassins_target.GetTitledName] is a wicked [assassins_target.GetManWoman], an enemy of all that which we hold dear. End [assassins_target.GetHerHim], [Root.GetSocietyRank], and make sure [assassins_target.GetSheHe] suffers.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6202_PERSECUTED_SHIITES:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

For far too long, the gentle Shi'a of [shiite_province.GetName] has suffered under the cruel rule of [assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]. It is your sacred duty to end [assassins_target.GetHerHim] and liberate our people. Turn [assassins_target.GetHerHim] into an example to fill our enemies' hearts with dread.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6202_FALLBACK:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Our enemies are growing bolder. They spread their vile heresies, poisoning the minds of our people. This cannot continue. [assassins_target.GetTitledName] is one of the worst offenders, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. Turn [assassins_target.GetHerHim] into an example to fill our enemies' hearts with dread.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTB_MNM_6202: I fear I cannot carry out this mission.
DEATH_MURDER_KNOWN_HASHSHASHIN: died at the hands of the Hashshashin $KILLER$
EVTDESC_MNM_6100_A: After having relentlessly studied [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s habits and movements, I finally believe I have found the perfect opportunity for the grand spectacle that will be [plot_target.GetHerHis] death. In a week's time, when [plot_target.GetFirstName] leaves the [plot_target.GetHouseOfWorship] after [plot_target.GetReligiousRite]...
EVTDESC_MNM_6100_B: Not even the thick walls of [plot_target.Host.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison can protect [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] from Allah's judgment. After having spent many nights watching the rotation of the guards and studied the [plot_target.Host.GetCapitalHolding] from every angle, I think I have found my opening...
EVTDESC_MNM_6100_C: The craven [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has gone into hiding, but no walls or disguises can save [plot_target.GetHerHim] from Allah's wrath. I have identified the servant who brings [plot_target.GetHerHim] messages and last night I followed [Root.GetHerHim] all the way to [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s lair.
EVTDESC_MNM_6100_D: The thick [plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding] walls of [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName] might offer [plot_target.GetHerHim] shelter from the epidemic, but the wrath of the Assassins know no such obstacles. After having spent many nights watching the rotation of the guards and studied the [plot_target.Location.GetHolding] from every angle, I think I have found my opening...
EVTDESC_MNM_6100_F: My target, [plot_target.GetTitledName], is hosting a feast in [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName] and I have successfully infiltrated [plot_target.GetHerHis] kitchen staff. This will be spectacular...

The time has come to put an end to [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [plot_target.GetHerHis] sins. In a week's time, when [plot_target.GetFirstName] leaves the [plot_target.GetHouseOfWorship] after [plot_target.GetReligiousRite], I will strike [plot_target.GetHerHim] down.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]

EVTOPTA_MNM_6102_TOOLTIP: §Y[assassin_plot_owner.GetSocietyRank] [assassin_plot_owner.GetFirstName]§! is putting [From.GetHerHis] plan to assassinate §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! in motion.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6104_A: There is a solemn, almost reverential, atmosphere as the crowd pours out of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] after the [Root.GetReligiousRite]. I follow the flow of people absentmindedly while I ponder what the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] said regarding right and wrong, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. Suddenly, I stumble. A moment later something heavy pushes me down into the dirt.
EVTDESC_MNM_6104_B: As the cell door creaks I steady myself. [Host.GetTitledFirstName]'s jailer is a brute of a [Host.GetManWoman]. However, when faint light of a distant torch reveals the silhouette in the doorway, my heart sinks from its position in my stomach to the floor. This is not the jailer. And... is that a dagger in [assassin.GetHerHis] hand?
EVTDESC_MNM_6104_C: I open my eyes and suddenly I feel wide awake. Something is not right, I can sense it with all my being. Why is the window open...?\nThe whisper emerging from the shadows is soft as silk. "Did you think you could escape the Assassins, [Root.GetFirstName]?"
EVTDESC_MNM_6104_D: The atmosphere at court grows more strained each day, so I thought a little feast would do us all good. I am conversing with [conversationalist.GetTitledFirstName] over the main course when the loud clatter of a serving dish crashing to the floor makes me jump out of my seat. I face the clumsy servant but words fail me as I discover the dagger in [assassin.GetHerHis] hand.
EVTDESC_MNM_6104_E: It... it is so hard to breathe. A heavy weight is pressing down on me, constricting my chest, pushing the air out of my lungs. As the worlds come in to focus I see a figure hovering over me. Is that a dagger?
EVTDESC_MNM_6104_F: I am conversing with [conversationalist.GetTitledFirstName] over the main course when the loud clatter of a serving dish crashing to the floor makes me jump out of my seat. I face the clumsy servant but words fail me as I discover the dagger in [assassin.GetHerHis] hand.
EVTDESC_MNM_6105_A: I am here to carry out Allah's judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]. The [assassin.GetManWoman]'s voice is deep, tinted with a strange accent. It rises to a loud shout, "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" The afternoon sun is reflected in the raised dagger, blinding me as [assassin.GetSheHe] stabs downwards.
EVTDESC_MNM_6105_B: No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. There is nowhere to run. Nothing within reach to use as a weapon. [assassin.GetSheHeCap] points the dagger at me, and says solemnly: "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]."
EVTDESC_MNM_6105_C: I grasp for the dagger under my pillow, but the shock of this unexpected visit has made my fingers stiff and movement imprecise. Before I can find it, the hooded figure is upon me. A dagger glints in the faint moonlight. "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]."
EVTDESC_MNM_6105_D: The time has come for the judgment of Allah! The guests fall silent as the [assassin.GetManWoman]'s shout echoes through the hall. A flash of gleaming metal, and then blood, pouring from between my fingers. A soft whisper as the world grows dim: "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]."
EVTDESC_MNM_6105_E: No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. The [assassin.GetManWoman]'s voice is deep, solemn. "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." The moonlight reflects in the dagger as [assassin.GetSheHe] raises it over her head. I close my eyes.
EVTDESC_MNM_6106_A: It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. As if [plot_target.GetSheHe] was a sheep, I herded [plot_target.GetHerHim] into the midst of the crowd, where everyone would see. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" I shouted, raising my dagger. Those who saw will never forget.
EVTDESC_MNM_6106_B: Due to my extensive preparations, entering the prison of [plot_target.Host.GetTitledFirstName] was almost too easy. The burly jailer had fallen asleep  one less death tonight, it seemed  but [plot_target.GetFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]."
EVTDESC_MNM_6106_C: [plot_target.GetFirstName] woke with a jerk as I slid through the window, scanning the room with a wild look on [plot_target.GetHerHis] face. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]," I whispered and [plot_target.GetHerHis] head snapped towards the shadowy corner where I stood. [plot_target.GetSheHeCap] reached for something  a weapon, perhaps  but [plot_target.GetSheHe] was not nearly quick enough.
EVTDESC_MNM_6106_D: Thanks to my servant's disguise I approached [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] unnoticed. [plot_target.GetHerHisCap] courtiers were loud and jolly, doing their best to forget the misery outside the [plot_target.GetCapitalHolding] walls. As I raised my voice and drew my dagger, however, they all fell silent. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!"
EVTDESC_MNM_6106_E: Once I had reached [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s [plot_target.GetChamber], my task became almost too easy. The feeble [plot_target.GetManWoman] could do nothing to defend [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself], if [plot_target.GetSheHe] was even aware of what was about to happen. "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." The moonlight reflected in my dagger as I raised it above my head.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6106: The hearts of our enemies fill with dread!
EVTDESC_MNM_6107:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It is done. [plot_target.GetTitledName] is dead. Everything went according to plan and no one will be able to track [plot_target.GetHerHis] death back to you.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6108_A: I am here to carry out Allah's judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]. The [assassin.GetManWoman]'s voice rises to a loud shout, "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" As I attempt to deflect the dagger, I manage to tear off [assassin.GetHerHis] mask, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
EVTDESC_MNM_6108_B: No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. There is no where to run. Nothing within reach to use as a weapon. So I shout. As [assassin.GetManWoman] launches [assassin.GetHerselfHimself] at me and in my attempt to defend myself I tear [assassin.GetHerHis] mask off, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
EVTDESC_MNM_6108_C: I shout as loud as I can. There are voices on the other side of the door, someone trying to tear it open, but they are too late. When the assassin launches [assassin.GetHerselfHimself] at me, I manage to tear off [assassin.GetHerHis] mask, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
EVTDESC_MNM_6108_D: [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]! As the assassin raises [assassin.GetHerHis] dagger, I grasp for anything within my reach, something to defend myself with. As the weapon tears my flesh I manage to pull down [assassin.GetHerHis] hood, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
EVTDESC_MNM_6108_E: My feeble cries seems to have alerted the guards, but they are too slow. "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." As [assassin.GetSheHe] raises the dagger, I struggle and manage to tear off the assassin's mask, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
EVTDESC_MNM_6109_A: At first, everything went according to plan. It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. However, when the time came to strike, my victim managed to tear of my mask, revealing my face to everyone around us. While it did not save [plot_target.GetHerHim], I almost did not escape.
EVTDESC_MNM_6109_B: The burly jailer had fallen asleep, but [plot_target.GetFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. [plot_target.GetSheHeCap] launched [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself] at me, tearing of my mask. My blade slid easily between [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s ribs, but not before [plot_target.GetSheHe] could scream. I barely managed to escape.
EVTDESC_MNM_6109_C: [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] woke with a jerk, scanning the room with a wild look on [plot_target.GetHerHis] face. "Guards!" [plot_target.GetSheHe] shouted, panic in [plot_target.GetHerHis] voice. I could hear movements in the adjacent room, and though they were too slow to save [plot_target.GetFirstName], they almost managed to catch me.
EVTDESC_MNM_6109_D: [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] was holding a feast that night. While I managed to approach [plot_target.GetFirstName] unnoticed, [plot_target.GetSheHe] managed to tear off my hood, revealing my face to [plot_target.GetHerHis] entire court. I ended [plot_target.GetHerHim] nonetheless, but was almost caught in the process.
EVTDESC_MNM_6109_E: When I entered [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s [plot_target.GetChamber] and saw that feeble wretch sleeping in [plot_target.GetHerHis] bed I grew careless. How could this possibly go wrong? However, as I bent over [plot_target.GetFirstName], [plot_target.GetSheHe] opened [plot_target.GetHerHis] eyes and screamed. In the following struggle, my mask was torn off. While my dagger found its target, the guards got a good look at my face before I escaped.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6109_TOOLTIP: You were discovered when you assassinated §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6110:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your wish has been fulfilled  the despicable [plot_target.GetTitledName] is dead. Unfortunately, however, there was an incident. My identity was discovered and I fear they can track the killing back to you, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. I am most sorry.

Praised be Allah,
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_6110_TOOLTIP: The killing of §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! has been tracked back to you.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6111_A: I am here to carry out Allah's judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]! The [assassin.GetManWoman] on top of me pulls a dagger from [assassin.GetHerHis] robes. I lunge for it, hitting it out of [assassin.GetHerHis] hand. I shout, drawing the attention of the crowd, and within heartbeats my assailant and I are separated.
EVTDESC_MNM_6111_B: No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. As the [assassin.GetManWoman] raises [assassin.GetHerHis] dagger, I do the only thing I can think of. I tackle [assassin.GetHerHim] to the filthy cell floor and run. I wake the snoring jailer as I sprint past. [Host.GetSheHeCap] catches me within a few heartbeats, but at least the assassin is gone.
EVTDESC_MNM_6111_C: I grasp for the dagger under my pillow, but the shock of this unexpected visit has made my fingers stiff and movement imprecise. So I shout, as loud as I can. The guards are forcing their way through the door as I roll off the bed, dodging a dagger. When I scramble to my feet, the assassin is gone.
EVTDESC_MNM_6111_D: The time has come for the judgment of Allah! The [assassin.GetManWoman] reaches for something inside [assassin.GetHerHis] robes, but then someone grabs me from behind, pulling me back. One of the guards tackle the assassin to the floor. There is blood, but it is not my assailant's. A moment later, [assassin.GetSheHe] is gone.
EVTDESC_MNM_6111_E: No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. There is nothing I can do but scream, so I do. Impressively so. There are echoes of footsteps and clashing metal from outside. Before my assailant can finish the deed, four guards burst through the [Root.GetChamberOpening]. The strange [assassin.GetManWoman] gives me one look and then [assassin.GetSheHe] is gone.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6111: I am safe for now, but the Assassins will surely try again.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6111_TOOLTIP: You survived an murder attempt by the Assassins.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6112_A: At first, everything went according to plan. It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. However, as I pulled my dagger, [From.GetSheHe] struck it out of my hand. I was about to reach for a second weapon, but upon hearing [plot_target.GetHerHis] screams, the people around us surged towards [plot_target.GetHerHim], separating us.
EVTDESC_MNM_6112_B: The burly jailer had fallen asleep but [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. As I lunged at [plot_target.GetHerHim], [plot_target.GetSheHe] managed to dodge me and ran, right into the arms of the jailer. Not wanting to share [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s cell, I slunk into the shadows.
EVTDESC_MNM_6112_C: [plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]! I announced and the [plot_target.GetManWoman] woke with a jerk. I lunged at [plot_target.GetHerHim] from my position by the window. In a manner uncharacteristically quick for someone having just woken up, [plot_target.GetFirstName] dodged my dagger, and in the next moment guards were bursting through the door.
EVTDESC_MNM_6112_D: The time has come for the judgment of Allah! I raised my dagger, ready to strike, but then someone tackled me from behind. I stabbed, blade tearing flesh, hot blood running down my arm. When I got to my feet, [plot_target.GetFirstName] was outside of my reach. There were too many people, and weapons, between us. I turned around and ran.
EVTDESC_MNM_6112_E: No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins, I whispered as I bent over [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s sleeping figure. [plot_target.GetSheHeCap] woke with a start, and before I could bury the dagger in [plot_target.GetHerHim], [plot_target.GetSheHe] screamed. The next moment, guards burst through the door. There was no more time.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6112_TOOLTIP: Your attempt failed, but you managed to flee.\n

I am sorry to inform you my attempt to end the [plot_target.GetInsultAdjective] [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] failed. Fortunately my identity was not discovered and the attempt will not be tracked back to you. We will bide our time.

Praised be Allah,
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
