Praised be Allah!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTB_MNM_6204: I cannot fulfill your request at this time.
EVTDESC_MNM_6205: The people of the county [conversion_province.GetName] has now fully embraced Shia Islam as their religion. From [conversion_province.Capital.GetHolding] to countryside, the names of Allah, his prophets and the Imams are honored and cherished. Your mission is complete.
EVTDESC_MNM_6206: As [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has now met [plot_target.GetHerHis] end at your hands, your mission is completed.
plot_assassins_collect_debt_desc: By the order of the Grand Master of the Assassins, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! is responsible for collecting the debt of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! must infiltrate the target's residence and threaten [Root.GetHerHim] to give the money back.
plot_assassins_collect_debt_success: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! infiltrates the residence of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and threatens [Root.GetHerHim] to pay [Root.GetHerHis] debt.
EVTDESC_MNM_6207:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to pay back what [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] owes us. We are in need of that money, and it is up to you to collect the debt. I fear the [owes_the_assassins.GetSocietyRank] need some "encouragement" to part with [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] gold. I am sure you can think of something.

Praised be Allah!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_6207_TOOLTIP: Activate the plot "Collect Debt" plot with §Y[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]§! as your target to being your mission.
EVTDESC_MNM_6208: I have ensured a way into the [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding] of [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetName] where my target, [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName], resides. In one way or another, I must attempt to scare [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHim] into paying back [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] debt. The question is, where is [owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName]'s weak spot?
EVTOPTA_MNM_6208: The promise of death scares even the bravest of [owes_the_assassins.GetMenWomen].
EVTOPTB_MNM_6208: I will threaten someone [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] holds dear.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6208: [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHeCap] is a greedy [owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman]. I'll target [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] wealth.
EVTDESC_MNM_6212: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to me, shaken and pale, with a note. [From.GetSheHeCap] found it in [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChamber] alongside a piece of [From.GetHerHis] favorite cake, which was surely poisoned. The words on the note are directed at me  the Assassins demand that I return the money I owe or my [GetFromRelation] will pay in my stead.
EVTDESC_MNM_6213: A week ago, a fire broke out in the trade district of [fire_town.GetName]. It consumed many storehouses and shops. The local trade will not recover in many years. At first, it was thought to be an accident, but now I know better. I have found a note in my [Root.GetChamber]. The Assassins want their money back, or my treasury shall burn next.
trade_district_fire_desc: A fire has ravaged the local trade district, consuming the majority of storehouses and shops, resulting in many bankrupt traders and craftsmen.
EVTDESC_MNM_6215_A: Not a single servant turned their head as I entered the [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding], not even as I stepped into [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]'s [owes_the_assassins.GetChamber]. There, I left my note by a cup, which I laced with a non-lethal dose of poison. It seemed to do the trick  [grand_master.GetSocietyRank] [grand_master.GetFirstName] informed me that the money was returned this morning.
EVTDESC_MNM_6215_C: I watched the trade districts of [fire_town.GetName] burn from the safety of a distant hill. How it spread! As the flames danced from building to building, I was convinced the message would get across to [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]. Indeed, I was correct  [grand_master.GetSocietyRank] [grand_master.GetFirstName] informed me that the money was returned this morning.
EVTDESC_MNM_6216_A: Not a single servant turned their head as I entered the [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding], not even as I stepped into [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]'s [owes_the_assassins.GetChamber]. There, I left my note by a cup, which i laced with a non-lethal dose of poison. However, it turns out that [owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName] is a foolhardy [owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman]  [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] still refuses to repay [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] debt.
EVTDESC_MNM_6216_B: I infiltrated the kitchen staff of the [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding] and bribed [threaten_dear_relation.GetTitledFirstName]'s servant to tell me about the [threaten_dear_relation.GetLordLady]'s favorite cake. I brought a slice containing some "secret ingredients" and placed it in [threaten_dear_relation.GetHerHis] [threaten_dear_relation.GetChamber] next to a note directed at [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]. However, it turns out that [owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName] is a foolhardy [owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman]  [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] still refuses to repay [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] debt.
EVTDESC_MNM_6216_C: I watched the trade districts of [fire_town.GetName] burn from the safety of a distant hill. How it spread! As the flames danced from building to building, I was convinced the message would get across to [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]. However, it turns out that [owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName] is a foolhardy [owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman]  [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] still refuses to repay [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] debt.
EVTDESC_MNM_6221:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It is time to strike against the infidel [infidel_holding_owner.GetTitledName]. Your mission is to raise your armies and occupy the [infidel_holding.GetHolding] [infidel_holding.GetName] in [infidel_holding_owner.GetHerHis] county [infidel_holding_province.GetName].

May Allah be with you, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6222: The [infidel_holding.GetHolding] [infidel_holding.GetName] is now under my control. I have struck a heavy blow against [infidel_holding_owner.GetTitledName] in the name of the Assassins! My mission is now complete.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6221: I shall hoist our banner high over the [infidel_holding.GetHolding]!
EVTDESC_MNM_6840: There is something strange, almost ominous, about [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. The other day when we were exchanging pleasantries, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] asked me about my [Root.GetMatterOfImportance]. Normally, this would not unsettle me, but there was something about the tone of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] voice... Veiled or not, a threat is a threat, and this was certainly one.
EVTDESC_MNM_6841: When I met [From.GetTitledFirstName] the other day, I inquired about [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetMatterOfImportance]. [From.GetSheHeCap] certainly seemed to notice my veiled threat  [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face turned ashen and for the reminder of our conversation [From.GetSheHe] would not meet my gaze.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6841: [From.GetFirstName] will not dare to cross me.
assassins_mark_for_death_desc: As the Grand Master of the Assassins, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has the power to mark §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! for death. One of the Assassins will be given a mission to kill §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
assassins_mark_for_death_allow_tooltip: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! does not already have a target marked for death.
assassins_clear_marked_for_death_target_: Remove the mark of death on §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!. This will not cancel any ongoing missions.
The mark of death is cleared from §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
EVTDESC_MNM_6842: I have marked [From.GetTitledFirstName] for death. Soon enough, one of my assassins will be sent on a mission to end [From.GetHerHis] life. They will notify me when the deed is done.
EVTDESC_MNM_6843:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It is done. [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has met [plot_target.GetHerHis] end at my hands. As these news reach our other enemies, they will tremble with fear!

Glory to the Assassins!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6249:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

While our members are devout believers, many lack the practical skills, bodily stamina, and rigorous education needed by an expert assassin. Therefore I give you this mission, [Root.GetSocietyRank]: take on a protégé and turn them into a weapon of Allah's fury.

Praised be Allah!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
decline_quest_tooltip: You decline the mission and will not be offered another for some time.
assassins_donate_desc: You may donate money to the Order in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
cat_familiar_desc: This character is constantly followed around by a beautiful, black cat with astoundingly green eyes.
wolf_familiar_desc: A big, shaggy wolf is this character's constant companion. The beast is surprisingly obedient.
owl_familiar_desc: A beautiful, snow white owl is often perched on this character's shoulder.
raven_familiar_desc: A beautiful, coal black raven is often perched on this character's shoulder. It is known to steal shiny objects, from coins to jewelry.
devil_worshipers_summon_familiar_cd_tool: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not selected a familiar in the past 5 years\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7815: As a [Root.GetSocietyRank] and a weaver of [Root.GetDWDarkMagic], I can summon a supernatural beast to be my companion. This familiar will be my eyes and ears, as well as imbue me with its powers.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7815: I choose the cat, lord of all beasts!
EVTOPTB_MNM_7815: A wolf shall be my protector.
EVTOPTC_MNM_7815: I summon the owl, master of the night!
EVTOPTD_MNM_7815: The raven will grant me its wit.
EVTDESC_7821_MILD: It seems like my [Root.GetDWDarkMagic] was successful, however, the result was not quite what I imagined. I had hoped the [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetTitledFirstName] would be stricken by a mysterious case of pox or plague, but as it turns out, my spell only gave [From.GetHerHim] [From.GetDisease].
EVTDESC_7821_DANGEROUS: Praised be [Root.GetDWDevil], my [Root.GetDWDarkMagic] has borne fruit! News has reached me of the [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s recent illness. [From.GetSheHeCap] is suffering from [From.GetDisease] and I doubt [From.GetSheHe] will last very long...
the_devil_worshipers_tainted_touch_desc: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can use [From.GetDWDarkMagic] to taint §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! health. This will cause severe discomfort and possibly even death.
plot_assassins_collect_debt_allow_tt: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has a mission to collect §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! debt.
EVTDESC_MNM_6992: Your mission "[Root.GetQuestName]" involving [From.GetTitledFirstName] is no longer valid.
REL_HARD_TO_CONVERT_DESC: $NAME$ counties and characters are hard to convert
mend_the_schism_holder_religion: Holder is §YOrthodox§!, §YPaulician§!, §YMonothelite§! or §YIconoclast§! and NOT a heretic\n
no_secret_religion: Is NOT secretly following another religion\n
EVTDESC38317: The concepts of fairness and rules have lost their luster to me. I have lost the Just trait.
EVTDESC38318: Why would all these delicious foods and drinks exist if we were not meant to taste them? I've lost the Temperate trait.
EVTDESC38319: Not everything in life needs hard work to achieve. I've lost the Diligent trait.
devil_worshipers_dark_divorce_desc: Annul your marriage to §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! by death, using dark rituals and magic. This may have repercussions upon your soul!
EVTDESC_MNM_7050: Though my last act of worship has been some time ago, I can still sense an inhuman touch upon my soul whenever I think about what I did. I have become a changed [Root.GetManWoman].
EVTOPTA_MNM_7050: A tainted soul is but a small price to pay...
EVTOPTA_MNM_7801: Speak the words, and seal [dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis] fate!
EVTOPTB_MNM_7801_TOOLTIP: Stop the ritual and spare §Y[dark_divorce_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s life. [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHeCap] will be none the wiser.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7803: A terrifying scream echoes through the hallways, and when I reach the scene I find a group of my courtiers bending over the lifeless form of my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]. Signs of bodily harm aren't to be found, but the look of sheer terror engraved on [dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis] face is enough to raise the hairs on the back of my neck...
EVTOPTA_MNM_7803: I would rather never see what [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHe] saw.
EVTDESC_MNM_7804: One moment my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName] is crossing the open from one building to the next, and the next a blindingly bright light and thunderous sound seemingly shatter the world. After myself and the other witnesses manage to recollect ourselves, we find the singed remains of my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife]'s body lifeless on the ground.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7804: Out with a bang! [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHeCap] always did have style.
EVTDESC_MNM_7805: Screams of panic and agony wake me from my sleep. When I reach my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]'s bedchambers and turn the red-hot doorknob, I find only a few charred bones remaining of my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife]'s body. Aside from the bed [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHe] lay in, the bedchambers were luckily completely untouched by the flames.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6815: I think I'll go lie down.
DEATH_HASHISH_OVERDOSE: died from using too much Hashish
EVTOPTB_MNM_7110: I think there are other things I can do for [Root.GetDWDevil] right now.
EVTDESC_MNM_7111: My forces has breached the outer defenses of the [dw_desecration_target.GetHolding] in [dw_desecration_target.GetName]. I should prepare myself to enter and do the work of [Root.GetDWDevil].
EVTOPTB_MNM_7111: No, there's too many people around.
EVTDESC_MNM_7112: My preparations and plans have been made, a servant has been bribed to leave a side door to the [dw_desecration_target.GetHolding] in [dw_desecration_target.GetName] open so that I and some faithful servants can enter and do the dark biddings of [Root.GetDWDevil].
EVTDESC_MNM_7113_VIOLENT: With a group of handpicked faithful [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] I have entered the hallowed grounds of the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [dw_desecration_target.GetName]. However as soon as I step inside the doors a [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] throws himself at our feet begging us in the name of [desecration_holder.Religion.GetHighGodName] to show mercy and swears to not utter a word of our presence.
EVTDESC_MNM_7113_VIOLENT_HOLDER: As I and my cadre of faithful [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] enter the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] of [dw_desecration_target.GetName] I find no-one other than [desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName] in the main chapel.
EVTDESC_MNM_7113_PLOTTING: As I and a group of my faithful make our way through the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [dw_desecration_target.Title.GetName] I spot a [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] tending to their duties in the middle of the night.
EVTDESC_MNM_7113_PLOTTING_HOLDER: As I and a group of my faithful make our way through the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [dw_desecration_target.Title.GetName] I spot [desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName] tending to their duties in the middle of the night.
EVTOPT_MNM_7113_MARTIAL: Seize them. Their blood will be a good sacrifice for [Root.GetDWDevil].
EVTOPT_MNM_7113_INTRIGUE: Knock them out from behind, they will make for a good sacrifice.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7113: Kill them, dead men tell no tales.
EVTOPTB_MNM_7113_VIOLENT: Let them live, if they speak it shall only serve to spread the glory.
EVTOPTB_MNM_7113_PLOTTING: Avoid them, no need for the extra risk.
EVTDESC_MNM_7114: As my [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] approach the [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] they call out for help and grab a nearby candelabra. Within short notice a small group of priests come rushing into the room and a melee breaks out around me.
EVTDESC_MNM_7114_HOLDER: As my [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] approach [desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName] [desecration_holder.GetSheHe] calls out for help and grabs a nearby candelabra. Within short notice a small group of their comrades come rushing into the room and a melee breaks out around us.
EVTDESC_MNM_7116_POOR: Navigating our way through the small [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] I and my companions have entered the small room that goes for the inner sanctum. The room contains the sparsest possible honorings to [desecration_holder.Religion.GetHighGodName] and a scant few decorative idols and relics. The state of this place shows clearly the superiority of our cause!
EVTDESC_MNM_7116_RICH: Making our way through the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] I and my companions enter the inner sanctum with its relics and religious idols. A small treasure in both the spiritual and material worlds lies before us. Such a rich and holy place will be most fitting for our dark deeds.
EVTDESC_MNM_7116_RICHER: Having penetrated the defenses of the impressive [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] I and my companions have entered the inner sanctum and are preparing for the desecration ritual. The walls are covered in rich tapestries and holy relics and idols are strewn across the room. It is undoubtedly a place of both wealth and piety, perfect for our cause!
EVTOPT_MNM_7116_STEWARDSHIP: I will take the most expensive relics for myself!
EVTOPT_MNM_7116_LEARNING: I will use the most holy in the rites of desecration!
EVTOPTA_MNM_7116: These relics shall be put to better use. My use.
EVTOPTB_MNM_7116: Burn it all in the name of [Root.GetDWDevil]!
EVTDESC_MNM_7117_VIOLENT: As the clamor of battle my faithful and I exit the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] having completed our ritual of desecration. The holiness of the place will be tainted for years to come.
EVTDESC_MNM_7117_PLOTTING: The night is silent as we exit the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship], our foul rites making sure that the holiness of the place is tainted for years to come.
EVTDESC_MNM_7118: Though I may suffer for now, no earthly ailment is beyond the power of [Root.GetDWDevil]. I am preparing a great ritual to cleanse my body and become like new.
EVTDESC_MNM_7119_INCAPABLE_INFIRM: As the ritual is being finished I can feel my strength returning to me, purging the weakness that has been holding my body in a vice.
EVTDESC_MNM_7119_BLINDED: The light! The light! Thank [Root.GetDWDevil], I can see again!
EVTDESC_MNM_7119_EUNUCH: A miracle! My sword has returned to me! If this is not proof of the power of [Root.GetDWDevil] I do not know what is!
EVTDESC_MNM_7119_MAIMED: What power [Root.GetDWDevil] displays! The pain of regrowth is immense, but I am restored!
EVTDESC_MNM_7119_DISEASE: The blessings of [Root.GetDWDevil] courses through my veins, and I can already feel the filth of disease being forced from my body!
CAN_RANK_UP_TRIGGER: Can rank up in their society
CAN_NOT_RANK_UP_TRIGGER: Can NOT rank up in their society
CAN_RANK_DOWN_TRIGGER: Can rank down in their society
CAN_NOT_RANK_DOWN_TRIGGER: Can NOT rank down in their society
SET_INTERESTED_SOCIETY_EFFECT_NONE: Loses interest in joining a Society
SAME_SOCIETY_AS_TRIGGER_NOT: Is NOT in the same society as $TARGET$\n
SAME_SOCIETY_AS_TRIGGER: Is in the same society as $TARGET$\n
IS_GRANDMASTER_TRIGGER: Is the Grandmaster of a Society
IS_GRANDMASTER_TRIGGER_NOT: Is NOT the Grandmaster of a Society
SET_SOCIETY_GRANDMASTER_EFFECT: Becomes the Grandmaster of their Society
action_statecraft_desc: Work to improve relations with random vassals, neighboring rulers, and your liege  and lower threat.
action_administer_realm_desc: The [GetMyTreasurerName] will strive to improve your Demesne. Increases culture conversion chance and prosperity gain.
action_sabotage_province_desc: The [GetSpymasterName] is sent to infiltrate a province and sabotage its operations.
action_hunt_heretics_desc: The [GetLordSpiritualName] will hunt down blaspheming and heretical Societies and drag their members into the light.
ENDGAME_TEXT_PAGAN: You have become Pagan and are therefore no longer allowed to continue playing without the The Old Gods expansion.
OPEN_TREASURY: §YTreasury§!\nOpen the Treasury to see the Artifacts collected by this Character.
FROM_TREASURY: §YFrom Treasury§!\nThe combined modifier from all active artifacts held by this character.
ANTIPOPE_NO_POPE: §RCan't create an antipope when there is no Pope§!
recent_induction_attempt_desc: Someone has recently tried having this character join a society
EVTDESC_MNM_4090: I have decided to show my devotion to God and the order by taking a vow of celibacy.
EVTDESC_MNM_4091: I have decided to stop my vow of celibacy and re-attend my duties to my family.
EVTDESC_MNM_4093: Going along the teachings of [Root.Society.GetName] I have decided to donate a portion of my wealth to those who need it better.
EVTOPT_MNM_4093: I hope this will improve my standing.
monastic_orders_go_celibate_desc: Show your devotion to God by becoming celibate.
monastic_orders_donate_to_charity_desc: Donate money to charitable causes to improve your standing in [Root.Society.GetName].
recently_donated_to_charity_desc: This character recently donated to the charity of a monastic order
devil_worshipers_dark_healing_tooltip: Need to be wounded, maimed, have a disease or severe medical condition.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7118_TOOLTIP: Removes all symptoms and minor diseases, has a chance to remove stronger diseases and perform a miracle.
devil_worshiper_desecrate_temple_decisio: Desecrate the temple as ordered by §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
desecrated_temple_desc: This temple has been desecrated by an unholy ritual
mohammads_beard: Hair from the Beard of Mohammad
String_Glory_to_the_God_of_Death: Glory to the God of Death!
String_Kali_Expression: Glory to the Lord of Kali Yuga!
String_Glory_to_the_Lord_of_Kali_Yuga: Glory to the Lord of Kali Yuga!
corrupt_priest_effect_TOOLTIP: Attempt to negatively influence §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s personality, increasing [Root.GetHerHis] opinion of you by §G50§! upon success. Failure might tarnish your reputation, though...\n
devil_worshipers_corrupt_priest_desc: Corrupt §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! for material gains and [From.GetDWDevil]'s appreciation. This might have repercussions upon your soul!
EVTDESC_MNM_7826: No person lives a life entirely devoid of sin, and neither does [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]. I just have to find some traits of [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] character that I can build on...
EVTOPTA_MNM_7826: I'll turn [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] guilty pleasures into vices!
EVTOPTA_MNM_7826_TOOLTIP: Send people to find out whether §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! has any character traits that could develop into vices.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_7826: I'm sure [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]'s not quite as virtuous as [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] pretends to be!
EVTOPTB_MNM_7826_TOOLTIP: Send people to find out whether §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! has any virtues [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] might not whole-heartedly believe in.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_7826: No, I don't think this is productive.
EVTOPTC_MNM_7826_TOOLTIP: Give up your attempt at corrupting §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_lustful: My agents have proved their worth! It would appear that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] has a liking for the pleasures of the flesh. A night of debauchery could well turn [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] secret liking into a publicly-known love. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_gluttonous: My agents have uncovered rumors that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] rather enjoys his feasts. Introducing [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to new, exotic flavors might fuel [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] appetite even further. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_greedy: Thorough investigation has revealed [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] rather likes [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] gold. I wonder if [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] is a gambling [corrupt_priest_target.GetManWoman]? I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_slothful: It would seem that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] is somewhat bothered by the hassles of ruling. I could show [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] how much more enjoyable it is to do nothing, instead. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_envious: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] apparently has problems coming to terms with [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] not having what [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] neighbor has. Perhaps I can convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] of how right [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] feelings are over a banquet. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_wroth: My agents met with several of [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s courtiers, who all spoke of barely-suppressed outbursts of anger on the part of their [corrupt_priest_target.GetLordLady]. I should speak with [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] and convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to henceforth let it all out, instead. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_proud: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] seems to quite enjoy flattery and praise. I could organize a celebration in [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] honor, affirming [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has reason to be haughty. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_deceitful: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s court appears to be in a mild state of confusion. [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] seems to have a penchant for telling minor lies and watching the confusion that ensues. I should invite [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] and show [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] how much more rewarding the bigger lies are. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_arbitrary: My agents have revealed that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] is not always equally just in his judgments. If [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] were to visit and judge some of my criminals, I could encourage [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to judge based on appearance and whim. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7830_cruel: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s courtiers have learned not to walk too closely by [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] at the top of the staircase. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] seems to quite enjoy them getting hurt. I'm sure [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] would like to see my torture chamber! I shall write the invitation...
EVTOPTC_MNM_7830_TOOLTIP: Well-chosen words will likely have a better effect on §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_7830: ...and use my knowledge of [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.Religion.GetScriptureName] to convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTD_MNM_7830_TOOLTIP: With well-founded arguments §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! will likely see the reason in my words.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_lustful: The raunchy nights of pleasure and debauchery I hosted at my court for [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] seem to have truly freed [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] from [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] remaining inhibitions. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] is most thankful to me for showing [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] needs not be ashamed of pursuing pleasure.
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_gluttonous: The lavish feast to which I invited [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] have paid off, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has already started to consume vast quantities of the delicacies I introduced [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to. Before [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] left, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] made sure I understood how grateful [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was for the experience.
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_greedy: During our games of chance [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] struggled more and more to hide [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] fondness for the gold coins on the table. With some well-placed words I managed to make [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] come to terms with [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] greed. Letting [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] win most of the games ensured [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] left both thankful and in high spirits.
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_slothful: Over the past few days [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] and I did almost every conceivable thing... except managing a court. I have never seen [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] happier, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] seemed most excited to spend less time ruling and more time enjoying life.
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_envious: As we feasted I subtly directed the conversation towards [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s neighbor. Through carefully-dropped hints I convinced [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] that [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] does indeed rightfully covet much that is owned by others. The reinforcing effect this had on [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] envy has already become very clear.
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_wroth: I slipped some coins to a servant in return for him bumping into [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] in a hallway during [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] visit. Only a few words from me were needed to unleash [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]'s anger upon the servant. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] afterwards confessed to me how liberating it was to let out [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] anger, and was most grateful I helped [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to discover this.
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_proud: Over the course of the celebrations [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s ego inflated like a bloated cow. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] has already become insufferable to be around, but at least [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was exceedingly grateful that I 'finally recognized [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] greatness'...
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_deceitful: As we feasted, I eventually subtly turned the conversation to the small lies [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] uses for [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] amusement. We discussed how [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe], by using [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] talent for lies, could reap far greater rewards than mere 'amusement'. Thoughtfully, [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] agreed, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was most thankful to me for opening [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] eyes.
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_arbitrary: With my calm support [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] began to visibly enjoy sentencing people based on, for instance, their appearance, or the first sentence of their defense. A grateful [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] afterwards told me [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] far preferred this over the tedious process of listening to lengthy explanations...
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_cruel: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] and I had a lot of fun in the dungeons. The prisoners, not so much. Both [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] and I discovered a new side of [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] that was quite... unsettling. Not that it detracted from his gratitude.
EVTDESC_MNM_7832_bonus: It seems that liberating [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] from [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] virtue has had unforeseen effects... Having finally discovered what [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has missed out on for all these years, [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] has sunk headlong into utter depravity.
EVTDESC_MNM_7834: Despite my best efforts, one misplaced word was all that was needed for [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] to take offense from my suggestion. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] stormed out of the room indignantly, and what's far worse, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] outed my supposed 'wickedness' to everyone!
EVTOPTA_MNM_7834_TOOLTIP: People will not be happy to hear this...\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7835_remove_chaste: A lingering touch here, slightly too long a glance there... [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] might not be entirely as chaste as [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] pretends to be. I have just the servant for [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to meet. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7835_remove_temperate: Some of [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s servants reportedly saw [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] sneak into the kitchen at night to enjoy some leftovers. If I could speak to [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] in private I am sure I could convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] there is no need for secrecy on these matters. Perhaps [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] would like to visit my court? I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7835_remove_charitable: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] at times seems almost reluctant to give to others. With a good example [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] could be acquainted with the joys of keeping wealth to yourself. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7835_remove_diligent: It's almost as if [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] works hard because [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has been taught to, and not because [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] believes [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] should. I should show [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] that it is alright not to be a slave to hard work. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7835_remove_kind: Occasionally [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s smiles and gentle words seem rather forced. With some help I am sure [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] could come to understand that one does not always need to be all smiles with everyone. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7835_remove_patient: Regular sighs and long, annoyed pauses give away that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] isn't as patient as is widely thought. Keeping all that frustration pent up inside cannot be healthy. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7835_remove_humble: At times, when [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] does not receive his due credit, my agents report it almost seems as if [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] is about to speak up. I will show [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] how it feels to be recognized! I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7835_remove_honest: Honesty has more than once gotten [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] into trouble. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] should learn how to avoid it by using little white lies. I shall write the invitation...
EVTDESC_MNM_7835_remove_just: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] has allegedly voiced [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] annoyance that being just is so time-consuming. Surely I can make [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] see how cutting a few corners could save [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] a lot of time. I shall write the invitation...
EVTOPTC_MNM_7835_TOOLTIP: Well-chosen words will likely have a better effect on §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_7835: ...and use my knowledge of the [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.Religion.GetScriptureName] to convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTD_MNM_7835_TOOLTIP: With well-founded arguments §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! will likely see the reason in my words.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7837_chaste: I saw [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s glances at the servant during our conversation. With a few encouraging words I got them to seclude themselves, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] returned a changed [corrupt_priest_target.GetManWoman]. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] was most pleased with my support!
EVTDESC_MNM_7837_temperate: Having ensured that I caught [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] eating leftovers in the kitchen after our banquet, I managed to soothe [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] worries and convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] there was no reason to continue to pretend to have a small appetite. Our next banquet was far more enjoyable...
EVTDESC_MNM_7837_charitable: Using a display of wealth, I managed to convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] that sometimes money is of better use in one's own pockets. Thoroughly enticed by the prospect, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was most pleased someone had spoken so frankly to him on these matters.
EVTDESC_MNM_7837_diligent: I showed [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] by example that one can achieve things without working hard. [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] truly seemed to enjoy the time spent at my court, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has already resolved to spend less time working hard when [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] returns home.
EVTDESC_MNM_7837_kind: The servant I had bribed continued his insolence for hours, before [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s kindness finally broke. We had a good long discussion afterwards, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] finally understood that some people are simply not deserving of kindness. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] was most thankful to me for opening [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] eyes.
EVTDESC_MNM_7837_patient: As I heard [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] sigh in frustration at the servant's incompetence, I gave the lad a piece of my mind. Before long, [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]'s patience ended and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] joined me in a display of our anger. [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] was incredibly grateful for the release, and seems to have done away with patience since.
EVTDESC_MNM_7837_humble: All that was needed was to insist on giving [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] the credit that [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was due. After some half-hearted attempts at avoiding it, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] finally accepted the praise, and seems to have gotten a taste for recognition now.
EVTDESC_MNM_7837_honest: A simple demonstration of talking my way out of an embarrassing situation by using a small lie was enough to get [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] interested. With some explanation and reassurance that nobody would get hurt, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] seems to have finally abandoned [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] honesty.
EVTDESC_MNM_7837_just: I showed [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] how quickly I judged some of the more bothersome criminals based on my intuition rather than a detailed examination of the facts. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] was most impressed, and has already started following my example!
EVTOPTB_MNM_7839: Unfortunately I cannot do so at this time.
devil_worshipers_demonic_possession_desc: Attempt to possess §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! with a [From.GetDWDemon], making [Root.GetHerHim] fanatically loyal to you. This may have repercussions upon your soul!
possess_courtier_already_done: Possession of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not already been attempted\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_7029: Unfortunately I cannot do so at this time.
EVTDESC_MNM_7841: In the middle of the night, I seclude myself in the room I have meticulously prepared for tonight's [Root.GetDWDarkMagic]. With every step of the ritual completed, the air in the room grows more and more oppressing, until finally I sense I am about to unleash a being of terrible power upon my unsuspecting foe.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7841_TOOLTIP: Send out the being to take possession of §Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!!\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7843: The ritual was a resounding success! [possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName] seems to have taken quite a liking to me, and is now far more amenable to my suggestions. The unfortunate side effect is that [possess_courtier_target.GetSheHe] has become quite obviously... insane.
EVTDESC_MNM_7844: Not everything has gone according to plan. Although something quite clearly seems to have taken up residence within [possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName], whatever it is does not seem to be inclined to make [possess_courtier_target.GetFirstName] more loyal towards you...
EVTDESC_MNM_7845: The ritual has failed completely. Whether [possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s mind proved too strong, or due to some other reason, the entity did not manage to take a hold of [possess_courtier_target.GetHerHim]. [possess_courtier_target.GetFirstName]'s mind has completely shattered in the process, however.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7845_TOOLTIP: §Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! retains their free will, or what remains of it.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7847: Despite [possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s frequent bouts of madness, [possess_courtier_target.GetSheHe] has indeed been loyal so far. Which is why it comes as such a surprise to hear [possess_courtier_target.GetHerHis] characteristic cackling laughter behind you as cold steel sinks into your back.
EVTDESC_MNM_4601_SLOTHFUL: [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]'s slothfulness has long been known in the Order, subjecting [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] to its scorn. I could teach [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] to set up a horarium to structure [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis] time, helping [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] to work harder.
EVTDESC_MNM_4601_REGULAR: Despite having been a part of the Order for a long time, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName] still does not truly exemplify the Benedictine ideals of hard work and structure. I could teach [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] to set up a horarium to structure [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis] time.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4601: I will, but [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis] first lesson must be that good things do not come for free.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4601_TOOLTIP: Offer to help [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName] in return for monetary compensation.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4603_SLOTHFUL:
Blessings to you, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName],
Forgive me for writing so candidly, but your unfortunate lack of work ethic is putting our Order in a poor light. I propose to aid you to find structure and purpose in life. A minor form of compensation in return for my help would already go a long way to teaching you the value of hard work.

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4603_REGULAR:
Blessings to you, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName],
I have observed your attempts at following the Rule of Saint Benedict, and I noticed you could do with some help. Allow me to offer mine. However, the first lesson must be that nothing in life is obtained without cost, and a minor form of compensation would therefore be required.

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_4603: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSheHeCap] is right, I could use the help...
EVTDESC_MNM_4604:
Blessings to you, [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName],
I thank you for your offer of help, and I send to you the requested payment alongside this message. I look forward to your guidance!

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_4604_TOOLTIP: Help [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName] to become a hard worker.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4605: With patient dedication [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetTitledFirstName] has shown me how to create a horarium to assign my time appropriately, making it easier to structure the work I do. It has already proven to be most useful, and work comes more easily to me now.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4605: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName] is a gift from the Lord himself!
EVTDESC_MNM_4607_SLOTHFUL: With some help and ample amounts of discipline the horarium [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName] helped me create has allowed me to defeat my laziness. Hard work is so much more fulfilling!
EVTDESC_MNM_4607_REGULAR: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]'s horarium was exactly what I needed to truly live up to the ideals of our Order.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4607: Hard work is its own reward.
EVTDESC_MNM_4608_OUTRAGED:
[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName].
I am most offended by your insinuation that I embarrass the Order. I neither need nor desire your aid, and I would not think to pay you for it even if I did. Perhaps you should focus on your own work rather than stick your nose in others' affairs.

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4608_NORMAL:
Blessings to you, [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName],
I thank you for your offer of help, but I do not feel that it is necessary at this point.

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_4608_TOOLTIP: [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName] has rejected my offer of help.
EVTDESC_MNM_4609_SLOTHFUL: The horarium I helped [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName] create has worked wonders. [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSheHeCap] has bettered [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis] ways, and now works hard like a true Benedictine!
EVTDESC_MNM_4609_REGULAR: With the aid of the new horarium I helped [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] make, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName] has become a proper hard worker.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4609: [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName] is now truly one of us.

EVTDESC_MNM_8000: I shall do a pilgrimage to one of the holy sites of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith seeking enlightenment and purification.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8000: I will start making travel plans.
EVTDESC_MNM_8001: There are many places a devout [Root.Religion.GetName] might visit during a pilgrimage. They will undoubtedly all offer enlightenment but a closer location may make for a safer journey.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8001: I will go to Sarnath, where the Sanga was born.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8001: I will go to Bodh Gaya, where Buddha achieved enlightenment.
EVTOPTC_MNM_8001: I will go to the monasteries of Sanchi.
EVTDESC_MNM_8002: There are many places a devout [Root.Religion.GetName] might visit during a pilgrimage. They will undoubtedly all offer enlightenment but a closer location may make for a safer journey.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8002: I will go to the white pond of Shravanabelegola.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8002: I will travel to the mountain of Girnar.
EVTOPTC_MNM_8002: I will go to Shikarji, where twenty of the tirthankaras achieved Moksha.
EVTDESC_MNM_8003: There are many places a devout [Root.Religion.GetName] might visit during a pilgrimage. They will undoubtedly all offer enlightenment but a closer location may make for a safer journey.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8003: I will go to the eternal city of Varanasi to cleanse myself at the ghats.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8003: I will travel to the mountain of Girnar.
EVTOPTC_MNM_8003: I will seek Mathura, the birthplace of Krishna.
EVTDESC_MNM_8004: My preparations are done and the time has come to begin my pilgrimage to Sarnath. Soon I shall experience the tranquility and enlightenment of the park in which the Buddha held his first lectures.
EVTDESC_MNM_8005: My preparations are all done and it is now time to begin my pilgrimage for Bodh Gaya and the sacred Bodhi Tree.
EVTDESC_MNM_8006: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to set out for Monasteries of Sanchi.
EVTDESC_MNM_8007: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to start my pilgrimage for Shravanabelagola.
EVTDESC_MNM_8008: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to start my pilgrimage for the ancient mountains of Girnar.
EVTDESC_MNM_8009: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to set out for the forest of Madhuban and the Shikarji peaks.
EVTDESC_MNM_8010: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to set out for the land of Braj and the twin cities of Mathura and Vrindavan.
EVTDESC_MNM_8011: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to set out for the ancient city of Varanasi. Soon I shall cleanse my body in the Ganges as generations have before me.
CHRONICLE_PILGRIMAGE_TO_BODH_GAYA: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pilgrimage to Bodh Gaya.
EVTDESC_MNM_8020: It is the season of the monsoon and rain is pouring down. Roads turn to mud and crops wash away. The life of a pilgrim can sometimes be a hard and arduous one.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8020: My faith will keep me strong and safe.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8020: I regret setting out on this adventure.
EVTDESC_MNM_8021: The dry season is upon us and there is no water in sight. A pilgrim's life can sometimes harsh and unforgiving but it is clear this is taking a heavier toll on the villages I pass by than it does on me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8021: I must attempt to alleviate their suffering.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8021: Such is life in the dry season.
EVTDESC_MNM_8022: Any traveller would balk at the prospect of traversing hills and jungle but it was the shorter route. Emerging from the undergrowth however it is becoming increasingly clear that I have made a mistake. The road ahead is not necessarily as dangerous as what now lies behind, but it is quite clearly not the right road.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8022: I knew I shouldn't have trusted those locals!
EVTOPTB_MNM_8022: I should have paid better attention to their instructions.
EVTOPTC_MNM_8022: Let's explore this area and learn more about life in the jungle!
EVTDESC_MNM_8023: A large group of mounted warriors block our way. The local Raja is a man that has taken it upon himself to relieve pilgrims, merchants or other travelers of some of their wealth in order to allow them passage. Turning back is not an option, either we pay or we will have to fight these men.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8023: We must defend what is ours!
EVTDESC_MNM_8024: It has been days since we last saw a settlement and deep forests surround us on all sides. The small road we have been following has all but disappeared in the thick undergrowth. As I look up I can make out a huge creature native to this jungle on the other side.
EVTDESC_MNM_8025: Since this journey began I have come to pass through many cities and villages. Few have been as poor as the settlement that now lies before us. Men, women and children live in such poverty that it is hard to see how they can endure, and yet... These are some of the happiest people I have ever come across!
EVTOPTA_MNM_8025: I can learn much from these villagers.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8025: I will teach them about the ways of the real world!
EVTDESC_MNM_8026: A pilgrimage is as much an inner adventure as it is a journey through the physical realm. As my goal grows ever closer the people I meet and the places I see has made me reflect and re-evaluate things I thought I knew about life.
EVTDESC_MNM_8027: As we looked for a place to set up camp at the end of a long day we stumbled across a sentry. Having examined our group he decided that we are harmless pilgrims and bid us to enter the camp of his master, a rich vaishya merchant of the southern trade guilds.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8027: I must thank them for their kindness.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8027: They are only giving me what is my right.
EVTDESC_MNM_8028: Everything seems to taste foul today. Was it the local cuisine or that night spent camping in a swamp? It is hard to say for sure but something is not right with this pilgrim...
EVTOPTA_MNM_8028: A small offering and then I must continue onwards.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8028: It is time to rest and heal.
EVTDESC_MNM_8029: You come across a thriving city in the middle of a dry upland. The secret of their prosperity seems to be huge water tanks, built and maintained by the local Raja. A separate reservoir is also under construction to allow the city to grow even bigger. You stop to admire this feat of engineering and cannot help wondering how much a similar construction could benefit [Root.Capital.GetName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_8029: I must learn more about these reservoirs.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8029: Such a futile endeavor, rain falls where it wills.
EVTDESC_MNM_8030: In the middle of a small village stands an unusually large pipal tree. The villagers have built a platform of grass and mud around its center, this is clearly a place for spiritual reflection and discussion.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8030: I must stay and learn what these people can teach me.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8030: I have no time to lose.
EVTDESC_MNM_8031: After a trek of many days through unfamiliar lands I now stand before an unfamiliar but dazzingly splendid city. Houses of rich and poor alike are made of stone and on the central hilltop a citadel looks out over massive water reservoirs to keep the inhabitants supplied with water at all times.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8031: Let us rest and enjoy city life!
EVTOPTB_MNM_8031: City life is an unnecessary diversion.
EVTDESC_MNM_8034: Following an audience with the local Raja you spend the rest of the day exploring the city. Its central position along a major trade route attracts travelers from all over the region. Among the many travelers you meet a [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetManWoman] entirely after your own mind. Your meeting does not last long but as you part your new friend invites you to visit [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetHerHim] in [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetHerHis] native [home_of_new_friend.GetName].
EVTDESC_MNM_8034_common_origin: Following an audience with the local Raja you spend the rest of the day exploring the city. Its central position along a major trade route attracts travelers from all over the region. Among the many travelers you unexpectedly meet an old acquaintance from home.  [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetName] is also on the road and you use this opportunity to get to know each other better. You find that [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe] is a [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetManWoman] entirely after your own mind and as you part you promise to see each other again in [home_of_new_friend.GetName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_8034: I have made a new friend!
EVTDESC_MNM_8035: As I entered the city I was quickly invited to the citadel of the local Raja. Entering the audience chamber another visitor storms in demanding to know why I was given this right to enter before [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetHerHim]. The Raja manages to calm the situation somewhat but as [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe] leaves [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe] swears that I will pay for this slight.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8035: It would seem I have made a new enemy.
EVTDESC_MNM_8035_common_origin: As I entered the city I was quickly invited to the citadel of the local Raja. Entering the audience chamber another visitor storms in demanding to know why I was given this right to enter before [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetHerHim]. The Raja manages to calm the situation somewhat but as [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe] leaves he swears that I will pay for this slight.
EVTDESC_MNM_8036: Spending time and money in a city is a good way to make new acquaintances. I cannot help however this has been a day wasted on my journey.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8036: It is time we continue towards our goal.
EVTDESC_MNM_8037: It has been months since I left my home behind. I cannot help but wonder how my house and family fares without me. Surely I arranged things as well as possible before I left however, who could I trust if not friends and family?
EVTOPTA_MNM_8037: I am sure everything is fine.
EVTOPTB_MNM_8037: I cannot let go of these thoughts...
EVTDESC_MNM_8050: A short journey from the holy city of Varanasi lies Sarnath. This is the park in which Buddha gave his first sermons, setting the wheel of the Dharma in motion, telling his followers of the four noble truths and founding the Sangha itself. Today the park is home to the imposing Dhamek Stupa and over a thousand priests and monks.\n\nThis is one of the most bustling centers of Buddhist teachings in India and one of the sites named by the Buddha himself as a worthy pilgrimage.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8050: I must seek the middle way.
EVTDESC_MNM_8051: You have finally arrived in Bodh Gaya, by many considered the seat of Buddhism. It was here that Buddha once sat under the tree of enlightenment, meditating on the mysteries of the universe. Over the centuries rulers and influentials both in India and further away have contributed to a great number of temples, monasteries and shrines at this post. To this day the monks of Bodh Gaya has kept a giant Bodhi Tree alive here, a huge pipal right next to the 'Diamond Throne' that a ruler of another age built to commemorate the event.\n\nAs you approach the blue tiled walls of the massive Mahabodhi temple you reflect on how different this site must be from when Buddha himself came here. At that point he was not unlike yourself, a simple ascetic seeking enlightenment.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8051: I too seek to be enlightened.
EVTDESC_MNM_8052: You have finally arrived in Sanchi, one of the oldest centers of Buddhist worship in the world. Legend has it the original Stupa here was constructed by Emperor Ashoka at the insistence of his Vidishan queen Devi. Ever since Buddhists have been coming here to seek out the serenely secluded environment, and over hundreds of years more temples, stupas and monasteries have sprung up in this ideal place for monastic life.\n\nAs you approach the elaborate Torana of the ancient Great Stupa of Ashoka you reflect on the generations of faithful that have walked this way before you as well as on the fate of Sariputra and Mahamoggalana whose relics lie within.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8052: As is fitting for a disciple of Buddha.
EVTDESC_MNM_8053: You have finally arrived in Shravanabelagola, the white pond of the Shravana. For centuries great monks and Sravakas have meditated here on the hills of Chandragiri and Vindhyagiri, among them even great kings and emperors. As you approach the main pond you reflect on the faith of Bahubali whose atonement for his sins and sublimation into godhood is commemorated here by a 57 feet statue in his likeness. Shravanabelagola is the site of many Jain mathas and temples and is the site where some of the holiest scriptures are kept.\n\nFortunately you have arrived in time for the Mahamastakabhisheka ceremony and get to watch as the statue of Bahubali is bathed and anointed and sprinkled with powders of Sandalwood and Vermilion.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8053: It is time I proceed to the temples and mathas of this place.
EVTDESC_MNM_8054: You have arrived in the temple district of Taleti at the foot of Girnar. A long set of stairs will take you up the sacred mountain to see the shrines and temples. It was here that Krishna was once confined by his mother and where he tricked Kalayavana to meet the inflaming ire of the sleeping Muchukunda.\n\nAs you reach the Bhavnat shrine you observe the hundreds of naked Sadhus making their offerings to Shiva and bathing themselves in the tank of the temple. The entire place is resounding with sounds and music and according to some Shiva himself is near.
EVTDESC_MNM_8055: Having crossed the Madhuban forest, you have finally reached the foot of the Parasnath hills and the pilgrimage of Shikarji. On these mountain peaks 20 out of the 24 tirthankaras achieved moksha through meditation making this one of the holiest of places in the world. Their ascent to Nirvana has left a permanent mark on this place, and during your climb upwards to the sacred peaks you pass the small marble tonks left to commemorate each and every one of them.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8055: It is time to begin my ascent.
EVTDESC_MNM_8056: You have finally arrived at the heart of Braj, in Mathura, the place where lord Krishna was once born. It is said the first temple constructed at this ancient site was built by Vajranabha, the great-grandson of Krishna himself. Since then the devoted have travelled to this place to give their offerings and see this most holy of Hindu places. Today thousands of pilgrims come here, and to the nearby Vrindavan where Krishna spent his youth, every year to circumambulate Govardhana and the other temples.
EVTDESC_MNM_8057: At the confluence of the Varuna and the Assi lies one of the oldest cities of India. Known by names such as Varanasi, Kasi or Banaras this is also one of the holiest places in the world. For thousands of years pilgrims have visited the hundreds of temples and the many ghats that lead into the holy river Ganges. They have sought enlightenment and purification or in some cases, to die in this place where salvation is guaranteed.\n\nEager to perform your own cleansing you approach the Dashashwamedh Ghats, a set of stairs said to have been created to welcome Shiva by lord Brahma millennia ago, you reflect on Ganges, Krishna and the cycle of rebirth.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8057: I believe it is time for a bath!
EVTDESC_MNM_8061: This place is invigorating to the mind. Being able to engage with so many great minds of religion and theology has stimulated my understanding and willingness to explore the finer points of the faith. Hours and even days are lost in conversation with Sadhus, Priests and Monks about the deeper meaning of various passages in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
EVTOPTB_MNM_8061: Enlightenment can only be achieved through Meditation.
EVTDESC_MNM_8062: Purification and Enlightenment have never before felt as tangible as in this place. Pilgrims are circumambulating shrines, sadhus are conveying their blessings upon the faithful and monks and gurus meditate together. I join those in worship that for thousands of years have attended this place and others like it. This is a profound experience unlike anything I have ever felt before.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8062: I cannot wait to tell others about this!
EVTDESC_MNM_8063: Many pilgrims have stories of the experiences from their journeys and the great enlightenment or purification achieved in at the destination. I expected much more than I have found here. The place is certainly full of monks, sadhus, priests and holy men but neither circumambulation, meditation or cleansing has left me with anything but an empty feeling of doubt.
EVTDESC_MNM_8064: Eager to engage other in discussion I rushed right ahead to the centers of learning. I can tell the ideas and thoughts I have had over the years have made an impression on others here. Even great minds, scholars and sadhus alike seem taken by my reasoning and my home-grown theological arguments.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8064: It is but a small contribution to the knowledge of mankind.
EVTDESC_MNM_8065: There are people here from every corner of the world. Though we are united in reverence of this holy place their languages, clothes and even the people themselves seem exotic and different. Meeting and conversing with strangers is in itself an experience that will impact me more than the religious aspects of this pilgrimage itself.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8065: I must talk to them all!
EVTOPTB_MNM_8065: I must observe and learn about the peoples of this world.
EVTDESC_MNM_8066: A pilgrimage can be undertaken for many reasons. For some it is a way to atone for past sins, for others a way to repay the universe for what they have. To many the pilgrimage is a great and rejuvenating journey. I feel convinced this is so, for my journey has left me invigorated in a way I have never experienced before.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8066: Perhaps the time has come to begin the journey home?
EVTDESC_MNM_8067: Like me many others have come here to seek the spiritual experience of their life. To some this is draining but I find it to be quite invigorating. With the appetite of the mind sated perhaps it is time to enjoy myself?
EVTOPTB_MNM_8067: I must exercise control of the body as well as the mind.
EVTDESC_MNM_8068: A holy place such as this has always attracted mystics, sadhus and yogis. After completing my cleansing bath in the Ganges and started to climb back up the ghats I met an old wrinkled man who bestowed his blessing upon me. Ever since I have felt more powerful and invigorated.
EVTDESC_MNM_8068_b: A holy place such as this has always attracted mystics, sadhus and yogis. Knowing that their blessings are said to have great power I could not help but seek out one who is said to have a way to heal the sick. I spent some time with this man and ate and drank a variety of things according to his instructions. For the most part it is hard to remember what happened but it appears I slept for several days before leaving him with a feeling of invigoration I have not felt for a long time.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8068: I have been healed by a higher power!
EVTOPTB_MNM_8068: This man was truly a great healer.
EVTOPTC_MNM_8068: I must learn more about this mystery!
EVTDESC_MNM_8070: Surrounded by pilgrims, temples and shrines it is hard not to be taken aback by the great faith of the masses. Their reverence really is quite endearing. Should I reveal my true identity to them and receive their open adoration and worship? What better place to do this than here, a destination they have all sought out to experience my favor...
EVTOPTA_MNM_8070: Let them see me for who I truly am!
EVTOPTB_MNM_8070: They could not bear to receive me in full glory, for now I must spare them.
EVTDESC_MNM_8071: Enrichment of the spirit is all well and good but perhaps it is now time to see what the temporal world has to offer. Surely there is both food, good company and good drink to be had nearby? Now that I am here I must sate my appetite for the local delicacies.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8071: Let us see what this place truly has to offer...
EVTOPTB_MNM_8071: I must strive to overcome the crass demands of flesh and bone.
EVTDESC_MNM_8072: The adoration I thought I saw was clearly nothing but blind stupidity! These pilgrims are fools and do not know the full extent of my power. The lucky ones may never find out but those that ejected me from the temple grounds will curse this day.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8072: They do not realize what they have awoken...
EVTDESC_MNM_8091: I am home at last after my journey. I have learnt new things, experienced the greatness of the faith and met with interesting people. While it is good to be home I am confident that I will always remember this trip very fondly.
EVTDESC_MNM_8092: I am home at last after a long journey. While it is said that a pilgrimage can rejuvenate the soul and body I cannot claim it did for me. On the whole this has been a most disappointing experience.
EVTDESC_MNM_8093: I am finally home after a long and tiring journey. Though the insolent rats did not recognize me or pay proper homage, it was still an enlightening experience. Now there is plenty of time to prepare their day of reckoning.
EVTOPTA_MNM_8093: They will pay for their shortsightedness.
indian_pilgrim_desc: The character has completed a great pilgrimage.
indian_pilgrimage_desc: Go on a Pilgrimage to one of the holy places of India.
quest_monastic_order_pilgrimage_christia: You must perform a holy pilgrimage to atone for your sins and to reflect upon the greatness of God. This spiritual journey will help you reflect upon yourself and increase your standing with the order.
To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'Go on a Pilgrimage'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete a pilgrimage to one of the holy cities of Christianity.
quest_indian_monastic_order_pilgrimage_d: You must perform a holy pilgrimage to cleanse yourself and to strive to enlightenment.
quest_indian_monastic_order_pilgrimage_t: To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'Go on Pilgrimage'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete a pilgrimage to one a holy site.
EVTDESC_MNM_8099:
[Root.GetMOGreeting] [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are glad to hear that you have performed a pilgrimage in the name of our faith.
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPT_MNM_8099: It was the journey of a lifetime.

ASK_TO_JOIN_AMBITION_INTERACTION_DESC: Ask a character to join their scheme to [Recipient.GetPlot].
ASK_TO_JOIN_AMBITION_INTERACTION_LONG_DE: Characters who back a plot can be called to war by the plot leader. You will very likely to help the plot leader achieve their goal, and will start getting events that move the plot forward.
ASK_TO_JOIN_AMBITION_INTERACTION_DECLINE: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declined to let §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W join §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]'s§W plot to [Recipient.GetPlot].
ASK_TO_JOIN_AMBITION_INTERACTION_LETTER: We would like to join your plot to [Recipient.GetPlot]
EVTDESC535: I was remiss not to invite you in the first place. You may indeed join my plot to [From.GetPlot].
EVTDESC536: Why would I want the help of the likes of you with my plot to [From.GetPlot]?
TT_PLOT_GAIN_VASSAL_TITLE_COUNTY_IN_CAPI: Is a County in the held capital Duchy of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
TT_PLOT_GAIN_VASSAL_TITLE_DUCHY_ALL_DJ_C: Is a Duchy with no de jure County under its holder\n
TT_PLOT_GAIN_VASSAL_TITLE_DUKE_COUNTY_OU: Is a County held by a Duke whom is not its de jure liege\n
IS_WILLING_TO_JOIN_COURT_IF_BRIBED: §YMight be convinced to join our Court by a bag of gold§!
EMBARK_UNITS_DRO: Choosing the embark option will load as many of the selected units onto ships as possible.
devil_worshipers_invite_disciple_of_devi: A disciple of [Root.GetDWDevil] will soon appear at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_7824: Finally, my devout servant has arrived. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetBestName] is a most accomplished [From.GetDWMagician] and well-versed in the hallowed secrets of [From.GetDWDarkMagic]. With [From.GetHerHim] at my side, I shall continue to carry out the work of the great [Root.GetDWDevil].
devil_worshipers_invite_disciple_of_devi: As the [Root.GetSocietyRank] of [Root.Society.GetName], §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can invite a disciple of [Root.GetDWDevil] to join [Root.GetHerHis] court.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4400_NOGOD: I will double my efforts from now on!
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_CYNICAL: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. While I was skeptical at first, I have found much truth in the words of [Root.GetMOSaint]. This is truly a path worth treading. I am a doubter no more.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_GLUTTONOUS: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. As I have followed this holy path, I have reigned in my bodily desires for food and other physical excesses.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_GREEDY: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. As I have followed this holy path, I have felt my need for material goods diminish. I no longer crave excess and indulgences.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_SLOTHFUL: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Following in the footsteps of [Root.GetMOSaint] has motivated me to be more active and spend my time on matters of greater importance than naps and games.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_ENVIOUS: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. As I have striven to be more like [Root.GetMOSaint] I have also realized that I rarely envy the fortune of others anymore.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_WROTH: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. I used to get angered by the smallest things, but lately I have striven to be more like [Root.GetMOSaint] and nowadays I barely notice that which used to annoy me.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_PROUD: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. In my attempts to become more like [Root.GetMOSaint], I have striven to think less of myself and more of others. The sense of pride which once shackled me is gone.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_DECEITFUL: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Once, I used lies and deceit to get out of trouble and fulfill my desires. Following the path of [Root.GetMOSaint] has taught me better.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_CRUEL: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Studying the works and life of [Root.GetMOSaint] has made me realize the error of my ways. I have promised myself to treat others with less ire and more compassion.
EVTDESC_4400_ADD_HUMBLE: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. As I have followed this holy path, I have noticed that my sense of ego and need for recognition has all but vanished. This change has helped me focus on the things which really matter.
EVTDESC_4400_ADD_CHARITABLE: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Since I joined [Root.Society.GetName] I have practiced charity, yet it was not until today I realized I was truly glad to let go of my personal possessions. Helping those in need is truly fulfilling.
EVTDESC_4400_ADD_CHASTE: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Abstaining from my bodily desires has allowed me to connect with people on a much deeper level. I also find that my mind is clearer and more peaceful than it has ever been before.
EVTDESC_4400_ADD_KIND: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Following in the footsteps of [Root.GetMOSaint], I have realized the value of kindness. Every display of compassion brings us closer to a purer, gentler and holier world.
EVTDESC_4400_ADD_TEMPERATE: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. In my quest to live like [Root.GetMOSaint] I have avoided indulgences and impulsive actions. Each time I have been tested, my self-control has grown, and now I resist most desires with an ease I have never experienced previously.
EVTDESC_4400_ADD_HONEST: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. On this holy path I have discovered the value of being true, to myself as well as others. Once I would lie to hide my sin and shame, however, I no longer feel I have anything to hide.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_AMBITIOUS: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. It took time and effort, but finally studying the life of [Root.GetMOSaint] has shown me the error of my ways. I will no longer strive to obtain personal glory  I live to serve [Root.Society.GetName].
EVTDESC_4400_ADD_CONTENT: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. By following this holy path I have shed my material and prideful desires, one by one. Now I am truly content with my place in this world and no longer crave more.
EVTDESC_4400_ADD_PATIENT: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. By studying the life of [Root.GetMOSaint], I have found the value of patience and acceptance. This realization has granted me the peace of mind I never thought I would have.
EVTDESC_4400_ADD_DILIGENT: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. I no longer feel the need to serve my own desires  I would much rather labor to make this world a better place for everyone in it. In my work I have found a true connection to the divine.
doing_penance_desc: This character has secluded themselves to contemplate their sins and deepen their connection to God.
EVTOPTB_MNM_4405_tt_fail: failing terribly to overcome the vice.\n
in_meditation_desc: This character has secluded themselves to meditate on the truths of their life and the universe.
EVTDESC_4405_LUSTFUL: During my time [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation] I have spent many long hours contemplating my carnal desires. Despite my attempts to stay true to [Root.GetMOCode], I can never seem to restrict myself around [Root.GetMenWomenPreference]! As I sit here in solitude, ignoring that relentless heat in the pit of my stomach is getting harder and harder...
EVTOPTA_4405_LUSTFUL: If I find a [Root.GetManWomanPreference] to quench my lust with, I can focus afterwards.
EVTOPTB_4405_LUSTFUL: I swear, I will not lie with a [Root.GetManWomanPreference] for at least three years!
EVTDESC_4406_LUSTFUL_A: I waited until midnight before I left my chambers and hurried towards the quarters of [holy_seclusion_lover.GetTitledFirstName]. [holy_seclusion_lover.GetSheHeCap] greeted me with the sweetest of smiles and in [holy_seclusion_lover.GetHerHis] arms, all of my wishes were fulfilled. When I returned to my chambers some hours later, the [Root.Location.GetHolding] was still deserted.
EVTDESC_4406_LUSTFUL_B: I waited until midnight before I left my chambers and hurried towards the servants' quarters. There I found a [Root.GetManWomanPreference] with the sweetest of smiles that told me all of my wishes would be fulfilled. When I returned to my chambers some hours later, the [Root.Location.GetHolding] was still deserted.
EVTDESC_4407_LUSTFUL: I waited until midnight before I left my seclusion and ventured out in the [Root.Location.GetHolding] to find a willing lover. I visited the chambers of the [Root.GetMenWomenPreference] I had shared a bed with before, but all of them were either asleep or uninterested. As morning approached I returned to my lonely bed, where I spent some time with a fantasy before drifting off to sleep...
EVTOPTA_4407_LUSTFUL: Well, that was a futile effort.
EVTDESC_4408_LUSTFUL: At first, every day I went without a [Root.GetManWomanPreference]'s touch felt like torture. At night it was all I dreamed about and during the day I could hardly think about anything else. But then, somehow, it got easier. I became more comfortable in my solitude and adhering to [Root.GetMOCode] does not feel as impossible as it once did.
EVTOPTA_4408_LUSTFUL: Now, I know my own strength. Mind over body.
promise_of_celibacy_desc: This character has promised to remain celibate for three years.
rampant_sinner_christian_desc: This character simply cannot help but act shamefully. Even as they attempted to do penance, they fell to sin.
rampant_sinner_dharmic_desc: This character simply cannot help but act shamefully. Even as they secluded themselves to meditate, they fell to sin.
EVTDESC_4409_LUSTFUL: I tried to ignore the thoughts, but it was impossible! In the end, I could not take it anymore, and snuck out one evening to visit the local brothel.
