Afterwards, I returned to my chambers, thinking that was the end of it. However, it turns out that someone saw me, and now everyone knows!
EVTOPTA_4409_LUSTFUL: I must learn to control this!
EVTDESC_4405_GLUTTONOUS: I know that [Root.GetMOSaint] was a paragon of temperance, however I struggle to control my appetite. While [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation], I am supposed to eat very simple food in small portions, but I am growing weary. I cannot concentrate when my stomach rumbles like this!
EVTOPTA_4405_GLUTTONOUS: After a little treat I shall return to my duties with doubled focus!
EVTOPTB_4405_GLUTTONOUS: I shall defeat my desires with a fast!
EVTDESC_4406_GLUTTONOUS: I waited until midnight before I made my way to the kitchens. I found some of my favorite treats in one of the pantries. After many days on the most dreary of diets, they tasted like the most delicious food I had ever eaten! My appetite is satiated for now and no one is the wiser.
EVTOPTA_4406_GLUTTONOUS: That was exactly what I needed.
EVTDESC_4407_GLUTTONOUS: After midnight I ventured to the kitchens to find something to still my hunger. I quickly found my favorite treats and proceeded to shove handfuls into my mouth. However, my binge was interrupted as a servant entered the room. As I hid in the pantry, the shame washed over me, and I could not eat anything else.
EVTDESC_4408_GLUTTONOUS: During the first days of my fast, I felt as if I was going to die. As I woke on the third day, however, I was surprised by how clear my mind was and how little the lack of sustenance bothered me. The next day when I broke my fast and returned to my simple diet, it was more than enough to satisfy me.
EVTOPTA_4408_GLUTTONOUS: I am stronger than I thought.
EVTDESC_4409_GLUTTONOUS: The first day of the fast went reasonably well, but on the second one, I woke up ravenous. I thought I would die! I hurried to the kitchen, ignoring the servants' stares. Once there I proceeded to shove anything edible I could find into my mouth, not caring who saw me. Now everyone knows about my failure!
EVTOPTA_4409_GLUTTONOUS: How could I shame myself so?
EVTDESC_4405_GREEDY: My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] always talks about the importance of charity, and I do give alms to the poor on a regular basis. However, I often feel reluctant when doing so, and it brings me shame. While [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation], I have had plenty of time to think about this. Perhaps I should strive to be more charitable?
EVTOPTA_4405_GREEDY: I still give, don't I? Surely that must be enough.
EVTOPTB_4405_GREEDY: I don't give enough. I will make another donation!
EVTDESC_4406_GREEDY: After coming to the realization that I am already doing so much for my subjects as their [Root.GetTitle], I have been able to put the thought about charity out of my mind. It does not distract me any longer.
EVTOPTA_4406_GREEDY: I am a good [Root.GetReligiousPerson], on the whole.
EVTDESC_4407_GREEDY: I thought I was happy with my decision, but then the guilt came creeping. I should not crave money and possessions in this way. These feelings are not in accordance with [Root.GetMOCode], but I cannot help myself.
EVTOPTA_4407_GREEDY: I am a good [Root.GetReligiousPerson], am I not? Surely?
EVTDESC_4408_GREEDY: I ordered one of my most trusted servants to take a substantial sum of money from my personal treasury and bring it to the local [Root.GetMOBuilding]. Strangely enough, when [Root.GetSheHe] left, I felt... relief. Perhaps this is the first step towards freeing myself of the desire for material possessions?
EVTOPTA_4408_GREEDY: The money will come to good use, I am sure.
EVTOPTA_4409_GREEDY: I wish I wouldn't have acted so rashly...
EVTDESC_4405_SLOTHFUL: For a true follower of [Root.GetMOCode], the importance of saying [Root.GetPrayers] and studying [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]  at least my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] says so. However, while [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation] for days on end, I struggle to stay focused. Sometimes I feel that I am just sitting here, doing nothing. If I closed my eyes for just a moment... surely that would not be so bad?
EVTOPTA_4405_SLOTHFUL: A little nap would do me good.
EVTOPTB_4405_SLOTHFUL: If I am getting tired, I must double my efforts!
EVTDESC_4406_SLOTHFUL: I was so immensely bored by my [Root.GetPrayers] and [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], but after a little nap my duties did not feel quite so impossible anymore. I cannot expect myself to become like [Root.GetMOSaint] overnight. One step at a time, I say!
EVTDESC_4407_SLOTHFUL: Waking up was an unpleasant experience, to say the least. I had sunk to the floor and also managed to get drool all over the chest of my garb. When I sluggishly pushed myself back to seated, I was aghast to realize that the room was pitch black! It was in the middle of the night and every single candle had burned out.
EVTOPTA_4407_SLOTHFUL: It was only supposed to be a little nap!
EVTDESC_4408_SLOTHFUL: During the first hours every minute felt like an eternity, but then it got easier. My weariness was as good as gone and a certain passage of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] grabbed my interest. I kept reading, consumed by the powerful words, and suddenly it was morning! I went to sleep with a smile upon my lips and a renewed sense of purpose.
EVTOPTA_4408_SLOTHFUL: Self-control is far greater a reward than indulgence.
EVTDESC_4409_SLOTHFUL: I do not remember falling asleep, but suddenly I realized I was sprawled across the floor. Apparently I had crashed on top of my copy of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], because once I struggled to my feet I noticed that its pages were torn and that I had ink smeared across my face. No matter how hard I tried, I could not wash it off. Surely my servants are gossiping about my failure, and soon everyone will know!
EVTOPTA_4408_TOOLTIP: Through perseverance and concentration you have managed to defeat your sinful nature and maintain seclusion.
EVTOPTA_4409_TOOLTIP: You have been betrayed by your sinful nature and broken seclusion for a time. This has shamed you in the eyes of others and greatly hampered your progress.
assassins_borrow_money_effect_tooltip: The Grand Master will get in contact with §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! about the loan.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4410: For me, the biggest challenge while [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation] is the solitude. As I sit here and reflect upon [Root.GetMOCode], thoughts enter my mind which I desperately want to share with someone, but I have barely exchanged a single word since I began my seclusion. I glance out of my window only to see [potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName] engaged in a lively conversation with some friends.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4410: I will go down there and join them, if only for a few minutes!
EVTOPTB_MNM_4410: I should stay here, alone with my thoughts.
EVTDESC_MNM_4411: While [potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName] and [potential_friend.GetHerHis] friends were surprised to see me, they were excellent company! As I stood there, surrounded by people, I could not stop talking. What was supposed to be a few minutes turned into an hour before my companions had to excuse themselves and get back to their duties.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4411: That was nice, although I know I shouldn't have.
EVTDESC_MNM_4412: This is the challenge I have been given, and I will not give up so quickly. I returned to my copy of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and continued where I had left off. During the first few pages, thoughts about the jolly friends in the courtyard kept distracting me, but after a while I found peace in my reading.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4412: Being alone is not so bad, after all.
EVTDESC_MNM_4413: I left the window and returned to my copy of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and continued where I had left off. However, my heart was not really in it, and thoughts about the jolly friends in the courtyard kept distracting me. Then my thoughts drifted to my own companions, and how they had made no attempts to get in touch for weeks...
EVTOPTA_MNM_4414: I will figure this out on my own.
EVTOPTB_MNM_4414: There is no shame in asking for help.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4414_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! interprets the passage successfully, a testament to [Root.GetHerHis] great understanding of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_4414_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! fails to make sense of the passage.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_4414_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: §Y[court_spiritual.GetTitledName]§! manages to explain the passage to §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_4414_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: §Y[court_spiritual.GetTitledName]§! is unhelpful and §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! fails to make sense of the passage.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4415: A true follower of [Root.GetMOCode] does not give up easily. I kept at it, reading the passage again and again, compared it with other holy texts and mulled over the wording for hours at end. It went slowly, but every now and then I uncovered a new piece of the puzzle, and suddenly, I saw it! Such elegance, such depth! I will carry this revelation with me until the day I die.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4415_A: The wisdom of [Root.GetMOGod] is infinite and indisputable.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4415_B: The wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is infinite and indisputable.
EVTDESC_MNM_4416: In my obstinacy, I refused to ask for help. Surely I, the [Root.GetTitle], would know enough of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to understand the meaning of this passage! Hour upon hour I sat staring at the words, trying to make sense of them, but each interpretation I could think of felt lackluster and hollow...
EVTOPTA_MNM_4416_A: The wisdom of [Root.GetMOGod] is beyond my understanding.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4416_B: The wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is beyond my understanding.
EVTDESC_MNM_4417: Being proud is not in accordance with [Root.GetMOCode], so I decided to ask [court_spiritual.GetJobTitle] [court_spiritual.GetFirstName] for help. [court_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] was happily surprised by my request and together we proceeded to unravel the wordings of the passage. With [court_spiritual.GetFirstName]'s patient guidance, I managed to make sense of it at the end!
EVTDESC_MNM_4418: I immediately sought out [court_spiritual.GetJobTitle] [court_spiritual.GetFirstName] to request [court_spiritual.GetHerHis] aid. I seemed to have caught [court_spiritual.GetHerHim] at a bad time, however, for [court_spiritual.GetSheHe] agreed with some discernible reluctance. [court_spiritual.GetFirstName] had no patience with me and when I failed to keep up, I left in anger!
EVTDESC_MNM_4420: I am bent over [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], trying to make sense of an especially cryptic passage, when a faint tap on the door breaks my concentration. I call for my visitor to enter. To my surprise, little [interrupting_child.GetFirstName]'s [interrupting_child.GetFaceDescription] face peaks through the opening. "[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], why are you hiding? I miss you!"
EVTOPTA_MNM_4420: Come here, [interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon], and we shall read [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_4420_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! teaches §Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! an important lesson from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], thus doing a valuable deed according to [Root.GetMOCode].\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_4420_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! fails to teach §Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!, thus wasting time which could have been spent contemplating [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_4420: I am sorry, my [GetRootFromCompliment]. Come and sit on my lap.
EVTOPTB_MNM_4420_TOOLTIP: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes some time to comfort [Root.GetHerHis] child, delaying [Root.GetHerHis] progress somewhat.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_4420: I do not have time right now, [interrupting_child.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTC_MNM_4420_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: §Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! understands and §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can go back to [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_4420_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is insensitive and hurts §Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!, thus harming [Root.GetHerHis] progress [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation].\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4422: [interrupting_child.GetFirstName] listened attentively as I read from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. After I was done, [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] had many questions which we discussed thoroughly. While [interrupting_child.GetFirstName] is still too young to grasp the finer nuances, I do think [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] learned something important. Helping my [interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon] is truly rewarding.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4422: I am proud of you, my [interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon]!
EVTDESC_MNM_4423: I read one of my favorite passages from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to [interrupting_child.GetFirstName], although I could quickly tell [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] had no interest in the holy words. I then failed to engage my [interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon] in a conversation about the passage, so I considered myself defeated and sent [interrupting_child.GetHerHim] on [interrupting_child.GetHerHis] way.
EVTDESC_MNM_4424: I patiently explained to [interrupting_child.GetFirstName] that I was preoccupied with holy duties, and that I would return to court once they were finished. [interrupting_child.GetSheHeCap] did not understand the importance of my seclusion, most likely, although my gentle words made sure [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] was not hurt.
EVTDESC_MNM_4425: I am preoccupied with my holy studies, [interrupting_child.GetFirstName], and I want no distractions! Go and find your [other_parent.GetFatherMother] and leave me to [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]! For an uncomfortably long moment, [interrupting_child.GetFirstName] just stared at me. Then, with a loud sob, [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] turned around and ran, leaving the door ajar.
EVTDESC_4402_PENANCE:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time for contemplation. I ask of you to seclude yourself and think about your life and your actions  a sort of penance for your sins.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_4402_MEDITATION:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time for contemplation. I ask of you to seclude yourself and think about the universe and your place in it. Awareness is the first step to freedom, [Root.GetSocietyRank].

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_4403: Today, my seclusion begins. I have selected a simple chamber in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] where I will spend most of my time during the coming months. Within those bare walls, I shall do my [Root.GetPrayers], read [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and contemplate my life and actions.
monastic_order_penance_desc: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can seclude [Root.GetHerselfHimself] and contemplate their life and sins in order to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson].
monastic_order_penance_allow_tt: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not secluded [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to do penance recently.\n
monastic_order_meditation_desc: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can seclude [Root.GetHerselfHimself] and meditate upon their life and the universe to move closer towards spiritual enlightenment.
monastic_order_meditation_allow_tt: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not secluded [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to meditate recently.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4425_A: I have spent the entire day saying [Root.GetPrayers] in deep concentration. During the first hours I noticed nothing out of the ordinary, although at some point I lost track of time and entered a dreamlike state. There was nothing but the holy words passing through my lips, and they rang true as the sweetest music.
EVTDESC_MNM_4425_B: There is a bountiful well of wisdom in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. Today, I have uncovered new meanings in several passages which I have previously never given much thought. I shall take these lessons to heart and carry them with me, no matter where life takes me. Mark my words, [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is truly is a book of wonders!
EVTDESC_MNM_4425_C: Today has been a day of new insights and revelations. In my seclusion I have had plenty of time to think about my actions, my life and my place in this world. Things I had never thought about before suddenly became so clear.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4426_NOGOD: Today my awareness has truly expended.
EVTDESC_MNM_4428:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
We are pleased with your progress. During the time you spent in contemplative seclusion you have taken a great step on the path of [Root.GetMOCode]. Hereby I declare your mission completed.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_MNM_4429:
To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
I have heard some disturbing tales regarding your time in holy seclusion, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. I fear that you are not yet ready for the contemplation I expected of you. We will revisit this mission at a later date, but for the time being, I must consider this a failure.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4431:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
You have impressed us all with your noble rule and adherence to [Root.GetMOCode]. As a reward for your recent advancement to the rank of [Root.GetSocietyRank], I have sent you one of [Root.GetMOSaint]'s finger bones. Protect this holy relic with your life.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
fingerbone_of_saint_desc: This little bone is said to have come from a great saint.
muni_desc: This man has taken the Mahavrata vows and lives a life of asceticism, thus making him unable to marry or inherit.
aryika_desc: This woman has taken the Mahavrata vows and lives a life of asceticism, thus making her unable to marry or inherit.
bhikkhu_desc: This man lives a life of asceticism in accordance with the Patimokkha rules, thus making him unable to marry or inherit.
bhikkhuni_desc: This woman lives a life of asceticism in accordance with the Patimokkha rules, thus making her unable to marry or inherit.
sanyasi_desc: This man has chosen a life of simplicity and celibacy, thus making him unable to marry or inherit.
sanyasini_desc: This woman has chosen a life of simplicity and celibacy, thus making her unable to marry or inherit.
EVTDESC_MNM_9004: My [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle], [rumor_councillor.GetTitledFirstName], has brought me the most extraordinary news! Apparently [rumor_councillor.GetSheHe] has uncovered a rumor concerning an exceedingly special artifact. The specifics of [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]'s information are uncertain, but [rumor_councillor.GetSheHe] is convinced that there is a degree of truth to the tales.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9004_TT: §Y[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]§! immediately begins to search for the extraordinary artifact.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_9004_TT: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can ask one of [Root.GetHerHis] councillors to search for the extraordinary artifact.\n
relic_rumor_major_desc: This character has been reach by a rumor of an extraordinary artifact! They can send one of their councillors to search for it.
EVTDESC_MNM_9005: After the council meeting, [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName] asked me to exchange a few words in private. Apparently [rumor_councillor.GetSheHe] has uncovered a rumor concerning a rare artifact. [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName] believed there was some truth to the rumor and urged me to have a search arranged.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9005: A good idea, [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle]. You should arrange it.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9005_TT: §Y[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]§! immediately begins to search for the rare artifact.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_9005_TT: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can ask one of [Root.GetHerHis] councillors to search for the rare artifact.\n
relic_rumor_medium_desc: This character has been reached by a rumor of a rare artifact! They can send one of their councillors to search for it.
EVTDESC_MNM_9006: During this evening's council meeting, [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName] told us of a rumor [rumor_councillor.GetSheHe] had encountered. The peasants speak of an artifact hidden not far away from here. The specifics of [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]'s information are uncertain, but perhaps this would be worth investigating.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9006_TT: §Y[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]§! immediately begins to search for the artifact.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_9006_TT: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can ask one of [Root.GetHerHis] councillors to search for the artifact.\n
relic_rumor_minor_desc: This character heard a rumor concerning an artifact. They can send one of their councillors to search for it.
EVTDESC_MNM_9020: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] approached me after the council meeting to request some more diplomats to aid [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] in obtaining more information concerning the rumored artifact. While I could divert some of my envoys to this task for a time, our regular diplomatic efforts would suffer due to the neglect.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9020_TT: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§! makes significant progress in the search for the rumored artifact.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_9020: I cannot spare these important resources.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9020_TT: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§! struggles in the search for the rumored artifact.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_9021: The hunt for the rumored artifact has begun to slow down, [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] just informed me. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has some valuable and promising leads, but to investigate them the search must venture into distant, inhospitable lands. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] claims [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] needs more soldiers to attempt such a venture.
treasure_hunting_diplomats_desc: The court diplomats of this ruler are occupied with a special project and general diplomatic efforts are suffering as a consequence.
treasure_hunting_soldiers_desc: A large number of this character's soldiers are occupied with a mission in distant lands.
EVTDESC_MNM_9022: My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has sought me out with [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] concerns regarding the search for the relic. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has asked me to issue a decree allowing [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] treasure hunters to appropriate the resources and men they need from the local burghers.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9022: I cannot provoke my subjects in such a way.
EVTDESC_MNM_9023: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has uncovered several clues indicating that [spy_target.GetTitledFirstName] of [spy_title.GetName] possesses important information regarding the rumored artifact. However, [spy_target.GetSheHe] is unwilling to talk and [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] wants more spies transferring from their regular missions to target the [spy_target.GetTitle] instead.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9023: The artifact is of great importance. The spies are yours.
EVTDESC_MNM_9024: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has spent many weeks bent over ancient tomes and scrolls in search of more information regarding the rumored artifact. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims to be on the right path but apparently the progress is slow. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has asked of me to order the best scholars in [primary_title.GetName] to aid [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] efforts.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9024: The brightest minds shall be at your disposal.
treasure_hunting_stewards_desc: This character has made a decree allowing their treasure hunters to appropriate any resources required from the local burghers.
treasure_hunting_spies_desc: This character has had a large number of their spies diverted from their current missions to investigate rumors of a lost artifact.
treasure_hunting_scholars_desc: This character has ordered the brightest minds in their demesne to aid an investigation concerning a lost artifact.
EVTDESC_MNM_9025: Despite the monthly sum of gold I have set aside for the artifact investigation, [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] claims that [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] lacks the sufficient funds. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has asked me to put an additional sum to [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] disposal.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9025: I understand, [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]. You shall have the money.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9024: 'Lacks the sufficient funds'? What a wastrel!
EVTDESC_MNM_9026: One of my spies has brought me some disturbing news. Apparently [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has been putting the extra funds I gave [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] own pocket!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9026: I never should have trusted that light-fingered traitor!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9026_TT: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! reveals the crime of §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§! and is allowed to imprison [relic_hunter.GetHerHim].\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_9026: I shall show mercy but demand doubled efforts.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9026_TT: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§! is thankful and works harder from now on, speeding up the search a little.
EVTDESC_MNM_9027: For some time now, I have been worried about [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]'s progress, or rather, the lack thereof. Now my worst fears have been confirmed. As a consequence of [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]'s carelessness, an accident has occurred and a large amount of the resources and documentation was ruined!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9027: Why did I entrust the search to that [GetRootFromInsult]?!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9027_TT: There is a big setback in the search for the rumored artifact.
EVTDESC_MNM_9028: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has shared an intriguing discovery with me. During [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] search for the artifact, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] has come across the rumors of an even rarer object! If we decide to pursue this new lead instead we can still make use of some of the old research and resources, [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] tells me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9028: How exciting! We shall investigate the new lead instead.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9028_TT: The original investigation ends, but some of the progress will still be helpful in the new search.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_9028: The risks are too great. We stay on the original path.
search_for_artifact_desc: Because §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has heard of the rumors of a lost artifact [From.GetSheHe] can order [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetJobTitle], §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, to arrange a search for it.
search_for_artifact_effect_tt: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! arranges a search for the rumored artifact.\n
search_for_artifact_effect_replace_tt: The previous artifact hunter is replaced.\n
search_for_artifact_effect_progress_tt: Some of the previously made progress is lost.\n
stop_artifact_search_desc: Ask §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! to stop searching for the rumored artifact.
stop_artifact_search_effect_tt: The search for the artifact is ended. A new councilor can be appointed to lead the search as long as the rumor is still viable.
pays_for_artifact_hunt_minor_desc: This character is paying one of their councilors to search for a rumored artifact.
pays_for_artifact_hunt_medium_desc: This character is paying one of their councilors to search for artifacts.
pays_for_artifact_hunt_major_desc: This character is paying one of their councilors to search for artifacts.
EVTDESC_MNM_9009_A: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] came to me with some regrettable news. It seems like the too much has passed since we first uncovered the rumor of the artifact and now the trail has gone cold. There is no hope of finding the lost treasure and the search has been canceled.
EVTDESC_MNM_9009_B: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] can no longer fulfill [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] duty to search for the rumored artifact. I can select another councilor to replace [relic_hunter.GetHerHim].
EVTDESC_MNM_9029: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] must have cast a curse on me and my venture to recover the lost artifact, for I was just brought the most dreadful news! [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] died in an unexplainable accident while searching for the artifact.
quest_the_assassins_protege_desc: The names of some Assassins will live on forever. These extraordinary [Root.GetMenWomen] spent their entire lives studying and practicing the arts of an Assassin  disguise, infiltration, combat, and war strategies, as well as the customs and languages of their enemies. Finding and training the shining star of the next generation is a duty which has fallen upon you.
quest_the_assassins_assassination_desc: The Assassins prefer to intimidate their enemies into submission, but a threat is not threatening without any actual weight behind it. Therefore the Order assassinate their biggest enemies publicly to strike fear in the hearts of anyone who dare oppose them. Your mission is to assassinate §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, a punishment for [FromFrom.GetHerHis] crimes against the Order and the True Faith.
quest_the_assassins_assassination_toolti: To complete this mission, §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! must successfully complete a murder plot against [Root.GetHerHis] target, §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. To initiate the plot, select the diplomatic action §Y'Plot to Kill'§! by right-clicking on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
quest_the_assassins_convert_province_des: The most essential goals of the Assassins is to protect the believers of the True Faith and spread the words of Allah, Muhammad and Ali to every corner of the Earth. While even the most remote lands shall be converted one day, first we must turn to places closer to home. Your mission is to convert the county [FromFrom.GetName] to Shi'ism.
quest_the_assassins_convert_province_too: To complete this mission, the religion of the county [FromFrom.GetName] must become Shia. To convert [FromFrom.GetName], send your court Mullah to §Y'Proselytize'§! there.
quest_the_assassins_collect_debt_desc: §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! borrowed a significant amount of gold from the Order. When it was time to pay it back, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] refused. It is your mission to scare §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the point where [FromFrom.GetSheHe] will beg the Order to accept [FromFrom.GetHerHis] money.
quest_the_assassins_collect_debt_tooltip: To complete this mission, §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! must successfully complete a debt collection plot against [Root.GetHerHis] target, §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. To initiate the plot, select §Y'Collect Debt from [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'§! in the Intrigue menu.
quest_the_assassins_occupy_holding_desc: To protect the True Faith, the Assassins must sometimes make a preemptive strike against the infidels. You shall attack one of our enemies' key holdings, the [FromFrom.GetHolding] of [FromFrom.GetName] in [FromFrom.Location.County.GetName]. Your mission is completed when the [FromFrom.GetHolding] is under your control.
quest_the_assassins_occupy_holding_toolt: To complete this mission, declare war on §Y[FromFrom.Holder.Realm.Holder.GetTitledName]§! and siege the holding [FromFrom.GetName] in the county [FromFrom.Location.GetName] until it is under the control of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
quest_devil_worshipers_corrupt_priest_de: The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] are oblivious fools. §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! leads [FromFrom.GetHerHis] sheepish flock down a path which will only bring weakness and stagnation. It is up to you to give [FromFrom.GetHerHim] a new direction.
quest_devil_worshipers_corrupt_priest_to: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Corrupt [FromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle]'§! and successfully corrupt [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
quest_the_devil_worshipers_sacrifice_rul: The powerful and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] takes and gives. While we are rewarded with powers far beyond what most kings and queens ever dream of, everything has a price. [Root.GetDWDevil] demands payment in blood and souls. Offer them the life of a powerful ruler.
To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a prisoner in your dungeons who is a landed ruler and select §Y'Sacrifice to [Root.GetDWDevil]'§!.
quest_the_devil_worshipers_sacrifice_hol: The powerful and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] takes and gives. While we are rewarded with powers far beyond what most kings and queens ever dream of, everything has a price. [Root.GetDWDevil] demands payment in blood and souls. Offer them someone who pledged their life to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a prisoner in your dungeons who is a [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] or an ascetic and select §Y'Sacrifice to [Root.GetDWDevil]'§!.
quest_the_devil_worshipers_sacrifice_vir: The powerful and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] takes and gives. While we are rewarded with powers far beyond what most kings and queens ever dream of, everything has a price. [Root.GetDWDevil] demands payment in blood and souls. Offer them the life of someone who has never known love.

To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a prisoner in your dungeons who is a virgin and select §Y'Sacrifice to [Root.GetDWDevil]'§!. Children, chaste and ascetic characters are likely virgins.
quest_the_devil_worshipers_sacrifice_dwa: The powerful and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] takes and gives. While we are rewarded with powers far beyond what most kings and queens ever dream of, everything has a price. [Root.GetDWDevil] demands payment in blood and souls. Offer them the life of a dwarf.
To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a prisoner in your dungeons who is a dwarf and select §Y'Sacrifice to [Root.GetDWDevil]'§!.
quest_the_devil_worshipers_demonic_impre: The time has come for the embodied spawn of [Root.GetDWDevil] to enter this world and bring about a new era of glorious majesty. This child will lead humankind to a great future where we, the true followers, shall rule empires. The honor of choosing the unholy mother has fallen upon you.
quest_the_devil_worshipers_demonic_posse: Our almighty [Root.GetDWDevil] needs all sort of servants. For some missions, a true [Root.GetDWMagician] is needed. Other and more menial tasks, however, do not require the same kind of power and wit. Place §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! under your control and have them carry out [Root.GetDWDevil]'s wishes.
To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Demonic Possession'§! and successfully enthrall [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
quest_monastic_order_penance_tooltip: To complete this mission, select §Y'Do Penance'§! in the Intrigue Menu and successfully complete your holy seclusion.
quest_monastic_order_meditation_desc: To bring yourself closer to the divine and the final freedom, you are to seclude yourself to meditate. Spend your days reading [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], saying mantras and contemplating your actions and the universe. During this time, you must live simply and restrict your access to the outside world.
quest_monastic_order_meditation_tooltip: To complete this mission, select §Y'Begin Secluded Meditation'§! in the Intrigue Menu and successfully complete your holy seclusion.
quest_monastic_order_donate_to_charity_d: An important function of [Root.Society.GetName] is helping those in need. Our ability to perform charity is entirely dependent upon donations from the wealthy. As a powerful ruler you are expected to contribute to this cause.
quest_monastic_order_theology_focus_desc: Even though a member of [Root.Society.GetName] always keeps their spiritual development in mind, no matter where they go and what they do, there is a time in all of our lives where these matters become even more crucial. It is time for you to focus on theology.
quest_monastic_order_theology_focus_tool: To complete this mission, pick the §Y'Theology'§! focus in the Character screen.
monastic_orders_temple_construction_desc: To every member of the [Root.Society.GetName], the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] is like a second home. We come here to study, worship and say our [Root.GetPrayers]. Building a new [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] will offer a safe harbor for the local believers and act as an outpost of the Faith, an outstretched hand to those on the wrong path.
monastic_orders_temple_construction_tool: To complete this mission, build a temple holding in a county in your realm.
devil_worshipers_summon_familiar_desc: As a practitioner of [Root.GetDWDarkMagic], §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can summon a familiar of [Root.GetHerHis] choice. This supernatural guardian will grant §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! its powers by increasing [Root.GetHerHis] attributes.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7507_TOOLTIP: Now you can only await the pending birth.
EVTDESC_MNM_7511_SELF: Finally, [From.GetSheHe] is here! As I look down on the [From.GetFaceDescription], brilliant face of my little [From.GetSonDaughter], I truly feel that everything I had to do to bring this moment into existence was worth it. Only time will reveal what powers [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetDWDemon] blood has granted [From.GetHerHim], but I anticipate great things to come...
EVTDESC_MNM_7511_OTHER: Finally, [From.GetSheHe] is here! [unholy_mother.GetTitledFirstName] went into labor last night and early this morning, little [From.GetFirstName] was born. [From.GetSheHeCap] seems strong and healthy. Even though only time can reveal what powers [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetDWDemon] blood has granted [From.GetHerHim], I anticipate great things to come...
EVTDESC_MNM_7839:
[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We believe it would please [Root.GetDWDevil] greatly should [corrupt_priest_mission_target.GetTitledFirstName] fall into depravity. See to it, and you will be greatly rewarded.

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_7029:
Greetings, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

[Root.GetDWDevil] has demanded another soul to aid us on our glorious mission. Bewitch [demonic_possession_mission_target.GetTitledFirstName] and make [demonic_possession_mission_target.GetHerHim] your loyal servant  willing or not. Please see to this matter at once.

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_7110:
[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

An opportunity to strike at the foolish followers of false gods has presented itself. Their [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in [dw_desecration_target.GetName] are ignorant of the true state of the world. Tear down their idols and steal their wealth in the name of [Root.GetDWDevil]!

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_7025:
[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The great and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] has given us so much, and now it is time for us to offer them a gift in return. [Root.GetDWDevil] craves a soul to serve them in their dark realm and we have the perfect kind in mind. Capture and sacrifice a [Root.GetDWSacrifice], [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_7027:
[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The day we have long awaited is finally upon us! The time has come for the child of [Root.GetDWDevil] to enter this world and lead us to a new area of power and glory! The choice of the lucky mother falls upon you, honorable [Root.GetSocietyRank].

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4011:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

[Root.Society.GetNameCap] is in need of more funds to maintain charitable functions. We hope you are able to spare some of your worldly wealth to help us on this holy mission.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4015:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

It has been brought to our attention that you are perhaps not spending the appropriate effort on matters of theology. We would like to encourage you to set aside your worldly worries and focus on matters divine in nature.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4019:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The Order and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] cares much for the souls of our members. As such we would like to advise you to go on a pilgrimage, since you have not yet done so.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4023:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

Bringing the True Faith and salvation to others is among the holiest of duties. Therefore we ask of you to construct a new [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] in your lands so your subjects may have somewhere to say [Root.GetPrayers] and worship.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4014:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

[Root.Society.GetNameCap] has received your graciously donated gift. You have our thanks, in addition to those whose lives will be greatly approved by your charity.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4018:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

We are happy to hear that you have devoted your time to matters of theology. May the coming years of devoted study bless you with new insights.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
request_to_rank_up_within_society_desc: Send a letter to the leader of [Root.Society.GetName], requesting to rank up.
must_be_allowed_to_rank_up_tooltip: Must have been at the §Y[Root.GetSocietyRank]§! rank for at least three years\n
must_not_have_sent_request_already_toolt: Must NOT already be awaiting word for this request\n
EVTDESC_MNM_10001_A:
Honored [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I hereby grant you permission to advance to the next rank within [Root.Society.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
SOCIETY_RANK_TRIGGER_NOT: Does not have a society rank $COMPARISON$ $RANK|Y$ in $SOCIETY|Y$ society
SOCIETY_RANK_TRIGGER: Has a society rank $COMPARISON$ $RANK|Y$ in $SOCIETY|Y$ society
ALLY_ORDER_BUTTON_NO_ALLIES: §RYou have no allies to give order to§!
ATTACH_TO_UNIT_ALLY_ORDER_BUTTON: Order allied army to attach to this army
ATTACH_TO_UNIT_ALLY_ORDER_ENTRY: Order $NAME|Y$ to attach to this army
TAKE_PROVINCE_ALLY_ORDER_BUTTON: Order allied army to siege this county
FRIENDLY_TAKE_PROVINCE_ALLY_ORDER_BUTTON: §RCan not order allies to siege this county§!
DAYS_IN_SOCIETY_TRIGGER_NOT: Has not been a member of $SOCIETY|Y$ $COMPARISON$ $DAYS|Y$ days
DAYS_IN_SOCIETY_TRIGGER: Has been a member of $SOCIETY|Y$ $COMPARISON$ $DAYS|Y$ days
alert_councillor_no_job_delayed: The following councillors are currently not on a job:\n$LIST$\n§GClick to go to Court View§!
NO_VALID_SOCIETY: There are no known §YSocieties§! which you can join.
PLAYER_SOCIETY_RANK: You have obtained the rank of $RANK|Y$ which you have held since $DATE|Y$.
SOCIETY_HEIR_INSTANT: This is the expected next leader of $SOCIETY|Y$
society_show_members_secret: §RYou need to be a member of§! $SOCIETY|Y$ §Rto see a list of all its current members§!
MTTH_MULTIPLE_CONDITIONS_TRUE: All of these must be true
SOCIETY_SHOW_INTEREST_COOLDOWN: §R$NAME$ cannot Show Interest in a Society until $DATE$§!
ALREADY_IN_A_SOCIETY: §RAlready a Member of a different Society§!
SOCIETIES_VIEW_MEMBER_SCORE_DESC: During Society Succession, the Member with the highest §YMember Score§! will become the new Leader.
SIEGE_FOCUS_ALLY_ORDER_ENTRY: Order $NAME|Y$ to focus on sieging enemy counties
prisoner_dark_sacrifice_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of your prisoners to Sacrifice them to [Root.GetDWDevil], in order to gain §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Certain prisoners, and mission targets, will please [Root.Society.GetName] more. Be aware that too many Sacrifices may draw attention to your society.
devil_worshipers_summon_familiar_power_d: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait to Summon a Familiar, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
devil_worshipers_dark_divorce_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portrait of your spouse in order to annul your marriage, in the name of [Root.GetDWDevil], in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Your spouse will be no more.
devil_worshipers_dark_healing_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order to perform a dark ritual to heal yourself, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
devil_worshipers_invite_disciple_of_devi: Enables the decision to invite a member of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§! to join you at your court, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
DW_prolong_life_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of your children in an attempt to steal their life force, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
the_devil_worshipers_tainted_touch_power: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of your vassals, courtiers, and rivals, in an attempt to curse them with bad health and disease, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
unlockable_DW_powers_at_rank_2: Next rank will unlock: §YSummon Familiar§!, §YTainted Touch§!, and §YDemonic Possession§!
unlockable_DW_powers_at_rank_3: Next rank will unlock: §YDark Divorce§! and §YDark Healing§!
unlockable_DW_powers_at_rank_4: Next rank will unlock: §YInvite Disciple§! and §YAbsorb Lifeforce§!
assassins_borrow_money_power_desc: Enables the decision to borrow money of the Order.
assassins_donate_power_desc: Enables the decision to donate money to §YThe Assassins§!, to gain §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
assassins_raise_ships_power_desc: Enables the decision to raise special ships, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
assassins_raise_troops_power_desc: Enables the decision to raise special troops, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
assassins_scare_ruler_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of other rulers in order to intimidate them into owing you a favor.
assassins_mark_for_death_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of an adult character in order to mark them for assassination, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. This will encourage other members of §YThe Assassins§! to go after your mark.
EVTDESC_3398_BLEND_IN:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

As secret practitioners of our religion we are under constant scrutiny. We ask that you spend some time trying to blend into the religious community of your realm, in order to distract any harmful forces discovering our true beliefs.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
quest_secret_religions_conduct_secret_ce: To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! your own portrait and choose §YPrepare Secret Ceremony§!.
secret_religions_conduct_secret_ceremony: As a secret worshiper of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], you may prepare a small ceremony to honor your true religion.
secret_religions_blend_in_desc: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can make an effort to blend into the religious society of the realm in order to keep [Root.GetHerHis] society safely hidden.
quest_secret_religions_societies_blend_i: Has not recently attempted this mission
attempting_to_blend_in_desc: This character is currently making an effort to fit into the religious community at court.
blend_in_modifier_tooltip: Character is in the same society as you are.
EVTDESC_3399: Starting today, I shall dedicate myself to convincing the court of my deep devoutness, in the name of the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] faith and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. My allies in [This.Society.GetName] will understand. This is a necessary step if I am to ever convince my people to see the path I, nay, [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] has actually laid out before them. They will thank me later.
EVTDESC_MNM_3202: My advisors inform me that [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName] has been overheard questioning my loyalty to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. When I summon [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHim], [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] is apologetic, but a raised eyebrow tells of [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] doubt. "It's just a rumor, my [Root.GetLordLady]... You are not overly interested in [Root.GetReligiousRite], but you could surely quote any passage of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] without hesitation...?"
EVTOPTB_MNM_3202: You should not be questioning me. I am your [Root.GetTitle]!
EVTOPTC_MNM_3202: Is there any way I can make you think otherwise, [stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]...?
EVTDESC_MNM_3204: As I began reciting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]'s eyes widened. I intentionally focused on what I believed to be [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] favorite passage, speaking clearly to [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] interests as a [stubborn_courtier.GetEducationRole]. My gambit seems to have paid off because the deep bow [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] bestowed upon me was nothing short of embarrassment and an eagerness to make up for [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] obvious blunder.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3204: That about do it for you, [stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]?
EVTDESC_MNM_3205: As I rack my brain for the appropriate lines to shove triumphantly in [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]'s face, my palms grow sweaty.\n"Ezekiel 25:17! I will carry out great vengeance on them..." I begin. Then a slow panic begins to rise within my chest. [stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName] frowns. \n"No, wait, that doesn't seem right. That's not..." I mumble as [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] shakes [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] head and with a roll of [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] eyes walks away, leaving me alone with my failure. By the damnation of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], how did I get this so wrong?
EVTOPTA_MNM_3205: I've made a fool of myself.
EVTDESC_MNM_3206: I make it clear to [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName] that it seems almost heretical for someone supposedly well-versed in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to display such a poor understanding of the relationship between a ruler and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].\n[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName] clearly did not expect to have their own religious understanding challenged, and I try not to smile to myself as [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] sputters an apology. As [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] prepares to leave, I remind [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHim] that many questions can be dangerous to ask.
EVTDESC_MNM_3207: My voice must not have sounded as threatening as I believed it to. When I told [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledFirstName] how it could be dangerous to ask the wrong questions, [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] only laughed. As I followed up with stories of other unfortunate souls who had questioned their liege's faith, [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] grin remained. When [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] finally departed, it was with an even more disconcerting sentence. "I know exactly where my soul belongs, but I am unsure about yours."
EVTOPTA_MNM_3207: No, wait! I know lines of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]!
EVTDESC_MNM_3251:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

We are proud to hear of your valiant efforts to remain an undetected member of [This.Society.GetName]. We are honored to count you as one of our own.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_3252:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

We are sorry to hear of your flimsy efforts to remain a low-key member of [This.Society.GetName]. We had higher hopes than this.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_3209: [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] has come to me as a friend, to inquire about my wellbeing. "I feel as though I never see you pray anymore, is something heavy burdening your mind?" [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] asks.\nI think of my true beliefs, and how they need to be kept secret, even of those closest to me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3209: Oh, I have been having these terrible dreams.
EVTOPTC_MNM_3209: Actually, I've been meaning to speak to you about [concerned_friend.GetEducationalTopicPlural].
EVTDESC_MNM_3211: I regale [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] with tales of my "dark dreams" of strange and foreign rituals. [concerned_friend.GetSheHeCap] can barely believe the vividness with which I describe the faith of the unbelievers. Afterwards [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] offers me a listening ear for whenever I may be burdened like this again.\nIf only [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] knew.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3211: [concerned_friend.GetFirstName] is a good, loyal and trusting [concerned_friend.GetRootRelation].
EVTDESC_MNM_3212: As I describe my "dark dreams," [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]'s expression grows ever more concerned. "You recall these dreams very well," [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] says. "Almost more like memories."\n[concerned_friend.GetFirstName] doesn't comment on it again, but later you worry that you may have made [concerned_friend.GetHerHim] more worried, not less.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3212: I think I gave away too much.
EVTDESC_MNM_3213: I tried to reassure [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] that everything is as it should, and soon enough we were conversing and laughing like we used to. When the evening was over, [concerned_friend.GetFirstName] looked me in the eyes. "It is good to see that all is well with you after all."
EVTDESC_MNM_3214: I tried to reassure [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] that everything is as it should, but my mind would not stay still. Did they already know the truth about my faith? As our conversation drifted onto theology, I briskly told [concerned_friend.GetHerHim] that I had to retire for the evening. I barely said goodbye before I had them escorted out.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3214: I could have handled that better.
EVTDESC_3220_TRUSTING: I have been thinking about my efforts to blend into the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] community and while I am aware of what is expected of me, I am often overcome with the desire to talk to someone. Perhaps [trusted_friend.GetTitledName]? Surely [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] would understand my struggle?
EVTDESC_3220_SHY: Being a [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent], but pretending that I am not, has begun to make me shy away of conversation on religious matters. From the frown on some people's faces, I worry that my indecision is becoming noticeable.
EVTDESC_3220_HONEST: The weight of carrying my beliefs in secret is becoming increasingly difficult. I am not fond of lying, and so when [trusted_friend.GetFirstName] bids me farewell after an audience, and [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] blesses me in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I shift uncomfortably in my seat.
EVTOPTA_3220_SHY: If I don't have anything intelligent to say, it's better that I am quiet.
EVTOPTA_3220_HONEST: I can't pretend all the time.
EVTOPTB_3220_SHY: I need to play along more.
EVTDESC_3221_TRUSTING: [trusted_friend.GetTitledName] joined me for a walk today, and I must admit to feeling better after talking to [trusted_friend.GetHerHim]. While I left out the most important details of my current spiritual anxieties, [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] concluded our meeting by placing an encouraging hand on my shoulder. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is with us  I am sure of it, my [Root.GetLordLady]."
EVTDESC_3221_SHY: During a meeting today, what started as an idle discussion on the subject of [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural], somehow got my councilors into a heated debate over theology. When prompted about my own opinion on the matter, I offered them my most stony gaze in return. "Of course, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Your opinion is obviously that of the traditional scholars. Our apologies."
EVTDESC_3221_HONEST: The next time [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName] bids me farewell with a blessing of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] I reply that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] certainly could treat us better. [trusted_friend.GetFirstName] hesitates for a second, but then laughs. "You have such nerve, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] says. "It's all in jest, my friend" I say, only half-faking my smile.
EVTDESC_3222_TRUSTING: [trusted_friend.GetTitledName] joined me for a walk today, and at first I felt a lot better simply talking to [trusted_friend.GetHerHim]. I struggled to leave out the details of my current spiritual anxieties, but [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] shot me glances of concern throughout our meeting. As we parted, [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] placed a gentle hand on my shoulder. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is with us  I am sure of it... Even if you are not, my [Root.GetLordLady]."
EVTDESC_3222_SHY: During a meeting today, what started as an idle discussion on the subject of [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural] somehow got my councilors into a heated debate over theology... When I was finally prompted about my own opinion on the matter, I shrunk into my chair and mumbled something about us all perhaps making an effort to get along. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] wouldn't want us to squabble", I concluded, but they did not seem convinced.
EVTDESC_3222_HONEST: The next time [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName] bids me farewell with a blessing of [trusted_friend.GetHerHis] [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I am at a loss for words. "Something the matter, my [Root.GetLordLady]?" [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] asks. "It's nothing", I say, but [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] does not seem convinced. "I know you are struggling with your faith, my friend" [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] then says, before continuing: " but you must stop. For the sake of the realm."
EVTOPTA_3222_TRUSTING: Oh no! I cannot afford rumors of my faith wavering!
EVTOPTA_3222_SHY: I'm not sure what I should have said?
EVTDESC_3223_TRUSTING: I invited [trusted_friend.GetTitledName] to a walk today. While not disclosing too much, I gently steered our conversation towards [trusted_friend.GetHerHis] theological views. "I think perhaps that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is just a name, for a concept we share with many, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] admitted in the end.
EVTDESC_3223_SHY: During a meeting today, what started as an idle discussion on the subject of [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural] somehow got my councilors into a heated debate over theology. When finally prompted about my own opinion on the matter, I slammed my fist into the table, stating that there is only one true religion, before smiling gently. Their faces reddened. "Of course, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Our apologies."
EVTDESC_3223_HONEST: The next time [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName] bids me farewell with a blessing of [trusted_friend.GetHerHis] [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I reply that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] has already blessed me, with the companionship we share. [trusted_friend.GetFirstName] gives an earnest smile. "Always so eloquent, my [Root.GetLordLady]". "Only among my friends" I respond, giving a mock bow.
EVTDESC_3224_TRUSTING: I have been avoiding [trusted_friend.GetTitledName] for some time now. When [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] eventually caught me, it was awkward. "Something has changed in you, my [Root.GetLordLady]" [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] said stiffly. My stomach lurched. "It is not you, it is I", I confessed. Then I told [trusted_friend.GetHerHim] that I've been doubting [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s plan for me. [trusted_friend.GetSheHeCap] seemed unimpressed. I hope I have not said too much.
EVTDESC_3224_SHY: During a meeting today, what started as an idle discussion on the subject of [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural] somehow got my councilors into a heated debate over theology... When I was finally prompted about my own opinion on the matter, I shrunk into my chair. "Surely, we have more important things to discuss", I mumbled. "More important than [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], my [Root.GetLordLady]?" came the retort, aghast.
EVTDESC_3224_HONEST: The next time [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName] bids me farewell with a blessing of [trusted_friend.GetHerHis] [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I am at a loss for words. "Something the matter, my [Root.GetLordLady]?" [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] asks. "It's nothing", I say, but [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] only sighs, exasperated. "I refused to believe the rumors, but you truly do not believe in our [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] anymore, do you? My [Root.GetTitle], you'll doom us all."
EVTOPTA_3224_SHY: Does even my own council doubt me?
EVTDESC_MNM_3225_A: In an effort to convince the court of my piety, I have chosen to attend [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] and give a grand speech to my people, and to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me curiously as I enter the building, and I stop for moment to gather my thoughts. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to impress these people and choose my words carefully.
EVTDESC_MNM_3225_D: In an effort to convince the court of my piety, I have chosen to visit the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], and pray with the [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me curiously as I enter the building, and I stop for moment to gather my thoughts. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
EVTDESC_MNM_3225_E: In an effort to convince the court of my devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have chosen to visit the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], and pray with the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me curiously as I enter the building, and I stop for moment to gather my thoughts. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
EVTDESC_MNM_3225_G: In an effort to convince the court of my commitment to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have gone to [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], to leave an offering at the altar of the gods. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk up the steps and enter the building. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
EVTDESC_MNM_3225_H: In an effort to convince the court of my commitment to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have gone to [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], to leave an offering at the sacred altar. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk up the steps and enter the building. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
EVTDESC_MNM_3225_J: In an effort to convince the court of my commitment to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have gone to [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], to make an offering at the altar of the gods. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk up the steps and enter the building. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
EVTDESC_MNM_3225_N: In an effort to convince the court of my commitment to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have gone to [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], and to visit the altar of God. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk up the steps and enter the building. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
EVTDESC_MNM_3225_O: In an effort to convince my people of my commitment to the ancestors, I have come to make an offering at the sacred altar of our elders. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk the steps up to the temple. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
EVTDESC_MNM_3225_P: In an effort to convince the court of my piety, I have chosen to visit the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], and pray with the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me curiously as I enter the building, and I stop for moment to gather my thoughts. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_A: As I step up to the altar, people eye me carefully. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods encouragingly at me, and I look up to study the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]  unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_D: As I step up to the altar, my people eye me carefully. They depend on their [Root.GetTitle], and [Root.GetHerHis] connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I look up to study the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]  unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_E: As I step up in front of them, my people eye me carefully. They depend on their [Root.GetTitle], and [Root.GetHerHis] connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I stare into the flames of the altar candle lights for a moment. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]  unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_F: As I step up in front of them, my people eye me carefully. They depend on their [Root.GetTitle], and [Root.GetHerHis] connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I look up to study the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]  unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_G: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I bow before the ornamental sculpture. When I finally turn to address the gathering crowd, I imagine that it is[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] I am praising  unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_H: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I bow before the beautifully carved sculpture. When I finally turn to address the gathering crowd, I imagine that it is[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] I am praising  unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_J: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] smiles at me, and I inhale deeply, while studying the ornamental carvings on the walls. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]  unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_N: My voice carried by the crisp morning air, my words ring louder than I could have hoped. "Tengri creates death. We have all been created in order to die", I proclaim in front of the Sky God's followers. They nod eagerly, swallowing my lines with a warrior's thirst. They do not know that it is [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] that fuels my passion. Seeing their faces as I continue my speech, I am not sure it matters.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_O: I grab one of the torches of the ground and lift it high above my head. "The Creator watches, even in the night, when all seems dark..." I begin. Even though my heart has abandoned this faith, seeing their faces lit by the flame, I realize the power my words hold for them. They depend on me, their [Root.GetTitle] to guide them through their hardships. If it's their [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] or [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] by my side, I am not sure it matters.
EVTDESC_MNM_3226_P: As I step up to the altar, the people eye me carefully. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods encouragingly at me, and I look up to study the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]  unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
EVTDESC_MNM_3227_A: As I step up to the altar, people eye me warily. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration  it never comes and my heart sinks. I run off the stage, leaving rows of people confused.
EVTDESC_MNM_3227_D: As I step up to the altar, the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s eye me warily. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration  it never comes and my heart sinks. I run off the stage, leaving rows of people confused.
EVTDESC_MNM_3227_E: With each step I take, my confidence fades. I turn to look at my people, and find their eyes wary. They need me, as [Root.GetTitle], and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration  it never comes. I run off the stage, leaving rows of people confused.
EVTDESC_MNM_3227_F: As I step up to the altar, the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s eye me warily. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration  it never comes. I run off the stage, leaving rows of people confused.
EVTDESC_MNM_3227_G: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I bow before the ornamental sculpture. What can I tell them? In my heart, I pray to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration  it never comes. I hastily exit the sanctuary, leaving my people confused.
EVTDESC_MNM_3227_J: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] shoots me a suspicious glance, and I inhale deeply, while studying the ornamental carvings on the walls. Isn't [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] a vengeful god? The beautiful temple suddenly feels far too crowded. In a moment of weakness, I hastily exit the sanctuary, leaving the worshipers confused.
EVTDESC_MNM_3227_N: As I walk up the steps, I begin to fidget. I turn to look at my people, only to find their eyes wary. Even the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] shoots me a suspicious glance, and I inhale sharply. A carved horse's head, which I used to find beautiful, glares at me and I find myself averting my eyes. Isn't [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] a vengeful god? The beautiful temple suddenly feels far too crowded and I decide to burst out of the building, leaving the worshipers confused.
EVTDESC_MNM_3227_O: I strew the flowers around the altar, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] shoots me a suspicious glance and I take a deep breath, averting her eyes. The ancestral spirits can be vengeful, can they not? And why is it so warm here? The place suddenly feels far too crowded. Before I say anything at all, I hastily withdraw of the stage, leaving the worshipers confused.
EVTDESC_MNM_3227_P: As I step up to the altar, the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s eye me warily. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration  it never comes. Instead my heart beats frantically and I withdraw of the crowd, without a word to comfort them.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3227: This is not what I had intended.
EVTDESC_MNM_3228_A: I step up to the altar and make a quick decision  as I reach the center of the stage I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, everyone seems to be holding their breath. For a moment I worry that my stunt has failed. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] exclaims "A VISION! My [Root.GetLordLady], let me help you stand!"
EVTDESC_MNM_3228_G: I step up to the altar and make a quick decision  as I near a great statue of Vishnu, I collapse to the floor. Worshipers around me gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, everyone seems to be holding their breath. For a moment I worry that my stunt has failed. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] exclaims "A VISION! My [Root.GetLordLady], let me help you stand!"
EVTDESC_MNM_3228_H: As I step up to the altar I make a quick decision  I collapse dramatically into the arms of a statue, to the gasps of onlooking worshipers. Then I begin quoting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], and I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, everyone seems to be holding their breath. For a moment I worry that my stunt has failed. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] exclaims "A VISION! My [Root.GetLordLady], let me help you stand!"
EVTDESC_MNM_3228_O: As I step up to the altar I make a quick decision  I collapse dramatically into the arms of the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle], to the gasps of onlooking worshipers. Then I begin quoting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], and I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, everyone seems to be holding their breath. For a moment I worry that my stunt has failed. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] exclaims "A VISION! My [Root.GetLordLady], let me help you stand!"
EVTDESC_MNM_3229_A: I step towards the pulpit and make a bold decision  as I reach the center of the stage I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting fragments of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, people start to whisper. For a moment I am convinced that my stunt has succeeded. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] prods at me. "Uhm, my [Root.GetLordLady]? Let's get you back onto your feet."
EVTDESC_MNM_3229_C: I step up to the altar and make a bold decision  as I reach the center of the stage I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting fragments of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, people start to whisper. For a moment I am convinced that my stunt has succeeded. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] prods at me. "Uhm, my [Root.GetLordLady]? Let's get you back onto your feet."
EVTDESC_MNM_3229_D: I step forwards and make a bold decision  as I reach the center of the crowd I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting fragments of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, people start to whisper. For a moment I am convinced that my stunt has succeeded. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] prods at me. "Uhm, my [Root.GetLordLady]? Let's get you back onto your feet."
EVTDESC_MNM_3229_G: I step forwards and make a bold decision  as I reach a group of people I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting fragments of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, they start to whisper. For a moment I am convinced that my stunt has succeeded. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] prods at me. "Uhm, my [Root.GetLordLady]? Let's get you back onto your feet."
EVTOPTA_MNM_3229: B-but... Don't you think I had a holy vision?
awkward_believer_desc: This character is not comfortable discussing their faith.
great_believer_desc: This character gives the impression of being very devout.
EVTDESC_MNM_3230_A: I make sure that I am regularly seen studying [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].\nToday my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName] came to me to compliment my efforts!
EVTDESC_MNM_3230_B: I have arranged for my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName] to help me with readings of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] commented that such a studiousness is evidence of a true faithful!
EVTDESC_MNM_3230_C: In my efforts to blend in with the believers around me, I believe I have come to learn more [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] theology than most of them know themselves.\nThey would be foolish to challenge my understanding of the faith.
EVTDESC_MNM_3230_D: A group of courtiers spotted me praying today. As they came within earshot I made sure to mutter the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] repeatedly.\nThey ended up joining me in my prayer.
EVTDESC_MNM_3230_E: I passed by a beggar in the street today and quoted a passage of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to her, loud enough for anyone passing by to hear. Apparently the exchange became quite the conversation starter at court!
EVTDESC_MNM_3230_F: I was studying copied pages of [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] with a fellow faithful when a servant entered my room unannounced. He apologized, but glanced across the scattered pages on my table... Both my companion and I let out a sigh of relief when the servant  in obvious illiteracy  complimented our dedication to the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] faith.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3230_A: My tedious work is starting to pay off...!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3230_C: Certain aspects of this endeavor are easier than others.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3230_E: For once, gossip works in my favor.
