EVTDESC_MNM_7121: While my guest [From.GetTitledFirstName] has yet to understand the true nature of the world, the right methods of persuasion might get through to [From.GetHerHim]... Not many survive the long journey to the truth, and few can bear it once it is revealed to them, but [From.GetFirstName] would be an asset to our ranks.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7121: Leave us alone, guard. Do not return until first light.
EVTDESC_MNM_7123_WOUNDED: The cost of knowledge is great, and [From.GetFirstName] is not the first to have suffered this much for it. At least they did not succumb, but rose to see it eye to eye.
EVTDESC_MNM_7123_INSANE: While [From.GetFirstName] has not been quite the same since [From.GetSheHe] truly awoke, [From.GetHerHis] mind is less broken now than it was before.
EVTDESC_MNM_7123_NOT_WOUNDED: At first [From.GetTitledFirstName] resisted fiercely, but it slowly dawned on [From.GetHerHim] that no god would bother to answer [From.GetHerHis] prayers.\nCome morning I was exhausted, but [From.GetFirstName] more than willingly swore allegiance to [From.GetHerHis] true master.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7123: The light no longer blinds you, dear [From.GetSisterBrother].
EVTDESC_MNM_7123_DEAD: The truth puts a greater strain on some than others, and as [From.GetTitledFirstName] professed [From.GetHerHis] newfound allegiance between shattered screams, our true lord saw fit to grant [From.GetHerHim] the sweet release of death at the height of my dark ritual.
EVTDESC_MNM_7124_WOUNDED: Even when I held nothing back, [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to let the name of [Root.GetDWDevil] pass [From.GetHerHis] lips. [From.GetHerHisCap] broken bones will be a reminder of what happens to those who stand in our way.
EVTDESC_MNM_7124_INSANE: Even when I held nothing back, [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to let the name of [Root.GetDWDevil] pass [From.GetHerHis] lips. [From.GetHerHisCap] mind was not as protected, and if [From.GetSheHe] ever speaks again, it will be nothing but mad ramblings.
EVTDESC_MNM_7124_NOT_WOUNDED: Even when I held nothing back, [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to let the name of [Root.GetDWDevil] pass [From.GetHerHis] lips. If I had pushed [From.GetHerHim] any further, either [From.GetHerHis] bones or [From.GetHerHis] mind would have given in.
EVTOPTA_MNM_7124: You will belong to [Root.GetDWDevil] in time, as all will.
devil_worshipers_induction_desc: Use every method of persuasion to convince §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
successful_induction_tooltip: Your induction attempt is successful! [Root.GetDWDevil] welcomes §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! into the coven.\n
is_visible_to_self_trigger_tooltip: The viewing Character is the holder of this Character Modifier\n
embarrassed_believer_desc: This character is recovering from something humiliating.
EVTDESC_3398_CONDUCT_SECRET_CEREMONY:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

As a secret practitioner of our religion it is sometimes easy to neglect your true self. For your sake, as well as that of [This.Society.GetName], we ask that you conduct a secret ceremony in honor of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName].

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_3237: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to travel to my [Root.Capital.GetCapitalHolding] to support me in my secret ceremony. "For a fellow [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]", [From.GetSheHe] writes. While I consider my response, I place the letter onto the hearth. As the flames crumple the paper, I rest my hand on the pocket where I keep my hidden [Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol], safe, and away from prying eyes.
EVTDESC_MNM_3237_COURT: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to support me in my secret ceremony. "For a fellow [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]", [From.GetSheHe] writes. While I consider my response, I place the letter onto the hearth. As the flames crumple the paper, I rest my hand on the pocket where I keep my hidden [Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol], safe, and away from prying eyes.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3237_TT: I will see to the preparations.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3237: No, I don't have time for this right now.
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_TRAGIC_FAIL: I had just lit the candles when [unfortunate_interrupter.GetTitledName] walked in on us. [unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHeCap] gasped at the sight of our foreign ceremony, but before [unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHe] had time to alert the guards, [From.GetFirstName] tackled [unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHim]. The [unfortunate_interrupter.GetManWoman] must've hit [unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHis] head on something though  when the blood started pouring onto the floor, [From.GetFirstName] backed away in horror.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3239_TRAGIC_FAIL: This is terrible! What did you do?!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3239_TRAGIC_FAIL_TT: Even though an unfortunate accident, the ceremony to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] is a complete failure.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_SMALL_FAIL: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, as I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. Hidden in this secret chamber, I can still hear the sounds of people outside. This had all seemed so clever before  now I am wondering if it is worth the risk of being discovered. I sigh and squeeze my pendant tightly, ignoring the rolling eyes of [From.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_3239_SMALL_FAIL_TT: You complete the ceremony, but agree to not talk about it.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_NEUTRAL_OUTCOME: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols on the wall. Performing a secret ceremony, in a secret chamber, I should be nervous, or excited. Or... something. I don't feel much at all? Yet [From.GetFirstName] turns to me afterwards. "Thank you, [Root.GetSisterBrother]. I needed this."
EVTOPTA_MNM_3239_NEUTRAL_OUTCOME_TT: You complete the ceremony, and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! smiles at you.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_SMALL_SUCCESS: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols, the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. This is how it should be  for a moment, all I can hear is the sound of my own breathing, and I feel... safe.
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_SMALL_SUCCESS_N_FRIENDS: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols  the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. For a moment, all I can hear is the sound of my own breathing, and I feel... safe. "One day, we'll be free", [From.GetFirstName] says.
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_SMALL_SUCCESS_N_ROMANCE: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols  the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. I have not felt this relaxed in months. When I open my eyes, I find [From.GetFirstName] averting [From.GetHerHis] gaze from me, blushing.
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_SMALL_SUCCESS_N_RIVAL_R: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. To my surprise, [From.GetFirstName] takes my hand  the faint light of the room reflected only in [From.GetHerHis] eyes, and the holy symbol hanging from a pendant around [From.GetHerHis] neck. "We're supposed to be praying", I mumble and let go, still feeling the warmth of [From.GetHerHis] hand on my skin.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3239_SMALL_SUCCESS: We should do this again, sometime.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3239_SMALL_SUCCESS_TT_1: You complete the ceremony, both you and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! feeling better.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3239_SMALL_SUCCESS_TT_2: You complete the ceremony, and walk away with some new and confusing feelings...\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_BIG_SUCCESS: I light the candles, while [From.GetFirstName], in a low voice, begins to sing a haunting melody. I bow my head, deciding resolutely that I am a true [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent] and this will not change. [From.GetFirstName] echoes my thoughts, when [From.GetSheHe] finally speaks: "This ceremony is as much for [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], as it is for us". I nod, and we join hands in prayer.
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_BIG_SUCCESS_N_FRIENDSHI: I light the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] begins to sing quietly, a haunting melody, in reverence to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes, in relief, over being able to practice my faith and to say the words of prayer without judgment. I look over to [From.GetFirstName], who is still singing, and I smile. Kinship such as this, is a gift.
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_BIG_SUCCESS_N_ROMANCE: I lit the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] began to sing quietly, a wistful melody. I swear by [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I almost dropped the fire I was holding, as [From.GetHerHis] voice struck a brilliant chord in me. It was so beautiful  the hymn, and the [From.GetManWoman] performing it. I shook my head, trying to focus on the ceremony. In my heart, something flickered to life.
EVTDESC_MNM_3239_BIG_SUCCESS_N_RIVAL_ROM: I lit the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] began to sing quietly, a wistful melody, full of longing. I've never seen [From.GetHerHim] so solemn before, and I was struck by the admiration that welled up in me. By [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I and [From.GetFirstName]? What was I thinking? I shook my head, trying to focus on the ceremony  in my heart, something flickered to life.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3239_BIG_SUCCESS_TT_1: You complete the ceremony and walk away with a renewed faith.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3239_BIG_SUCCESS_TT_2: You complete the ceremony and walk away with a new-found strength, and some interesting feelings...\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3262: I have received a letter from my fellow member of [This.Society.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName]: "Dear [Root.GetSisterBrother] [Root.GetFirstName]. Will you, as the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] scholar you are, please offer me some advice on my poetry? Or, the attempt of it?" Reading through the attached documents, there are multiple verses, all in honor of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_3262: Hmm... I am missing the more comforting aspects of faith.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3262_TT: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will receive a letter with your advice.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3262: While I enjoy the metaphors, they seem a little forced?
EVTOPTC_MNM_3262_TT: You can't be bothered with this.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3264: I was beginning to think that [From.GetTitledFirstName] took offense to my comments, but today I have received a new draft of [From.GetHerHis] work  I am surprised to find that [From.GetHerHis] words really speak to me. Scribbled in the margin I can just make out: "I implore you, [Root.GetSisterBrother], bear with me. It is not finished".
EVTOPTA_MNM_3264: Nonsense! This is brilliant work and the world needs to see it!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3264_TT: You make sure the writings are published, against the wishes of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3264: I think [This.Society.GetName] will treasure these words.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3264_TT: You intend to make sure that the writings will go to §Y[This.Society.GetName]§! for safe-keeping.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_3264_TT: You find great comfort in the writings.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_3264: If I were to put these poems out, in my own name...
EVTOPTD_MNM_3264_TT: You decide to steal the writings and take the credit yourself.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3266_A: I cannot believe that you went against my wishes, [From.GetTitledName] writes to me. "The poems were far from finished, and now I receive word that my metaphors could use work? I have been humiliated!" I put the letter away, frowning.
EVTDESC_MNM_3266_B: I cannot believe that you went against my wishes, [From.GetTitledName] writes to me. "The poems were far from finished, and now people are saying that perhaps I do not understand the comforting aspects of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]? I have been humiliated!" I put the letter away, frowning.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3266: Hrmph. You cannot fault a [Root.GetManWoman] for seizing an opportunity.
EVTDESC_MNM_3267: I am flattered that you think [This.Society.GetName] could benefit from my work, [From.GetTitledName] writes in [From.GetHerHis] letter. "Thank you for your support, [Root.GetSisterBrother]" [From.GetSheHe] continues, before assuring me of the finishing touches [From.GetSheHe] intends to see to before the final version of the manuscript will enter the library.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3267: I am honored to be surrounded by minds like [From.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_MNM_3268: I cannot believe that my words could have such an impact on someone, honored [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]. I place the letter on the mantelpiece, the sigil of [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] a friendly reminder of the comfort I feel.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3268: I am lucky to be a part of [This.Society.GetName].
patron_of_the_arts_desc: This character views art as something meant for the public.
preserver_of_poetry_desc: This character has taken steps to ensure that certain great literary works be preserved for future generations.
published_poet_desc: This character is renowned for their religious poetry.
EVTDESC_MNM_3269_A: I suppose that I should be flattered that you felt the need to stoop this low, you [Root.GetInsultAdjective] [Root.GetInsultNoun], I read. My [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] seems to have gotten wind of "my" poetry  it's currently the talk of the town and people seem to really appreciate how I focused on the comforting aspects of faith.
EVTDESC_MNM_3269_B: I suppose that I should be flattered that you felt the need to stoop this low, you [Root.GetInsultAdjective] [Root.GetInsultNoun], I read. My [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] seems to have gotten wind of "my" poetry  it's currently the talk of the town and people seem to really appreciate how effortless my metaphors seem.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3269: Sorry, [From.GetTitledName], but [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] works in mysterious ways.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3269_TT: §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will get over this. In time. Maybe.\n
green_fingers_desc: This character has a way with plants.
dirty_hands_desc: This character tried their hand at gardening, but all they got was dirty.
the_name_of_the_rose_desc: This character has a keen interest in the cultivation of roses.
rose_gardens_desc: Roses, in a multitude of colors, are found in the gardens of this character.
EVTDESC_MNM_4202: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has contacted me, asking if I have any interest in learning more about roses. Apparently [From.GetHerHis] latest achievement involves a dark red variant, mixed with a particular type of yellow wild rose.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4202_CHRISTIAN: Fascinating! I shall visit the monastery where this feat has been accomplished.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4202_DHARMIC: Fascinating! I shall visit the matha where this feat has been accomplished.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4202_TT: You will visit the garden where §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! has conducted [From.GetHerHis] botany.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_4202: Oh, I simply must have some!
EVTOPTB_MNM_4202_TT: You will send someone to collect some of these roses.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_4202: As a matter of fact, I have been working on something similar!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4202_TT: You will send some of your own samples to §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_4202: This seems like a waste of my time.
EVTDESC_MNM_4204: Escorted through the gardens of the monastery, I immediately spot the work of [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName]. The roses are a delicate mixture of red and yellow, a hue of sunset at their center. "They're beautiful", my escort nods, offering me a small spade. "They're a little cramped over there though, would you mind helping out?"
EVTOPTA_MNM_4204: I would love to! There is something... grounding, to gardening.
EVTOPTB_MNM_4204: Oh, I can do that. I think.
EVTOPTC_MNM_4204: Thank you, but no thanks. These are marvelous though!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4204_TT: The [Root.GetSocietyRank] nods at you in agreement  §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will receive a letter with your compliments.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4205: The roses that I had sent for have now been planted in my own gardens, their beauty spreading joy to anybody who passes by them. What a true marvel of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
EVTDESC_MNM_4206: It seems that [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] has received the sample from my garden that I sent [From.GetHerHim]. Today a courier presented me with some elaborate coal sketches of the various rose species [From.GetFirstName] has been occupying [From.GetHerselfHimself] with  included are ideas of new ones, provided we continue to work together.
EVTDESC_MNM_4212: While attending prayer one early morning, I notice my [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] drowsing off in [From.GetHerHis] seat. Meanwhile, our fellow members of [This.Society.GetName] are deep in their contemplation and do not seem to have noticed yet.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4212: I should wake [From.GetHerHim], before anyone catches on.
EVTOPTB_MNM_4212: [From.GetSheHeCap] looks like [From.GetSheHe] could use a nap...
EVTOPTC_MNM_4212: I think I heard [From.GetHerHim] request a mustache.
EVTDESC_MNM_4214: I gently prod at [From.GetFirstName], but I get no reaction. Then I shove my elbow into [From.GetHerHis] side, causing [From.GetHerHim] to cough and open [From.GetHerHis] eyes, a flash of anger in them. [From.GetHerHisCap] face turns red as [From.GetSheHe] blinks, the situation dawning on [From.GetHerHim] suddenly. "Thank you", [From.GetSheHe] mumbles, sheepishly.
EVTOPTB_MNM_4214: It seems I saved you from some real embarrassment there...
EVTDESC_MNM_4215: As [From.GetFirstName] continues [From.GetHerHis] nap, it does not take long before [From.GetSheHe] starts to snore. I discretely edge away from [From.GetHerHim], and when [From.GetSheHe] finally wakes up, it is to the faces of disapproval from [From.GetHerHis] companions. How awkward for [From.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTA_MNM_4215: [From.GetSheHeCap] did look rather comfortable there, for a while...
EVTDESC_MNM_4216: I scurry off to fetch some ink, before I gently sit down beside the lightly sleeping [From.GetFirstName] and begin my work. It takes a few minutes, but in the end I am more than satisfied  [From.GetHerHis] new mustache is marvelous! For some reason, [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] does not return my smile when [From.GetSheHe] awakes from [From.GetHerHis] slumber.
monastic_orders_invite_ascetic_desc: Invite a holy ascetic belonging to [Root.Society.GetName] to join your court.
monastic_orders_invite_ascetic_tt: A holy ascetic will soon appear at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4434: The [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] has finally arrived at my court. [From.GetFirstName] is a most noble and wise [From.GetManWoman] and I will happily receive [From.GetHerHis] council in matters of religion and scholarly pursuits.
secret_religions_evoke_sympathy_desc: Approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to make [Root.GetHerHim] sympathize with [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons].
EVTDESC_MNM_3404: After some careful planning, I am seated next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a formal dinner. I have planned to tell [From.GetHerHim] about a family of [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] that was attacked and driven from their home in [Root.Capital.GetName] in an attempt to rouse [From.GetHerHis] sympathies, but what angle should I employ?
EVTOPTA_MNM_3404: They were forced to leave many loved ones behind.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3404_TT: Talk about the relatives and friends of the attacked family and how they will never see each other again, hoping this will tug on the heartstrings of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3404: Their scars, both physical and emotional, will never fade.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3404_TT: Talk about personal trauma, hoping that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can relate.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_3404: They had a profitable business. It was burned to the ground.
EVTOPTC_MNM_3404_TT: Talk about the business the family lost and how valuable it was to the community, hoping that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will realize how the prosperity of the capital and was affected.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_3404: I will go to any lengths to prevent this from happening again!
EVTOPTD_MNM_3404_TT: Talk about how important this matters is to you personally, hoping that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! cares enough about your opinion.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3405_A: I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'They will never see their friends and relatives again, the poor souls,' [From.GetFirstName] says with a heavy sigh.
EVTDESC_MNM_3405_B: I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'I never saw them myself, but apparently the mother was maimed in the attack. The children will surely be haunted by nightmares for years to come,' [From.GetFirstName] sighs.
EVTDESC_MNM_3405_C: I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'I wish they had been left alone  their business was a vital cog in the local economy and a great source of taxes,' [From.GetFirstName] sighs.
EVTDESC_MNM_3405_D: I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'Nothing angers me as when people are persecuted and harmed, simply because of their faith!' [From.GetFirstName] growls.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3405: Such senseless violence! My heart aches for them.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3405: They were [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] and only have themselves to blame!
EVTDESC_MNM_3406: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was visibly moved by the story about the poor family. After our conversation, [From.GetSheHe] became very quiet and only responded in short, half-hearted sentences when spoken to. Just before our departure, [From.GetFirstName] pulled me aside and thanked me for opening [From.GetHerHis] eyes.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3406: I knew we would find an ally in [From.GetFirstName]!
EVTDESC_MNM_3407: [From.GetTitledFirstName] only scoffed at my story and haughtily claimed that the family, as 'a bunch of filthy heathens', only had themselves to blame. Then [From.GetSheHe] turned to the [From.GetManWomanOpp] on [From.GetHerHis] other side and proceeded to ignore me for the rest of the evening.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3407: [From.GetFirstName] is not yet ready to accept the truth.
EVTDESC_MNM_3401:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We are hopeful that [induction_target.GetTitledFirstName] is of the right mindset and quality of character to become one of us. As we need powerful allies of the cause, it is your mission to show [induction_target.GetHerHim] the light.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
quest_secret_religious_societies_induct_: We believe that the [FromFrom.GetTitle] of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [FromFrom.GetDynName], could be turned into a supporter of our cause. It is your mission to secretly convert [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.

To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Induct Into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith'§! and successfully make [FromFrom.GetHerHim] a secret believer of the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. If §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! does not currently have the §YSympathy for [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]§! trait, §Y'Evoke Sympathy for [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]'§! must be selected and successfully completed first.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3403:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

To bring about the liberation of those who follow the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith, we must first win the sympathies of those in power. Approach [sympathy_target.GetTitledFirstName] and turn [sympathy_target.GetHerHim] into a supporter of our cause.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
quest_secret_religious_societies_sympath: The first step towards liberation as well as the religious conversion of lost souls is spreading sympathy for the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. Approach [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and turn [FromFrom.GetHerHim] into a supporter of our cause.

To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Evoke Sympathy for [FromFrom.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]'§! and successfully make them a supporter of the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.\n
secret_religions_induct_character_desc: Attempt to make [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a secret believer of the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.
secret_religions_induct_character_cd_tt: Has not been approached to be inducted into another faith recently\n
secret_religions_induct_character_effect: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to find a way to make §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! contemplate the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3408: I have arranged for one of my spies to leave a tome of the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] with an anonymous note in the [secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber] of [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]. If the tome is left open on a passage which [secret_religion_inductee.GetFirstName] finds relevant, I am hopeful [secret_religion_inductee.GetSheHe] will find truth in the holy words  but what might catch [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHis] eye...?
EVTOPTA_MNM_3408: A tale about a legendary warrior.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3408_TT: Leave the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] open on a passage about war and warriors, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3408: Something stressing the importance of community.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3408_TT: Leave the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] open on a passage about community, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_3408: A passage on ethics and philosophy.
EVTOPTC_MNM_3408_TT: Leave the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] open on a passage on ethics and philosophy, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_3408: A story about a fair and mighty ruler.
EVTOPTD_MNM_3408_TT: Leave the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] open on a passage about legendary rulers, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3409: Intriguing. I guess a little read cannot hurt...
EVTOPTB_MNM_3409: Blasphemy! The unholy words shall burn!
EVTOPTC_MNM_3409: Never! I will hide it where no one shall ever find it.
EVTOPTC_MNM_3409_TT: Get rid of the copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName].
EVTDESC_MNM_3410_A: The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on a legendary war and the brave heroes who fought in it to defend the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. The story intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of only a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.
EVTDESC_MNM_3410_B: The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on the importance of family, friends and the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] community. The words intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.
EVTDESC_MNM_3410_C: The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on the greater questions  right and wrong, the higher purpose, the afterlife  and as I pondered the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] perspective on these matters, I found myself intrigued enough to continue reading.
EVTDESC_MNM_3410_D: The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on a legendary [Root.GetQueenKing] and how [Root.GetHerHis] empire blossomed under [Root.GetHerHis] fair and steady rule. The story intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3410: I have been blind, but now I see! Never have I read truer words!
EVTOPTB_MNM_3410: Reading this has reaffirmed my confidence in my own beliefs.
EVTDESC_MNM_3411: My spies have brought me some outstanding news! Apparently [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] reads the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] every night and now seems to worship [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], like we do, in secret. My plan succeeded!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3411: It is time for [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] to join us.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3411_TT: Approach §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to recruit [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHim] to §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!.
secret_religions_recruit_cd_tt: Has not been invited to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§! recently
secret_religions_recruit_effect_tt: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! approaches §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! with the intent of inviting [Root.GetHerHim] to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
EVTDESC_MNM_3420: The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] has everyone's full attention  except mine. My thoughts are elsewhere as I try to ignore [spiritual_gender.GetHerHis] sacrilegious words echoing through the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. Suddenly, my concentration is shattered when the stranger next to me grabs my hand and draws something in my palm with their index finger. The holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3420: I must follow them once [Root.GetReligiousRite] is over!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3420_TT: Follow the mysterious stranger who drew the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbol in your palm.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3420: It could be a trap. I cannot risk it...
EVTOPTB_MNM_3420_TT: Ignore the stranger who approached you.
EVTDESC_MNM_3421_A: I follow the stranger as [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] departs from the crowd and ventures into a deserted alleyway. As I round the corner, I find [secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim] waiting. It is [secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]! '[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s blessings, [Root.GetFirstName]' [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] greets me. 'Are you ready to fight for the True Faith?'
EVTDESC_MNM_3421_B: I follow the stranger as [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] departs from the crowd and ventures into a deserted alleyway. As I round the corner, I find [secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim] waiting. '[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s blessings, [Root.GetFirstName]' [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] greets me. 'My name is [secret_religion_recruiter.GetDynName]. Are you ready to fight for the True Faith?'
EVTOPTA_MNM_3421: I have been waiting for this day!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3421_TT: Ensure §Y[secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! that you want to join the secret [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] society.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3421_TT: Leave the alleyway and pretend like nothing happened.
EVTDESC_MNM_3422: I covered my face before [secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite] and once at the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship] I sat down next to [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]. At the end of the service, I grabbed [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] hand and drew the holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] with my finger in [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] palm. Afterwards [secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe] followed me into a deserted alley where I revealed my identity and invited [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHim] to join us. [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName] said yes.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3422: Another champion of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] joins our ranks!
EVTDESC_MNM_3423: I covered my face before [secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite] and once at the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship] I sat down next to [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]. At the end of the service, I grabbed [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] hand and drew the holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] with my finger in [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] palm. Afterwards, [secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe] pretended like nothing had happened and I left the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship], my quest unsuccessful.
EVTDESC_MNM_3424: A smile spreads across [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFirstName]'s [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFaceDescription] face. 'Excellent. Then I am honored to welcome you to [secret_religion_recruiter.Society.GetName]. Together we work to bring about the liberation of the true believers and a new era of [secret_religion_recruiter.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s glory. You will receive your first mission soon.'
secret_religion_recruit_allow_tt: Is also a secret follower of the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
EVTDESC_MNM_3430: Lately, I have found myself worrying about my little [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName]. The [From.GetLadLass] is brought up believing in a false god who can offer [From.GetHerHim] nothing but illusions and hollow promises. Perhaps [From.GetFirstName] is ready to be introduced to the true faith?
EVTOPTB_MNM_3430: No, the risks are too great, for me and [From.GetHerHim] both!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3430_TT: Attempt to induct §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3430_TT: Do not attempt to induct §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
EVTDESC_MNM_3431_A: When my [GetFromRelation] summoned me to [From.GetHerHis] study, I thought it was time for another boring lecture on manners or morals. However, as I enter the room, [From.GetSheHe] invites me to sit next to [From.GetHerHim] and proceeds to read from a thick tome, which [From.GetSheHe] calls 'the [From.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]'. The stories are about kings and queens, '[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]' and the almighty '[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'.
EVTDESC_MNM_3431_B: When my [GetFromRelation] summoned me to [From.GetHerHis] study, I thought it was time for another boring lecture on manners or morals. However, as I enter the room, [From.GetSheHe] invites me to sit next to [From.GetHerHim]. With an open [From.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] resting on [From.GetHerHis] lap, [From.GetSheHe] proceeds to explain some 'essential' matters which [From.GetSheHe] says the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] has gotten wrong.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3431: I guess that makes sense. Can I play now?
EVTDESC_MNM_3432: I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]. At first, the [From.GetLadLass] was fidgeting in [From.GetHerHis] seat, but my choice of passage was a good one. Soon [From.GetSheHe] hung on my every word, eyes round as the full moon. As I put the tome away, [From.GetFirstName] bombarded me with questions and we kept talking for hours.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3432: I really got through to little [From.GetFirstName]!
EVTDESC_MNM_3433: I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] seemed to truly enjoy the story. While [From.GetFirstName] was more excited about returning to [From.GetHerHis] playmates than having a conversation about what I had just read, I think I got through to [From.GetHerHim] in some way.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3433: This is a first step, at least.
EVTDESC_MNM_3434: I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]. I could tell from the first minute that I had a real challenge ahead of me. The [From.GetLadLass] was fidgeting in [From.GetHerHis] seat and played with [From.GetHerHis] sleeves. However, I was not expecting [From.GetHerHim] to shout at me when I brought up [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3434: I will give this one more try.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3434: It is clear to me now  [From.GetFirstName] isn't ready.
EVTDESC_MNM_3435: Yet again, I have been summoned to my [GetFromRelation]'s study. [From.GetSheHeCap] is cradling the tome from which [From.GetSheHe] read last time, but today I am not given a lecture. Instead, we are having a conversation about [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] and [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is asking me questions and patiently listens to my responses.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3435: But this is not what the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] told me!
EVTDESC_MNM_3436: This time around, instead of lecturing, I tried to have a conversation with [From.GetFirstName] and listened patiently to what [From.GetSheHe] had to say. We discussed [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] and the [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] at lengths, and in the end it seemed like [From.GetFirstName] understood and agreed with my point of view!
EVTDESC_MNM_3437: This time around, instead of lecturing, I tried to have a conversation with [From.GetFirstName] and listened patiently to what [From.GetSheHe] had to say. Sadly, even though [From.GetSheHe] was more willing to listen to me as well, [From.GetHerHis] opinions were set in stone. [From.GetSheHeCap] refused to question the things the [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] had taught [From.GetHerHim].
secret_religions_induct_child_desc: As someone who has influence over the upbringing of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can make an attempt to secretly induct [Root.GetHerHim] into the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.
secret_religions_induct_child_allow_tt: Is not a secret believer in the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith\n
secret_religions_induct_child_effect: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to teach [Root.GetHerHim] about the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
secret_religions_induct_child_power_desc: Enables you to induct children in your court to your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
secret_religions_evoke_sympathy_power_de: Enables you to evoke the sympathy of characters in other religion groups than your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
secret_religions_induct_character_power_: Enables you to secretly induct characters into your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
secret_religions_prepare_grounds_power_d: Enables you to spread your true religion secretly among the inhabitants of a county in your realm by right-clicking its county shield in the county view. If you openly adopt your true faith, these counties will convert as well. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.
secret_religions_openly_adopt_faith_powe: Enables you to openly adopt your true faith. The other secretly religious characters and counties of your true faith in the realm will convert with you. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.
benedictine_power_diligent_tt: Power: §YBenedictine Diligence§!\nUpon reaching rank 4, you will be approached by a fellow member of the Benedictine Order who will help you to become more diligent.
monastic_orders_go_celibate_power_desc: Enables you to become celibate by using decision in the Intrigue Screen.
monastic_orders_stop_celibate_power_desc: Enables you to stop being celibate by using decision in the Intrigue Screen.
monastic_orders_invite_ascetic_power_des: Enables you to invite a learned ascetic member of the order to your court.
crown_of_majesty_desc: The hooped crown is made from gold and decorated with foreign precious stones  emeralds, rubies, sapphires and diamonds  the finest ones the size of quails eggs.
emerald_scepter_desc: This scepter is famed for the unusual amount and quality of emeralds adorning it. The origins of the stones are shrouded in mysteries, the tales are as numerous as the stars.
sword_of_heroes_desc: This ornamental weapon is an impressive sight. The blade is gilded and the hilt is adorned with foreign precious stones, such as rubies and sapphires, and agate cameos depicting legendary warriors.
crown_of_pearls_desc: Every inch of this golden hooped golden crown is covered in pearls of all sizes, complemented by sapphires, as well as cameos depicting religious characters engraved in mother-of-pearl.
ruby_scepter_desc: This golden scepter, adorned with opals, almandines and pearls, is crowned by an impressively big and lustrous ruby.
golden_sword_desc: This gilded blade and hilt, while useless in battle, will impress their holders every subject. The pommel is decorated with a single, magnificent emerald.
the_lily_crown_desc: The mass of garnets and opals are truly made justice by the silver and gilded base of this crown. The model is an open one with four stylized lilies.
noble_scepter_desc: This scepter signifies its holder's right to rule. The gilded rod is adorned with pearls and garnets.
engraved_sword_desc: This sword will not bring its bearer much luck on the battlefield, but the adorned blade and gilded hilt is a beautiful sight indeed.
EVTDESC_MNM_9100: During the last few days, I have overheard the same conversation again and again. Apparently, a most renowned goldsmith is traveling through [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and my courtiers are prattling excitedly about [smith.GetHerHis] work. Perhaps I should invite this [smith.GetManWoman] and employ [smith.GetHerHis] services?
EVTOPTA_MNM_9100: Nothing displays authority like fine jewelry.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9100_TT: Invite the famous goldsmith to your court.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9100: I have no money to spare for such frivolities.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9100_TT: Do not invite the goldsmith to your court.
EVTDESC_MNM_9103: The goldsmith, [From.GetTitledFirstName], courteously accepted my invitation and arrived at court a mere week later. [From.GetSheHeCap] has presented me with some sketches of [From.GetHerHis] previous work and several letters of recommendation. I am assured of [From.GetHerHis] skill, although I ask myself just how much money I can spare for a set of crown jewels.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9103: One and all shall see the indisputable might of house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9103_TT: Spare no expenses and order the most expensive crown jewels money can buy.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_9103: I will order something impressive, but sensible.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9103_TT: Order crown jewels which are 'impressive, but sensible'.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_9103: Surely good craftsmanship is the most important aspect?
EVTOPTC_MNM_9103_TT: Order the least costly set of crown jewels.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_9103: I have changed my mind. You services are no longer required.
EVTDESC_MNM_9105: I was overcome by excitement and curiosity when [From.GetFirstName] informed me the crown jewels were completed! As I am waiting in my throne for [From.GetHerHis] servants to carry the great box across the room I struggle not to leap up and meet them half-way. When I finally touch the heavy lid, my hands are shaking...
EVTDESC_MNM_9106: [From.GetFirstName] has kept me up to date on the progress of the crown jewelry. I knew they were nearing completion, but when the heavy box was brought to me today, I was still momentarily breathless with excitement!
EVTDESC_MNM_9107: A heavy box has been brought before me. [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] work and the crown jewels are completed. While I expect no artifact of legends, I am still excited to see [From.GetHerHis] handiwork.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9107: Let us see what [From.GetSheHe] has accomplished...
dagger_of_glory_desc: This dagger, with its gilded blade and heavily adorned hilt, radiates power. Gleaming rubies, garnets and diamonds are placed in swirling patterns along the hilt.
ruby_bracelets_desc: These golden bracelets are decorated with rubies and engraved pieces of ivory.
bejeweled_dagger_desc: The finely crafted dagger has a pommel set with sapphires and amethysts. The hilt is decorated with elaborately embroidered patterns in gold and silver threads.
golden_bracelets_desc: A set of heavy gold bracelets with intricate engravings and filigree.
engraved_dagger_desc: Intricate patterns and famous poems are engraved into the blade of this dagger. Its hilt is embroidered with silver thread and adorned with opals and pearls.
silver_bracelets_desc: These heavy silver bracelets are beautifully engraved and adorned with ivory and glimmering crystals.
celestial_necklace_desc: With its dozens upon dozens of diamonds and sapphires, this necklace is as beautiful as the night sky itself. Its centerpiece is a marvelous, walnut-sized blue diamond.
necklace_of_radiance_desc: When the light hits it, the gold and rubies of this necklace sparkle as if on fire.
collar_of_pearls_desc: Hoops upon hoops of pearls create the base for this necklace. An extra dimension is added to the piece by a dozen pea-sized amethysts.
circlet_of_the_heavens_desc: This majestic circlet is adorned with golden wings and uncommonly big and lustrous sapphires.
staff_of_majesty_desc: This heavy gilded staff is engraved with scenes from ancient tales and adorned with both emeralds and ivory.
circlet_of_the_sun_desc: When light falls upon the wearer of this circlet, the gold and rubies glow like the sun itself.
golden_staff_desc: This gilded staff is covered in the most intricate engravings.
circlet_of_twilight_desc: The circlet is a beautiful silver hoop adorned with pyropes and pearls.
crown_of_crows_desc: This golden masterpiece is decorated with filigree leaves and vines. A dozen gleaming crows with amber eyes are perched along the top, their wings spread out as if they are about to take flight.
crown_of_the_sea_desc: The peaks of the silver crown are shaped and engraved to look like the crest of waves. A dozen pearls are spaced out evenly along the band.
iron_crown_desc: While this crown is not fashioned out of the noblest of materials, the craftsmanship is excellent. It is decorated with filigree in geometrical patterns, enhanced with pieces of silver.
heros_crown_desc: The base of the crown is a heavy golden band, and each peak is shaped and engraved in the likeness of legendary warriors. The centerpiece is a single, gleaming ruby.
axe_of_the_ancestors_desc: This gilded axe is engraved with pictures from the ancestral legends. Ambers are set in the handle.
amber_crown_desc: This silver crown is decorated with engravings depicting the gods and decorated with fine pieces of amber.
obsidian_axe_desc: The shape of this axe is simple because the material is impressive enough on its own. The head is made from the blackest and glossiest of obsidian.
engraved_crown_desc: This iron crown, while of a common material, is truly an impressive piece of craftsmanship with its detailed engravings.
ceremonial_axe_desc: A beautiful ceremonial axe set with polished colored stones.
EVTDESC_MNM_9109: 'I am most sorry, my [Root.GetTitle],' [From.GetFirstName] said apologetically. The goldsmith has informed me that the precious metals and gemstones needed to produce the crown jewels I ordered are impossible to find in my own realm. 'I can send a [From.GetManWoman] on an expedition to acquire said materials, although it will be costly.'
EVTOPTA_MNM_9109: Send someone to the end of the world, if need be!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9109_TT: Insist that you shall have the crown jewels you ordered, despite the extra cost.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_9109: I am not made of money. Do your best with what is available.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9109_TT: Settle for a less luxurious set of crown jewels than the ones you initially ordered.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_9109_TT: Insist that you shall have the crown jewels you ordered, despite the extra cost.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_9109: Do what you can with local materials.
EVTOPTD_MNM_9109_TT: Settle for a less luxurious set of crown jewels than the ones you initially ordered.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_9115: Our own smiths are capable enough!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9118: You can never go wrong with a good sword.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9118: You can never go wrong with a good scimitar.
EVTOPTC_MNM_9118: A lance is what I desire.
EVTOPTD_MNM_9118: I have always been one for axes.
EVTOPTE_MNM_9118: I will crush my enemies with a mace!
EVTOPTF_MNM_9118: A fine bow would serve me well.
EVTDESC_MNM_9120: A [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. I see. An excellent choice, my [Root.GetTitle] says [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] and calls forward the assistant cradling three [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]s in [From.GetHerHis] arms. "I have three examples of different quality levels here. One must determine what one needs and how much one is willing to pay, however they would all serve your Highness well."
EVTOPTA_MNM_9120: I would not go in to battle with anything but the very best.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9120: I do not need any frills, craft me something effective.
EVTOPTC_MNM_9120: I am sure whatever you make is good enough, [From.GetMasterMistressCap].
EVTDESC_MNM_9122: I was struck with nervous excitement when [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] announced that the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [From.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. A sturdy box is in [From.GetHerHis] arms, and as [From.GetSheHe] opens the lid, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'
EVTOPTA_MNM_9122_SWORD: This sword will be known as Heartseeker!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9122_LANCE: This lance will be known as The Impaler!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9122_AXE: This axe will be known as Cleaver!
EVTOPTA_MNM_9122_BOW: This bow will be known as Silent Wind!
EVTOPTB_MNM_9122_SWORD: My every foe shall fear Vengeance!
EVTOPTB_MNM_9122_SCIMITAR: Scimitar of Fortune is a fitting name, no?
EVTOPTB_MNM_9122_LANCE: My every foe shall fear The Trident!
EVTOPTB_MNM_9122_AXE: My every foe shall fear The Ravager!
EVTOPTB_MNM_9122_MACE: My every foe shall fear The Bone Breaker!
EVTOPTB_MNM_9122_BOW: My every foe shall fear Lightning!
EVTOPTC_MNM_9122_SWORD: She looks like a Fury, doesn't she?
EVTOPTC_MNM_9122_LANCE: The Piercer is a fitting name, no?
EVTOPTC_MNM_9122_AXE: She looks like a Marauder, doesn't she?
EVTOPTC_MNM_9122_MACE: The Shatterer is a fitting name, no?
EVTOPTC_MNM_9122_BOW: She looks like an Eagle, doesn't she?
EVTDESC_MNM_9124: [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]'s main assistant has brought me the finished [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. There are no engravings or precious materials to enhance it, but the design has some elegance of its own. Looking pretty is not her main purpose, anyway.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9124: I am sure she will serve me well.
EVTDESC_MNM_4452:
[From.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

We are delighted by your decision to join our ranks as a lay member, [Root.GetTitle]. Together we shall strive for the betterment of ourselves and our fellow [Root.GetReligiousPerson]s by following [From.GetMOCode].

[From.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_6901: I am trying to focus on my training, but [From.GetSheHe] is always there! No matter if I am studying in the great Order library, hid behind piles of books, or sparring with a fellow Assassin, [From.GetTitledFirstName] apparently has to do the same. And [From.GetHerHis] taunts and snide comments! They are driving me mad!
EVTOPTA_MNM_6901: It is time to really determine who the superior assassin is.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6901_TT: Challenge §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. This might have a number of outcomes, depending on whether you win or lose and how [From.GetSheHe] takes it. You might learn a permanent or temporary skill, get injured, gain a new friend or declare a new rival.
EVTOPTB_MNM_6901: Let [From.GetHerHim] try  I am not easily provoked!
EVTOPTB_MNM_6901_TT: Ignore §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and focus on your training.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6908_A: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was not slow to accept my challenge. It was a simple one: we would both craft disguises and enter the nearby town at noon the next day. The first person to spot the other, sneak up on them and place a dagger at their throat would be the winner!
EVTDESC_MNM_6908_B: [From.GetTitledFirstName] gladly accepted my challenge. We decided to not complicate anything  a duel at midday the following day, a pair of daggers our only weapons. The first person to draw blood would be the winner.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6908_TT: The challenge is about to begin.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6903_A: I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun, but this was what my training prepared me for. I kept my eyes peeled and within the hour I spotted another whose gait was incredibly familiar. As I placed the dagger against [From.GetFirstName]'s throat, [From.GetSheHe] laughed heartily. ' A fair victory, [Root.GetSocietyRank].'
EVTDESC_MNM_6903_B: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. We had been at it for... hours? I knew I would not last for much longer, and as a last desperate measure, I fearlessly lunged at [From.GetHerHim]. We fell to the ground and I managed to nick [From.GetHerHis] arm. [From.GetFirstName]'s body shook as [From.GetSheHe] laughed underneath me. 'A fair victory, [Root.GetSocietyRank].'
EVTDESC_MNM_6903_C: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I did not remember when we had lost our weapons. Now we were wrestling on the ground, neither of us getting enough of an advantage, sweat soaking our clothes and stinging our eyes. 'Draw?' I breathed. 'Alright, draw,' [From.GetFirstName] chuckled in response.
EVTDESC_MNM_6903_D: I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun. Where was [From.GetTitledFirstName]? I scanned the crowd nervously, but nothing. And then  the coolness of a blade against my throat. 'Impressive disguise, [From.GetSocietyRank]. I mean it,' [From.GetFirstName] chuckled and gave me a hearty pat on the back.
EVTDESC_MNM_6903_E: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I had to try my very hardest to keep [From.GetHerHim] at bay. A droplet of sweat fell into my eye, and as I instinctively raised my hand to wipe it away, [From.GetFirstName] lunged and nicked my arm as we fell. 'Good match, [From.GetSocietyRank],' [From.GetSheHe] chuckled and rolled over on [From.GetHerHis] back.
EVTOPTB_MNM_6903_TT: You realize that you had a crush on §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! all along and profess your feelings.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6903: Now we both know who the best is.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6903_TT: Tell your fellow assassins about how you won over §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6904_A: I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun, but this was what my training prepared me for. I kept my eyes peeled and within the hour I spotted another whose gait was incredibly familiar. As I placed the dagger against [From.GetFirstName]'s throat, [From.GetSheHe] cursed my name.
EVTDESC_MNM_6904_B: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. We had been at it for... hours? I knew I would not last for much longer, and as a last desperate measure, I fearlessly lunged at [From.GetHerHim]. We fell to the ground and I managed to nick [From.GetHerHis] arm. [From.GetFirstName] cursed me loudly as [From.GetSheHe] pushed my body off [From.GetHerHis].
EVTOPTA_MNM_6904: Who is the master now, you [GetRootFromInsult]!
EVTOPTB_MNM_6904_TT: Now that you have won over §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, go back to ignoring [From.GetHerHim].\n
EVTDESC_MNM_6905_A: I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun. Where was [From.GetTitledFirstName]? I scanned the crowd nervously, but nothing. And then  the coolness of a blade against my throat. 'Who laughs now, [Root.GetFirstName]?' [From.GetFirstName] whispered before slashing the dagger across my shoulder.
EVTDESC_MNM_6905_B: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I had to try my very hardest to keep [From.GetHerHim] at bay. A droplet of sweat fell into my eye, and as I instinctively raised my hand to wipe it away, [From.GetFirstName] lunged and slashed the blade across my dagger hand with a triumphant shout.
EVTDESC_MNM_6907_A: I could read [From.GetFirstName]'s answer in [From.GetHerHis] eyes as soon as the words had escaped my lips and my heart sank like a stone. It took [From.GetHerHim] a moment to recollect [From.GetHerselfHimself]. 'I am flattered, [From.GetFirstName]. Really, I am. But... I do not feel the same way. I'm sorry. Let us be friends?'
EVTDESC_MNM_6907_B: For a moment, the world stood still. I could not breathe. Then the most radiant, heart-warming smile spread across [From.GetFirstName]'s [From.GetFaceDescription] face. 'I thought you would never ask, [Root.GetFirstName].'
EVTOPTC_MNM_6907: I am honored to be your friend, [From.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_6907: I... I don't think I can do that.
focused_on_training_desc: This character is spending all their time in focused training to master their skills with disguises and daggers as well as knowledge of foreign languages and customs.
won_duel_desc: This character won a duel against an opponent.
EVTDESC_MNM_6922_A: I have found out that my superior, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], has a guilty pleasure. Despite [From.GetHerHis] sober appearance, when no one is watching, [From.GetSheHe] feasts on wine and treats. I have requested a meeting with [From.GetHerHim] and dropped a hint about my recently acquired knowledge. How should I use it to my advantage?
EVTDESC_MNM_6922_B: I have found out that my superior, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], has a guilty pleasure. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a slave to [From.GetHerHis] carnal passions  I saw [From.GetHerHim] together with [lover_of_target.GetTitledFirstName] myself. I have requested a meeting with [From.GetHerHim] and dropped a hint about my recently acquired knowledge. How should I use it to my advantage?
EVTDESC_MNM_6922_C: A while ago, I noticed the frail nature of my superior, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. People whisper about the [GetRootFromInsult], but no one has dared to draw any attention to the matter. However, for all [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] knows, maybe there is a plot in the workings! I could blackmail [From.GetHerHim] to get what I want.
EVTOPTD_MNM_6922: I will win [From.GetHerHis] trust by a promise to be on [From.GetHerHis] side.
EVTDESC_MNM_6912: While the uninitiated might believe that assassins always operate on their own, this is rarely the case. That being said, we are often occupied with our own, equally important, missions. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has asked for my help assassinating [assassin_quest_target.GetTitledFirstName], however I am unsure if I can spare the time...
EVTOPTA_MNM_6912: Help me end [my_quest_target.GetTitledFirstName] and you shall have my blade.
EVTOPTB_MNM_6912: Pull some strings for me, and I'll help you.
EVTOPTD_MNM_6912: I am sorry, I am too occupied.
EVTDESC_MNM_10020_A: They are all staring at me, whispering behind my back! As I turn my head towards them, they look away, but I am sure of it. They know. Perhaps not the specifics, but they know. They will come for me, any day now. Being one of [Root.Society.GetName] always felt worth the risk, but I am not so sure anymore...
EVTDESC_MNM_10020_B: Some days, I think I am going insane. It is probably all in my head, but sometimes I notice people staring at me. When my courtiers whisper it is impossible to shake the suspicion that it might be about me. Being one of [Root.Society.GetName] always felt worth the risk, but I am not so sure anymore...
EVTOPTA_MNM_10020: How long before I crack under the pressure?
EVTDESC_MNM_3502: The last few months have been tough, so when I was invited to the home of [From.GetTitledFirstName] for a small ceremony, it felt like a gift from [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. [From.GetHerHisCap] words about staying brave and the importance of community touched me deeply. I mentioned this after the ceremony was over, and we ended up talking for hours.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3502: Thank you. Now I realize I am not alone.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3502: I feel as if there is a special connection between us, [From.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTB_MNM_3502_TT: Listening to the words of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! touched you deep, deep down. Confess your romantic feelings to [From.GetHerHim].
EVTDESC_MNM_3506_A: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] inability to tell a good lie is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
EVTDESC_MNM_3506_B: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] bad temper and inability to keep quiet is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
EVTDESC_MNM_3506_C: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] sloppiness and tendency to forget [From.GetHerHis] things everywhere is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
EVTDESC_MNM_3506_D: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] tendency to trust just about anyone is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
EVTDESC_MNM_3506_E: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] unawareness and indiscreet behavior is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_3506_TT: You approach §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and offer [From.GetHerHim] your help in dealing with [From.GetHerHis] struggles to keep [From.GetHerHis] true religion hidden.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3506: My assistance does not come for free.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3506_TT: You approach §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and offer [From.GetHerHim] your help in dealing with [From.GetHerHis] struggles to keep [From.GetHerHis] true religion hidden in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
EVTOPTC_MNM_3506: I have my own problems to deal with.
EVTDESC_MNM_3507_A: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my honesty. 'Normally, it is a fine quality in a [Root.GetTrueReligionPerson], but you ought to be more careful.' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become a better liar.
EVTDESC_MNM_3507_B: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my angry outbursts. 'If you lose your head, you can put all of us in danger. You never know who might hear you!' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me manage my anger.
EVTDESC_MNM_3507_C: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my occasional sloppiness. 'Normally, I would not dare to criticize, but I fear your tendency to forget things here and there is a threat our secret.' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more attentive.
EVTDESC_MNM_3507_D: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my trustful nature. 'Normally, it is a fine quality in a [Root.GetTrueReligionPerson], but you ought to be more wary.' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more careful.
EVTDESC_MNM_3507_E: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my indiscreet behavior. 'Our secret is not easy to keep, but all of our lives depend on it, [Root.GetFirstName].' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more aware of my actions.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3507_TT: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will attempt to help you hide your true religion.\n
EVTOPT_MNM_3507_SUCCESS_TT: your visibility and risk of discovery decreasing.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3507: I think it might be worth a try.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3507_TT: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will attempt to help you hide your true religion in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_3507: Nonsense! I am doing just fine.
EVTDESC_MNM_3508: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] listened to my concerns and agreed to accept my help. Since then, we have met a few evenings each week to work on [From.GetHerHis] flaws together. It has been a struggle, but [From.GetFirstName] has been a diligent student and I am most pleased with [From.GetHerHis] development!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3508_TT: The visibility and risk of discovery of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! decreases.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3509: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] listened to my concerns and agreed to accept my help. Since then, we have met a few evenings each week to work on [From.GetHerHis] flaws together. I knew it would not be easy, but despite our hardest efforts, [From.GetSheHe] has not made much progress.
EVTDESC_MNM_3510: When I approached [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] simply dismissed my concerns. I plead to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] to keep the fool in check and all of us safe!
EVTDESC_MNM_3511: Since our conversation a few weeks ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I have met a few evenings each week. It has been a struggle, I cannot deny that, but in the end it was all worth it. [From.GetFirstName] is proud of my development and I am relieved to no longer be a danger to [Root.Society.GetName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_3511: I thank you for your help and patience, [From.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_3511_TT: Your visibility and risk of discovery has decreased.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3512: Since our conversation a few weeks ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I have met a few evenings each week to work together. It has been a struggle. I have tried my very best, but can I deny that which is in my nature? Did not [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] create me like this?
EVTOPTA_MNM_3512: I hope [From.GetFirstName] isn't too disappointed with me.
quest_devil_worshipers_desecrate_temple_: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the title shield of §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!, select §Y'Desecrate Temple'§! and successfully desecrate the [FromFrom.GetHolding] of §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!.
EVTDESC_MNM_10023_ASSASSINS:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. As defending the Shia Religion and its followers is the reason why exist, our foremost duty, this is an act of the highest degree of treachery. If you want to keep your life, never cross our path again. 

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_10023_MO:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. While we hope you will realize your grave error and return to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName], we cannot be lenient. You are banned from [From.Society.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_10023_SR_A:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you have publicly embraced the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. While your devotion is admirable, it has put you in a perilous position and we can no longer remain in contact with you.

[From.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_10023_SR_B:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. While we hope you will realize the grave errors of your ways and return to [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], we cannot be lenient. We must protect our own. If you betray our secrets, we will drag you down with us.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_10023: Seems like I made some enemies today.
EVTDESC_MNM_10019: You no longer fulfill the requirements for joining [From.GetName].
EVTDESC_MNM_7005_ALT: What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie? [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is a liar. Reject the Tyrant deity and let [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] guide your steps..."
EVTDESC_MNM_7010_ALT: I found some cryptic scrawlings written in blood on my bedroom door this morning. The guards say they haven't seen anyone enter during the night and I dare not ask my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] to decipher it. Yet, I think I understand... The mark of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]...
EVTOPTA_7010_TT_1_ALT: You carve [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark into your arm, just like the one §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! showed you.\n
EVTDESC_WOL_11008: You're well aware that a duel with [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a great challenge, but you step up to it and the fight begins. A crowd has gathered to witness the event, and you have no idea if their deafening cheers are meant for you or your opponent. The commotion is overwhelming, and you quickly find yourself without a sword, your hand badly cut and unable to grasp the weapon to continue the duel. You try pleading for mercy, but get but nothing but silence in reply as [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises [From.GetHerHis] sword to your throat and stabs. While you fade from this world the last thing you hear is the cheering crowd.
quest_monastic_order_donate_to_charity_t: To complete this mission, select §Y'Donate to Charity'§!.
EVTDESC_4400_REMOVE_LUSTFUL: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. My attempts to follow in the footsteps of [Root.GetMOSaint] has led me to realize the sinful nature of my lusts. I will try to see [Root.GetMenWomenPreference] for who they are, and not simply objects of my desire, from now on.
EVTDESC88000_ASSASSIN: Finally, a new era of righteousness has begun. For many years we have worked in the shadows, but the rumors are no longer whispered. The name of 'Hassan-i Sabbah', the conqueror of our mountain fortress of Alamut, is known throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and beyond. The faithful and meek shall find shelter under our wings while the impious and infidels shall fear our fury!
EVTDESC88001_ASSASSIN: News of our Order's successful occupation of the mountain fortress of Masyaf in Syria is spreading. Our enemies, the infidels and the impious, have begun to realize what they are dealing with. May they cower in fear!
EVTDESC88002_ASSASSIN: With the fall of our last fortress, our Order has been forced into hiding. Some may think this is the end, but they are fools. We have worked from the shadows before and will do so again. One day we shall rise again, mightier than ever!
EVTOPTA88002_ASSASSIN: This setback will not be the end of The Assassins!
EVTDESC88004_ASSASSIN: This is a dark day, indeed. Our righteous order has suffered an enormous setback. All of our mountain fortresses and hideouts have been found and burnt to the ground. The few members who survived the infidels' onslaught are hiding amongst enemies, always in danger. While an era has ended and even though our former glory might never be restored, we shall never give up.
EVTDESC88003_ASSASSIN: Praised be Allah! The Assassins will never be broken! We have suffered in the shadows for many years, but now, a new era begins. We rebuilt our strength and recaptured the mountain fortresses of old. Our enemies will sleep with one eye open from now on...
ALLY_ORDER_PROVINCE_NOT_HOSTILE: §RYou cannot give this order unless the County is occupied by the enemy.§!
PORTRAIT_PROPERTY_TRIGGER: Portrait layer $LAYER|Y$ is using property number $INDEX|Y$.
PORTRAIT_PROPERTY_TRIGGER_NOT: Portrait layer $LAYER|Y$ is not using property number $INDEX|Y$.
ALLY_ORDER_DELAYED_TOOLTIP: You can give directions to allied armies, though they might not always comply.
IS_DEVIL_WORSHIPPER_TRIGGER: Is member of a §YDevil Worshipper§! society\n
COUNCIL_TAKE_ACTION_DELAYED: Take the action the council is currently considering. Note that if the council votes no, this will incur tyranny.
COUNCIL_START_VOTE_DELAYED_PLAYER: Have the council vote on the law they're currently considering.
COUNCIL_START_VOTE_DELAYED_LIEGE: Use a favor to have the council vote on what they're currently considering.
COUNCIL_END_CONSIDERATION_DELAYED: Have the council stop considering the issue at hand.
COUNCIL_CONSIDER_INTERACTION: §GRight-click to have the council consider the issue§!
monastic_order_rejoin_world_desc: Leave seclusion and rejoin the world.\nIt will be some time until you can seclude yourself once more.
UNOCCUPIED_DEMESNE_TITLE: Has an unoccupied demesne county or barony\n
COUNCIL_POSITION_HUMAN: §YLikely Council Position§!\nThe council position of a human player cannot be predicted.
COUNCIL_POSITION_SCORES: §YLikely Council Positions§!\nThe higher the score, the more likely it is the character will choose the given council position. Note that the actual appointment to the council may change some of the factors involved.\n--------------
MOD_REALM_SIZE_DIFF: Realm size compared to $WHO|Y$ multiplied by $FACTOR|Y$
MOD_REALM_SIZE: Realm size divided by $DIVISOR|Y$, squared, then multiplied by $FACTOR|Y$
CANNOT_JOIN_FACTION_TRUCE: §RYou are not allowed to join factions while you have a truce with your liege.§!
SOCIETY_TRIGGER_NOT: Is NOT the same society as $SOCIETY|Y$
FLANK_HAS_TACTIC_NOT: Flank does NOT utilize the tactic $TACTIC|Y$
DAMAGE_UNIT_EFFECT_PERCENTAGE: Army suffers $PERCENTAGE|Y%$ of its troops as casualties
DAMAGE_UNIT_MORALE_EFFECT: Army suffers a morale loss of $VALUE|+$
DAMAGE_UNIT_MORALE_EFFECT_NEGATIVE: Army gains a morale boost of $VALUE|+$
secret_religions_found_secret_religious_: Create a following enabling you to sow seeds of the true faith in the darkness until you have enough followers to emerge from the shadows.
secret_religions_openly_adopt_faith_desc: The followers of [Root.Society.GetNameCap] has for too long lurked in the shadows. The time has finally come to reveal our true beliefs now that we are so many that we can no longer be ignored.
EVTDESC_MNM_3800: The time has come! [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] believes our secret community of faithful has grown strong enough to no longer need to hide in the shadows. It is time to profess to the entire realm that I am a true follower of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], standing proud with my [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] brothers and sisters!
EVTDESC_MNM_3810: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed an astounding secret. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. I have long held an interest in the practices of [From.TrueReligion.GetName] believers, and [From.GetFirstName] has encouraged all those who hold true faith in their heart to profess.
EVTOPTB_MNM_3810: I wish to understand the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith, but it is still wrong.
EVTDESC_MNM_3820: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed a shocking truth. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. For years they have been building communities of adherents to their faith, and there are even places in my own lands where most of the populace prays to [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3820: How did they keep it secret for so long?
EVTDESC_MNM_3830: While [From.GetTitledFirstName] has always been a little strange, I never could have known that [From.GetSheHe] was secretly a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]! Along with a community of other nobles in my realm who have been harboring infidel beliefs for years, [From.GetSheHe] has now openly professed to what [From.GetSheHe] dares call 'the true faith.'
EVTDESC_MNM_3850: While there are only a handful of them, there are a few people in [target_province.GetName] who by the grace of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] are willing to attend our hidden [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] sermons. It will take a long time, but they will become true converts, and will be able to spread our message to ever more new believers. One day we will openly join together in our faith, without fear of persecution.
EVTDESC_MNM_3858: With the passing of [target_province.GetName] from our realm, my fellow believers and I are finding it to be more challenging than ever to spread the word of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] there.\nPeople seemed to be listening, but for now our efforts must be abandoned until we find a new opportunity.
EVTDESC_MNM_3860: Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] has proven far easier than I thought. The populace seems unusually receptive to the word of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], and as the congregation grows in number, so does its influence. We may have a self-sustaining community of believers sooner than we thought.
EVTDESC_MNM_3870: Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] is going well. As the congregation grows in number, so does its influence, and more people turn to the faith.
EVTDESC_MNM_3880: Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] is not working out. The preachers I have given charge of the congregation to are struggling to attract new believers, and without growth even some of our early converts are starting to harbor doubts.
