EVTOPTC_MNM_4611_TT: Using your superior sense of subterfuge you might stand a decent chance at successfully taking the relic without anyone noticing.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_4611: I will ask my lover to help me!
EVTOPTD_MNM_4611_TT: The power of love always succeeds! ...right?\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4614: Deep in the night I have snuck down to the relic's chamber. Adrenaline pumps through my veins as I take hold of the priceless artifact, savoring the feeling of it in my hands... But suddenly I hear the sound of footsteps and turn around to find [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] looking at me with wide eyes!
EVTOPTA_MNM_4614: You have caught me... I submit to the order's judgment.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4614_TT: Surrender to §Y[monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName]§! and do public penance to atone for your actions.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_4614: Use their surprise to make a break for it!
EVTOPTB_MNM_4614_TT: You're sure you can escape, however, this will upset your Brothers and Sisters greatly, and your time with the order will certainly end... Forever.\n
EVTDESC_MNM.4619: I have done it! I have the relic and there is not a scratch on me! I have covered my tracks as best I can. Nobody seems to suspect it was I who killed [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] and took the artifact.
EVTDESC_MNM.4620: I have done it! I have the relic and only suffered a minor scratch in the scuffle. It will heal in time, and I even managed to hide it from my Brothers and Sisters.
EVTDESC_MNM.4621: I have the relic, but it almost literally cost me an arm and a leg... I was lucky to only have lost what I did, and even more so that everyone seemed to believe the tale I spun of bravely fighting off the 'unknown thief'.
EVTOPTA_MNM.4621: I'm not sure this was a good trade...
EVTDESC_MNM.4622: As I dash towards [monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim], [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] does not seem to be as surprised as I took [monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim] for! Swiftly [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSheHe] draws a blade, and as I wrestle [monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim] to the ground I feel the cold metal sink in my chest...
EVTDESC_MNM_4615: I have done it! I have the relic, and shook off my pursuer. But [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] saw me blatantly steal the artifact, and so my life in the order is certainly forfeit...
EVTDESC_MNM_4616: Deep in the night I have snuck down to the relic's chamber. Adrenaline pumps through my veins as I take hold of the priceless artifact... But suddenly I hear the sound of footsteps and turn around to find my lover [monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName] keep [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] distracted, allowing me to make my escape unnoticed!
EVTDESC_MNM_4617: My plan went flawlessly! Not a single soul saw or heard me during the night, and it was not ere daybreak that the theft was discovered. Nobody suspects it was I!
EVTDESC_MNM_4618: My offer of funding a celebration of the relic was well-received, and has heightened my standing in the eyes of my Brothers and Sisters! For many days we sang, prayed and paraded the holy relic around the nearby villages. Donations to the monastery have increased greatly! All in all, it was a tremendous success.
society_pleased_with_celebration: The society's members are pleased with your celebration!\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4624:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I know it was you who murdered [monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName] and who took our prized relic. As soon as I have the necessary proof, I shall expose you to the order!

Signed,
[monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTB_MNM_4624: Allow [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHim] the honor of returning the artifact, and buy [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHis] silence!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4624_TT: Your Brothers and Sisters will undoubtedly be extremely displeased, and your time with the order will certainly end... Forever.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_4624_2_TT: This will place my lover §Y[monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName]§! in a very awkward position!\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4626: I found out that my lover, [monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName], could not bear the shame of being incriminated in my theft of the artifact, and rather stepped out of life than face [monastic_artifact_lover.GetHerHis] Brothers and Sisters any longer.
EVTOPTC_MNM_4610_seamless_robe_of_jesus: Start planning the theft of the §YSeamless Robe of Jesus§!!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4610_crown_of_thorns: Start planning the theft of the §YCrown of Thorns§!!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4610_fragment_of_true_cross: Start planning the theft of the §YFragment of the True Cross§!!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4610_holy_foreskin: Start planning the theft of the §YHoly Prepuce§!!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4610_image_of_edessa: Start planning the theft of the §YImage of Edessa§!!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4610_elaborate_danda: Start planning the theft of the §YJeweled Danda§!!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4610_sariraka_actual_body_pa: Start planning the theft of the §YSariraka Bone§!!
EVTOPTC_MNM_4610_sarira: Start planning the theft of the §YSarira§!!
DW_prolong_life_desc: Kill [Root.GetFirstName] and use [Root.GetHerHis] Lifeforce to prolong your own life.
MNM.7509.d: As the ritual comes to a close, your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] finally dies and you feel the first small trickle of their lifeforce join with your own. All that remains is to consume [From.GetHerHis] organs to absorb the full potential.
MNM.7509.a: The things we do for life...
MNM.7510.d: The unholy vigor which has been sustaining me has faded. Once again I feel every year of my true age, a thoroughly unpleasant experience.
MNM.7510.a: I know what I must do
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_2: Propose that §Y[AdultExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§! should become the guardian of §Y[ChildExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W. As a guardian, §Y[AdultExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W will be responsible for educating §Y[ChildExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W.\n Parents cannot declare war on the guardian of their child, or the liege of the guardian.\n
popular_ruler_desc: This character is well-liked by every ruler nearby.
MNM.70006.d: My [Root.GetMyTreasurerName], [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], has been hard at work in §Y[admin_bonus_province.GetName]§W, increasing infrastructure and motivating the local people to work ever harder!
MNM.70021.d:
My liege,
I write to you with good news! I have successfully sabotaged [From.Location.GetName], causing considerable disruption.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
SOCIETY_HEIR_DESC: The Heir will take over when the §YLeader of the Society§! dies, they are chosen based on §YMember Score§!.
SOCIETY_LEADER_PORTRAIT_EMPTY: You cannot see the §YLeader§! of Secret Societies unless you join.
SOCIETY_HEIR_PORTRAIT_EMPTY: You cannot see the §YHeir§! of Secret Societies unless you join.
SOCIETY_PLAYER_PORTRAIT_EMPTY: You are not a member of this Society.
SOCIETY_PLAYER_TITLE_EMPTY: You have no rank in this Society.
SHOW_INTEREST_DESC: By carefully showing subtle interest in joining this Society you will hopefully be discretely contacted by a member of $SOCIETY|Y$.
STOP_SHOWING_INTEREST_DESC: By refusing to respond to the secret signs flashed at you by shadowy strangers you can make it clear you no longer have any interest in joining $SOCIETY|Y$.
MNM.78002.d: During [From.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] visit to my court, the [From.job_chancellor.GetJobTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.job_chancellor.GetTitledName], has really convinced me of what a benevolent and peaceful ruler [From.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] liege [From.GetTitledName] is.
MNM.78002.a: I feel a new appreciation for [From.GetTitledName]!
EVTDESC_MNM_4022:
Blessed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are pleased to hear that you have safely returned from your pilgrimage, and trust that it has been an inspiring experience for you.
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_4026:
Blessed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are pleased to hear that you have completed the construction of a new [FromFromFromFrom.GetHolding] in [FromFromFromFrom.GetName]. It should go a long way to spread the word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] ever further!
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
DW_demonic_impregnation_desc: Attempt to impregnate [Root.GetBestName] with the Spawn of [From.GetDWDevil]
MNM.70032.d: My [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], has informed me that [suspected_society_member.GetBestName] has been associating with the wrong sort of people.
MNM.70033.d: [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has been told I am a member of an outlawed society.
78001.d2:
My liege, you sent me out to spread word of your good nature and wise rule, yet I can find no ruler who does not already hold you in the highest regard. I beg you for a new assignment.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]
secret_religions_falsely_confess_faith_d: Confess to your liege's faith for political reasons while still practicing your true faith in private. This will allow you to join or found your secret faith's Society.
secret_religions_evoke_sympathy_tt: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to find a way to approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and talk about [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]. If successful, [Root.GetSheHe] may help to convert the realm.\n
secret_religions_evoke_sympathy_cd_tt: Has not been approached to be made sympathetic to people of other religions recently, or is the target of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s mission\n
well_fed_desc: This character has a habit of eating well, and receives all the benefits to health that that entails.
quest_devil_worshipers_desecrate_temple_: The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s of the [From.GetHolding] of [From.GetName] worship their weak, false [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Tear down their powerless idols, torch their holy books and steal their riches in honor of [Root.GetDWDevil]! Right-click the title's shield to perform this action.
EVTDESC_MNM_9601:
Still dressed in traveler's garb, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] enters your throne room and kneels before you. Looking rather pale and a bit sickly, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] produces a small object, placing it gingerly in the palm of your outstretched hand.

'Andvari's Gift... The Andvaranaut, my liege...' [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] whispers reverently. 'It must be. Its power is undeniable, it has already brought me many riches on the road back to the court.' You nod solemnly in response. Though it feels light in your hand, you already feel the burden on your soul. This ring must have enormous power, but you remember hearing in legends the curse that lies upon it...

Regardless, with this find [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has truly surpassed [relic_hunter.GetHerselfHimself]!
EVTDESC_MNM_7032_A:
Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We have become aware that your inductor passed away before being able to complete your recruitment. We therefore wish to rectify this oversight, and offer you membership of [From.Society.GetName].
[From.GetDWExpression]

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_7032_B:
Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We have become aware that your inductor passed away before being able to complete your recruitment. We therefore wish to rectify this oversight, and offer you membership of [From.Society.GetName].
Allahu akbar! Glory to Ali!

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
hermetics_write_magnum_opus_desc: Record your life's work for posterity in an encrypted Magnum Opus.
hermetics_wrote_magnum_opus_cd_tooltip: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not already written a Magnum Opus\n
hermetics_wrote_magnum_opus_duplicate_ri: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on ritualistic Theurgy\n
hermetics_wrote_magnum_opus_duplicate_co: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on contemplative Theurgy\n
hermetics_wrote_magnum_opus_duplicate_st: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on stellar Astrology\n
hermetics_wrote_magnum_opus_duplicate_pl: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on planetary Astrology\n
hermetics_wrote_magnum_opus_duplicate_pa: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on alchemical Universal Panacea\n
hermetics_wrote_magnum_opus_duplicate_tr: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on transmutative Alchemy\n
writing_magnum_opus_desc: This character is writing a Magnum Opus.
EVTDESC_MNM_1610: Secluded at my writing desk, quill in hand and plenty a bottle of ink nearby, I find myself staring down upon the blank parchment. The sheer scale of the task upon which I am about to embark dawns upon me  I need to record my knowledge, but also hide it from those who are unworthy...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1610: It will take a great deal of time and effort, but it will be glorious!
EVTDESC_MNM_1600: Over the past few months I have developed an elaborate cypher that I will use to encode my life's work. However, before I can continue I must decide upon a direction in which to take my Opus, as the sum of all my knowledge is simply too great to be recorded in a single book.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1600: Focus my efforts on writing on Theurgy.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1600_TT: Ascension and union with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is what future generations must strive for.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1600: Focus my efforts on writing on Astrology.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1600_TT: The movements of the stars and planets will allow your successors to understand the mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_1600: Focus my efforts on writing on Alchemy.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1600_TT: Through working with transmutation and healing agents your heirs can transform and perfect themselves.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1601: I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of Theurgy, but it is still too vast to touch upon everything. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Theurgy's aspects.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1601: I will focus on rituals and invocations.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1601_TT: Rituals allow one to invoke the will and presence of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], a necessary first step if one wishes to ultimately unite with the Divine.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1601: I will focus on the art of contemplation and meditation.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1601_TT: Contemplation allows one to draw nearer to the mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], and possibly achieve true Understanding.
EVTDESC_MNM_1602: I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of the stars and planets, but it is still too vast to touch upon all that makes up Astrology. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Astrology's aspects.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1602: I will focus on the stars.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1602_TT: The stars hold extensive knowledge, and proper reading of them will bring one closer to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1602: I will focus on the planets.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1602_TT: The planets, and their motion through the stars, reveal clues about both the mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] as well as the personalities of individuals.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1603: I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of transmutation and panacea, but it is still too vast to touch upon all that makes up Alchemy. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Alchemy's aspects.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1603: I will focus on the Universal Panacea.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1603_TT: The Universal Panacea would cure all diseases and allow life eternal, bringing the natural human body to perfection.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1603_TT: Transforming metals into gold is a necessary stepping stone towards transforming and perfecting oneself.
EVTDESC_MNM_1604: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on ritualistic Theurgy. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
EVTDESC_MNM_1605: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on contemplative Theurgy. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1605: Open your mind to the Truth of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
EVTDESC_MNM_1606: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on stellar Astrology. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
EVTDESC_MNM_1607: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on planetary Astrology. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1607: The Will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is revealed in the movement of the planets!
EVTDESC_MNM_1608: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on alchemical Universal Panacea. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1608: Perfect is the body that is free from disease and age!
EVTDESC_MNM_1609: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on transmutative Alchemy. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1609: Turn metal into gold, and the soul will follow suit!
magnum_opus_theurgy_ritual_1_desc: This Magnum Opus contains many secrets of ritualistic Theurgy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.

magnum_opus_alchemy_transmutation_2_desc: This Magnum Opus of excellent quality contains many secrets of transmutative Alchemy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
magnum_opus_alchemy_transmutation_3_desc: This Magnum Opus of extraordinary quality contains many secrets of transmutative Alchemy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
magnum_opus_alchemy_transmutation_4_desc: This masterwork Magnum Opus contains many secrets of transmutative Alchemy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
EVTDESC_RIP_12099_NOTE: Your [From.GetJobTitle], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, has secluded [From.GetReflexivePronoun] in §Y[From.Location.GetName]§! and is thus unable to perform [From.GetPossPronoun] tasks for the time being.
decision_abduct_desc: Attempt to abduct and imprison §Y[This.GetBestName]§! with the help of your brethren in §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
EVTDESC_MNM_20070: I have put the word out among my brethren in [Root.Society.GetName]. When an opportunity presents itself, the brothers and sisters in [From.Capital.GetName] will attempt to snatch [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and bring [From.GetObjectPronoun] to me in chains...
EVTDESC_MNM_20101: There is no point trying to abduct [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] anymore, considering [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is dead!
EVTDESC_MNM_20102: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has ended up in prison, so there is no point trying to abduct [FromFromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] anymore.
EVTDESC_MNM_20103: My brethren are not having much luck in their attempts to abduct [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. Perhaps [Root.Society.GetName] are not influential enough to pull it off... Should I call it off?
EVTTOOLTIP_MNM_20103: Chances would improve if our Society Influence was higher in the world...
EVTDESC_MNM_20104: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has joined [Root.Society.GetName], so the brethren will no longer assist with [FromFromFrom.GetPossPronoun] abduction.
EVTDESC_MNM_20081: My fellows in [Root.Society.GetName] have informed me that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] plans to travel the realm incognito for a lark, mingling with the common folk. [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] will only be protected by two loyal friends during this little adventure  a great opportunity to have [FromFromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] abducted, if I so wished...
EVTDESC_MNM_20081_CHILD: My fellows in [Root.Society.GetName] have managed to insert themselves among the servants of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and stand ready to snatch the child at my command.
EVTOPTB_MNM_20081: No... I have a bad feeling about this.
EVTTOOLTIP_MNM_20081: The plan to abduct [This.GetFirstName] is set in motion.
EVTDESC_MNM_20082_CHILD: I had been playing with my friends for hours in the field when one of my attendants suddenly made a strange noise and keeled over. All hell broke loose as the guards and servants started fighting each other. A veteran soldier picked me up and started running back towards home...
EVTDESC_MNM_20082_BABY: Someone is picking me up. I don't know this strange lady, and where is she taking me..?
EVTOPT_MNM_20082_CHILD_CAUGHT: ...but he stumbles and falls, blow dart in his neck!
EVTOPT_MNM_20082_CHILD: ...and keeps running, saving me from the traitors!
EVTOPT_MNM_20082_BABY: The guards stopped the lady and brought me back.
EVTTOOLTIP_MNM_20082_PERP: My guards tell me they suspect [From.GetTitledName] of this outrage!
EVTDESC_MNM_20083: My competent brethren in [Root.Society.GetName] managed to snatch [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] from [From.GetPossPronoun] guards and bring [From.GetObjectPronoun] to me in a sack!
EVTOPTB_MNM_20103: No, I'll just have to be patient.
stop_abduct_decision_desc: Call off my Society members from abducting my current target.
stop_abduct_decision_target_desc: Stop trying to abduct §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§!. I should turn my attention elsewhere...
EVTDESC20022: Your [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§!, was attacked by heathens in §Y[wounded_location.GetName]§! while trying to spread the faith.
EVTDESC_WOL_2080_DW: I can hardly believe it, but I have uncovered proof that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] consorts with demons and secretly worships [FromFromFrom.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] is a member of a cult called [FromFromFrom.Society.GetName]... How should I use this explosive information?
EVTDESC_WOL_2080_CULTIST: I have uncovered proof that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] is a member of a subversive cult called [FromFromFrom.Society.GetName]... How should I use this explosive information?
EVTDESC_WOL_2081_DW: [From.GetTitledName] has found out that I am a member of [Root.Society.GetName]! This is obviously a disaster and a just cause for imprisonment, title revokation... or execution.
EVTDESC_WOL_2081_CULTIST: [From.GetTitledName] claims to have proof that I am a member of [Root.Society.GetName]  just cause for arrest and imprisonment!
EVTDESC_WOL_2082_DW: [From.GetTitledName] has provided me with undeniable proof that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is a witch and a demon worshipper! How should I use this information?
EVTDESC_WOL_2082_CULTIST: [From.GetTitledName] has provided me with undeniable proof that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is a member of [target_spy_on.Society.GetName]! How should I use this information?
EVTDESC_WOL_2086_DW: [From.GetTitledName] says that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] knows I'm a witch and a demon worshipper and claims to have witnesses that can testify against me! However, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...
EVTDESC_WOL_2086_CULTIST: [From.GetTitledName] says that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] knows I'm a member of [Root.Society.GetName] and claims to have witnesses that can testify against me! However, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...
devil_worshipers_demonic_possession_powe: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of your vassals, courtiers, and rivals, in an attempt to possess them with a fanatically loyal demon...
EVTDESC66110: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], keeps asking me to press [From.GetPossPronoun] claim on [claimant_claim.GetName] for the glory of our dynasty.
hermetics_desc: Hermetics believe that there are deeply hidden secrets about this world that only the worthy can uncover. As a member of the Hermetics you will seek the truth in the stars and planets, through diligent experimentation, and by careful interpretation of ancient texts and symbols.
start_constructing_laboratory_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] starts the construction of a Laboratory.
build_laboratory_desc: Constructing your own laboratory will help you in the various experiments needed to delve into the deeper truths of creation. It can however easily get very costly...
EVTDESC_MNM_1100: A truly useful Laboratory can take both time and money to assemble but without an office dedicated to alchemy I doubt I will ever be able to unveil the deeper secrets of the world.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1100: On second thought, there are more pressing matters.
EVTDESC_MNM_1101: Secrecy is of great importance as the experiments I will perform in my laboratory may both frighten the ignorant and tantalize my fellow alchemists. To keep intruders away laboratories are often built deep within a castle, but a more accessible building would likely be more efficient...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1101: My secrets will be safe deep within the walls of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
hidden_lab_tooltip: The plans for your laboratory will have to fit into your existing castle.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1101: Let us build an efficient and accessible office for research!
accessible_lab_tooltip: The plans for your laboratory will only be dictated by what is most efficient but your secrets will not be as well guarded.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1101: Let us build a guarded compound on an island.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1101: Let us build a remote guarded compound.
very_hidden_lab_tooltip: Though isolated your laboratory can be as big as it needs to be.
EVTDESC_MNM_1102: In order to properly heat and transform metals or other substances I require furnaces of differing temperature and flames of different types. The alchemical texts speak of various setups that could be beneficial.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1102: A modest setup with one furnace will be enough.
cheap_laboratory_setup: [Root.GetFullName] will aim for a small but functional laboratory.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1102: I can work around a small but varied setup.
efficient_laboratory_setup: [Root.GetFullName] will aim to build a laboratory that can handle somewhat more complicated procedures.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1102: I will require a state of the art laboratory!
large_laboratory_setup: [Root.GetFullName] will aim to build an advanced laboratory, capable of handling a number of complicated procedures.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1102: I will aim higher than any of those that have come before me!
extravagant_laboratory_setup: [Root.GetFullName] will build an experimental setup with as many furnaces, basins, and other contraptions as can reasonably be fitted.
EVTDESC_MNM_1103: The glass in which I keep my concoctions is brittle and breaks easily. This may be tolerable for beakers and other dispensable glass but earlier today a giant alembic shattered into a thousand pieces after having been heated carelessly by one of my helpers...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1103: Let us try to limit their use then.
non_fancy_laboratory_glass_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will keep buying glass of inferior quality but helpers will be instructed to handle it with extreme care from now on.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1103: We must only ever buy the most expensive and durable glass.
fancy_laboratory_glass_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will from now on spend more to ensure all glass that enter the laboratory is as durable and clear as possible.
EVTDESC_MNM_1104: Not all pottery is suited for the kind of alchemical work I do. My experiments require both the porous orange pottery that can absorb components in the crucible and the dark and highly fire resistant pots in which even the strongest metal can be melted. Good quality does come at a high price however...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1104: In time locals will rise to this challenge.
non_fancy_laboratory_crucibles_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will keep the laboratory supplied using the pottery from local potters to avoid the high price of imported crucibles.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1104: Only the best will be good enough!
fancy_laboratory_crucibles_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will now only tolerate the best of imported pottery from master potters.
EVTDESC_MNM_1105: The local smiths do not seem to appreciate the great care that must be taken to create the kind of tools we need to work the fires of my laboratory. Perhaps in time they will learn but so far the results have been most disappointing.
non_fancy_laboratory_tools_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will cut costs by relying on local smiths to produce the tools and other ironwork required for [Root.GetHerHis] alchemical experiments.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1105: We must import the tools we need.
fancy_laboratory_tools_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will import alchemical tools from the master smiths that are best skilled to make them.
EVTDESC_MNM_1106: Sometimes the difference identifying success can be as hard as achieving it. Many metals and other substances are so alike that only an expert can tell them apart. To avoid mishaps perhaps it would be best to invest in a rich library of reference literature to avoid unwelcome surprises.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1106: The books I have will be quite enough.
non_fancy_laboratory_books_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will avoid spending money frivolously on books that tell [Root.GetHerHis] what he already knows.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1106: My librarians shall not rest until we have such a collection.
fancy_laboratory_books_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will ensure the success of [Root.GetHerHis] future experiments by assembling a reference library for all occasions.
EVTDESC_MNM_1108: It may not be the most advanced office of alchemy, in fact it might well be the opposite of that, but I have finally completed a laboratory in which to conduct my experiments. Soon the secrets of this world will reveal themselves to me!
cheap_laboratory_desc: In order to conduct experiments in an efficient way this character has constructed a small laboratory. It is not the most impressive of alchemical offices but it has the necessities needed to heat, melt and distill various substances.
EVTDESC_MNM_1109: The work to create an office in which I can conduct my experiments is finally complete! It may not compare to the greatest laboratories of this age but it will surely help me find the knowledge which I seek.
normal_laboratory_desc: In order to conduct experiments in an efficient way this character has constructed a laboratory. It has the basic necessities needed to heat, distill, putrefy and combine various metals and other substances.
EVTDESC_MNM_1110: My laboratory is finally completed. Will it be able to fulfill my dreams of enlightenment? Only time will tell...
good_laboratory_desc: This character has spent considerable time and money to build a laboratory where metals and other substances can be manipulated. The setup has attracted some attention from others and is the envy of poorer dabblers in the esoteric arts.
EVTDESC_MNM_1111: After months of hard work and a considerable amount of money spent, the laboratory of [Root.GetFullName] is the envy of anyone who wishes to delve into the deeper secrets of life. This office of alchemy allows the [Root.GetTitle] to perform any experiment that has so far been documented and is a testament to [Root.GetHerHis] great ambitions in the field.
great_laboratory_desc: This character has spent both time and a small fortune to construct a proper office where alchemical experiments can be performed. This laboratory is built to be able to handle any experiment currently documented and employs a small team of helpers to keep all the furnaces going at all times.
EVTDESC_MNM_1112: With no expenses spared and under the constant supervision of [Root.GetFullName] a house unlike any other has been erected to realize the dream of a perfect alchemical working environment. Many of the contraptions have been conceived and drawn by the [Root.GetTitle] personally and the great number of furnaces alone employs a team of helpers from all the entire realm.\n\nThe office now stands ready to allow [Root.GetFullName] to uncover the secrets of the world, all it requires is for its master to give the instructions.
best_laboratory_desc: Equal parts brilliance, deep pockets and rigorous discipline has allowed this character to build a palace of the alchemical arts. This laboratory is not only large in size it is pioneering a number of new techniques to manipulate and combine the many substances of the world.
quest_hermetics_build_laboratory_desc: You must construct a laboratory in which your experiments to uncover the hidden secrets of the universe can be undertaken.
quest_hermetics_build_laboratory_tooltip: To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'Construct Laboratory'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete the construction of a Laboratory.
EVTDESC_MNM_1121:
To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It has come to my attention that you still lack a proper office of Alchemy! How can you hope to uncover the secrets of [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], without the proper tools or staff? You should build one or your work will fade into obscurity.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1121_apprentice:
To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Master, I feel we are both held back by the lack of a proper office of Alchemy. If we are to uncover the secrets of [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], we will need the proper tools and work space. Unless you build a laboratory or our work here will fade into obscurity.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1122_normal: With a laboratory of my own I can proceed to perform greater works than ever before. How I ever got by without a dedicated workspace and the right tools I will never understand. The secrets of [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], shall be mine!
EVTDESC_MNM_1122_rich: My new laboratory is the envy of both those that now live and all that came before me. I dare say even [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], himself would be impressed by the setup I now employ to uncover the hidden secrets of matter and spirit.
EVTDESC_MNM_1113: The entire castle just shook, waking me from the dreamless sleep that comes after hours of preparatory laboratory work. Did I forget to properly lock the laboratory?
EVTOPTB_MNM_1113: We must really tighten up security...
efforts_to_improve_lab_security_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will spend funds to improve security and increase the efficiency of [Root.GetHerHis] Laboratory.
EVTDESC_MNM_1114: To the ignorant laboratory equipment can appear both frightening and alien. Word has gotten out of some of the unusual contraptions that have been built for my laboratory. A small mob has assembled outside, demanding answers about why I am constructing so clearly ungodly things.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1114: I must try to accommodate them.
accomodate_gossipers_tooltip: [Root.GetFullName] will make changes to [Root.GetHerHis] laboratory to placate the frightened locals rather than to increase efficiency.
EVTDESC_MNM_1115: Disaster has struck! An increasingly foul stench from the kitchen area made the guards investigate my stores of alchemical ingredients. I have been focusing so much on the work of assembling my laboratory that the ingredients have begun to rot!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1115: We must build a better storage for the future!
EVTDESC_MNM_102:
Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
We are delighted to learn that you have taken your first step towards enlightenment. The secrets of the Corpus may be obscured to you now, but in time you may come to understand them as I have.

Hold in thy mind all thou wouldst know, and [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], will teach thee.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_102: This is what I desire to hear!
EVTDESC_MNM_3914: After spending weeks improving the painting I proudly take a step back to behold my work. Sweat gathers on my forehead as I realize what my additions to the painting actually looks like: The original painting is beyond repair! It is now riddled with stick figures, random shapes, and other artistic mishaps.
acquire_ingredients_decision_cooldown_ti: Has NOT recently ventured to acquired ingredients
EVTDESC_MNM_1800_A: I have called upon my apprentice, [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] to help me gather ingredients that are needed for further studies of the mysteries in the world. But first I need to decide what kind of ingredients we need.
EVTDESC_MNM_1800_B: [gathering_companion.GetSocietyRank] [gathering_companion.GetFirstName] has offered [gathering_companion.GetHerHis] help with gathering much needed ingredients for further studies of the mysteries in the world. But first I need to decide what kind of ingredients we need.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1800: We will gather herbs in the hills.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1800: In the forest we will hunt for the most prized animal parts.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1800: I'm sure we will find useful materials in the marketplace.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1800: On second thought, I don't have time for this.
EVTDESC_MNM_1810: [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] and I arrived in the hills early in the morning to collect various useful herbs that we could find in the countryside.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1810: Our combined knowledge will be useful for identifying the plants.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1810: I at least know how to identify some plants.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1810: Which were the poisonous ones again?
EVTDESC_MNM_1812_A: [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] is most resourceful. While discussing the different aspects of the elements we identify a plethora of plants by tasting and smelling them and the days pass without us even noticing.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1812: We already have more than we can carry.
EVTDESC_MNM_1812_B: We have now spent days looking high and low for useful herbs. With both me and [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] exhausted we are forced to conclude that the small assortment of interesting plants is what we are getting out of this.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1812: At least we got something out of this.
EVTDESC_MNM_1812_C: My mouth is feeling funny and numb after [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] got me to taste a weird looking plant.
EVTDESC_MNM_1815: Together with a small band of hunters [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] and I have set out to hunt animals in the forest in an attempt to gather animal parts. These ingredients will be invaluable in experiments to understanding the aspects of the world.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1815: Our combined hunting experience should make this easy.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1815: I hope someone here knows how to take down a beast.
EVTDESC_MNM_1817_A: With the help of [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] tracking the animals of the forest they now have nowhere to hide. It almost feels too easy now.
EVTDESC_MNM_1817_B: The forest is full of wild animals. Even though they are delusive creatures our cunning is more than enough to find their hiding places.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1817: Some of these parts will prove useful.
EVTDESC_MNM_1817_C: As I was nocking an arrow, carefully studying my prey on the other side of the shaft, suddenly [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] starts shouting and screaming. While I'm glaring angrily at [gathering_companion.GetHerHim] and the game runs tauntingly its way, [gathering_companion.GetFirstName] tries to explain [gathering_companion.GetHerselfHimself].\n"The sun-rays weren't hitting the glade and thus the organs would've been useless!"
EVTOPTC_MNM_1817: That's one way to ruin a hunt.
EVTDESC_MNM_1820: The stalls around us are brimming with all different kinds of goods and people are swarming around us. [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] and I look each other in the eyes nodding. We know that we will need to be thorough in our search and excellent in our haggling if we want to make some good deals here.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1820: Our charismatic touch bring forth the best wares to the lowest prices.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1820: What can this thing be worth?
EVTDESC_MNM_1822_A: Slipping by the stalls nearly every single one of them has an interesting item. I merely poke [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] to make [gathering_companion.GetHerHim] aware of it and [gathering_companion.GetSheHe] puts on the smooth-talking. After [gathering_companion.GetHerHis] haggling people almost end up giving us the items for free.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1822: How did we end up with so many things?
EVTDESC_MNM_1822_B: Navigating the different scenes and smells of the town square at this hour can be confusing. Still I managed to find some good quality ingredients at a decent price as did [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTOPTB_MNM_1822: You can find the most interesting things here.
EVTDESC_MNM_1822_C: No matter how hard we looked there never seemed to be anything interesting. Somehow I still ended up with my bags full of useless junk that someone sold.
EVTTOOLTIP_MNM_1817: [Root.gath_res.GetValue] animal part ingredients added to inventory.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1802:
To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My [Root.GetSisterBrother], as you know we're always in need of more ingredients to perform our experiments. These experiments are essential to uncover the mysteries of the world. I propose a joint venture to combine our knowledge in an effort to identify and gather ingredients so that our search for truth will not be halted by such worldly things as material shortages.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
disappointing_hunt_desc: There are rumors that this character failed to bring down an easy prey during a hunt, due to superstition.
IS_NOT_POTENTIAL_FRIEND_OF: Is NOT a potential friend of §Y$WHO$§!
acquire_ingredients_decision_apprentice_: Has a vassal with the apprentice minor title
acquire_ingredients_decision_too_many_in: Does NOT have a full stockpile of ingredients
got_named_star_desc: This character has had a star named in their honor.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1848: It shall be named after my beloved child, [target_child.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTB_MNM_1848: [target_spouse.GetFirstName], my lovely [target_spouse.GetHusbandWife] should have the honor.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1848: I'll name it after my dear friend, [target_friend.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTD_MNM_1848: The star should bear my own name.
CANNOT_AVOID_FACTION_WAR: Not waiting on your response to an ultimatum
PLOT_NOT_TARGETTING_YOU: Not the target of the plot
PLOT_VASSAL_OR_LIEGE_OF_TARGET: Is vassal or liege of target
PLOT_VASSAL_OR_SAME_LIEGE: Is vassal of target or has same liege
PLOT_INDEPENDENT_OR_VASSAL: Independent or a vassal of the target
PROVINCE_HOSPITAL_ICON_EXTEND: §GClick to open the Extended Province View.§!
EVTOPTA_WOL_11102: I'll get [slothful_courtier.GetHerHim] to be less slothful when I'm around.
NUDGE_PORT_NOT_IN_WATER: Warning: Port is not in water!
SPECIAL_EVENTOPTION_MODIFIER: This option is available because you have the §Y$MODIFIERNAME$§! modifier
SET_ARTIFACT_ORIGINAL_OWNER: Set the artifact's original owner to $WHO|Y$
opinion_dissatisfied_calligrapher: Dissatisfied with the Court Calligrapher's work
PEACE_ENFORCE_NOT_ON_COOLDOWN: §YRealm Peace§! has not been used in the last §Y$YEARS$ years§! (Last used $MONTHS_AGO|Y$ months ago)
PLAYER_SOCIETY_JOIN_DATE: You have been a member since $DATE|Y$.
INTERACTION_CANNOT_JOIN_AGAINST_NAP: Cannot join against someone we have a non-aggression pact with
brew_happiness_potion_desc: As a [From.GetSocietyRank] of [From.Society.GetName], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can brew a potion to raise low spirits.
apathetic_desc: This character has reoccurring apathetic episodes which prevents them from living an ordinary life.
EVTDESC_MNM_1400: I brewed the potion just like the enciphered recipe dictated. Mere seconds after it passed my lips a wave of pleasurable sensations rolled over me! While the peak of my bliss was short-lived, that first rush must have washed away the dispiriting darkness that has plagued me for so long.
EVTDESC_MNM_1401: 'I do not mean to meddle, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], but you do not seem to be well,' says [From.GetTitledFirstName], concern tinting [From.GetHerHis] voice. 'In my studies, I have unveiled a secret to raise low spirits and bring about happiness.' [From.GetSheHeCap] offers me a flask containing an unidentifiable liquid.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1401: I am willing to give it a try, [From.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_1401_TT: Drink the potion. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has assured you there will be no side effects...
EVTOPTB_MNM_1401: What is that vile concoction? Magic? Only [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] can cure me!
EVTDESC_MNM_1402: I brewed the potion just like the enciphered recipe dictated. [From.GetTitledFirstName] gratefully accepted my help and as soon as [From.GetSheHe] drank my concoction, I could see a change in [From.GetHerHim]. Now the light has returned to [From.GetHerHis] eyes!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1402: I am glad I could be of assistance, [From.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_MNM_1403: For a while I felt like nothing could extinguish the renewed sense of joy and purpose I gained after drinking the potion. It seems as if I was mistaken. Life and duty wears one down and I am no exception. There is nothing more, no great secret to uncover. Just toil and anguish, every day until my last.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1403: It was too good to be true...
EVTDESC_MNM_1416_A: I have been struck by a great loss. The death of [From.GetTitledFirstName] has left me without an apprentice and an assistant, as well as a companion. While I already contemplate taking on a new pupil, I shall surely mourn for [From.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_MNM_1416_B: The death of [From.GetTitledFirstName] has left me without an apprentice and an assistant. I shall mourn over [From.GetHerHis] passing, of course, but there was also a hint of relief to my reaction as I was brought the news. Now I can finally take on a proper pupil.
EVTDESC_MNM_1405:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I must say, dear colleague, I cannot fathom how you get along without a proper assistant! My own is both bright and obedient. Not once have I detected the stench of alcohol upon [From.GetHerHisOpp] breath. Take my advice and find an apprentice of your own.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
quest_hermetics_find_apprentice_desc: Every respectable scholar of the Hermetic arts should take on an apprentice. Alchemical experiments are complex operations which requires extra hands, and what [Root.GetTitle] has enough time to search dusty libraries, shady markets and faraway forests for rare ingredients?
quest_hermetics_find_apprentice_tooltip: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! must either assign an apprentice through the §YMinor Titles§! screen or keep their eyes open for a promising pupil to appear to complete this mission.
EVTDESC_MNM_1408: Over the past months, the thought of an apprentice has been at the forefront of my mind. I have considered my advisors, but I dare say not one of them seem fit for the role. However, one of my servants has caught my eye. [From.GetFirstName] is an attentive [From.GetManWoman] with steady hands and a good head on [From.GetHerHis] shoulders.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1408: [From.GetSheHeCap] knows how to obey, at the very least.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1408: Surely I can find someone more worthy than a servant!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1408_TT: You decide to keep looking for an apprentice.
EVTDESC_MNM_1409: I have a good feeling about this! With [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] as my apprentice, I am sure to uncover many a secret. Perhaps I shall event perform the great work, the Magnum opus!
EVTDESC_MNM_1414: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s apprenticeship has reached its end. [From.GetSheHeCap] knows enough of alchemy, astrology and Theurgy to be acknowledged as a hermetic scholar in [From.GetHerHis] own rights. As a parting gift, I gave [From.GetHerHim] a tome containing a few of my most well-guarded secrets. I did not pretend to notice the tears in [From.GetHerHis] eyes, but they touched me deeply.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1414: Best of luck in your studies, [From.GetSocietyRank]!
EVTDESC_MNM_1418:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My [Root.GetSisterBrother], I have a proposal which might interest you. An old letter detailing the possible locations of some lost hermetic writings came into my possession not many moons ago. If you fund an expedition, we can search for these treasures together!

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1420_A:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
The letter mentioned three lost texts: a tome in a local antiquary, a scroll hidden in a [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [temple_site.GetName], and a tablet in the ancient library ruins of [ruin_site.GetName] in [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. The further we venture, in distance as well as into the past, the greater secrets we might uncover. The choice is yours.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1420_B:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I have the best of news! Since our last correspondence I have acquired a map leading to a surviving chamber of the great library in Alexandria! While the previous options remain  a tome here in [Root.Capital.GetName], a scroll in [temple_site.GetName] and tablet in [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]  I would argue that this opportunity is too great to pass up.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_1420: Excellent indeed! We shall go to Alexandria!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1420_TT: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to Alexandria, hoping to find the ruins of the Great Library.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1420: Let us travel to the ruins in [ruin_site.GetName].
EVTOPTB_MNM_1420_TT: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to [ruin_site.GetName], hoping to find a tablet in the ruins there.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_1420: It seems like the best option is the scroll in [temple_site.GetName].
EVTOPTC_MNM_1420_TT: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to [temple_site.GetName], hoping to find a scroll in a [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship] there.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_1420: I do not have much to spare... Surely the local antiquary will do?
EVTOPTD_MNM_1420_TT: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and set off to a local antiquarian in search for an old tome.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1422: When we found the engraved door to the chamber, we could hardly believe our eyes. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I had nearly given up. That day would be the very last of our search, we had decided, so our discovery must surely have been a divine miracle! My hands were shaking as I, alongside the servants, cleared the last rubble and heaved the door open.\n\nLantern held high over our heads, my colleague and I entered first. The faint light fell on countless pots and chests, elaborate wall paintings and a great forge. Something else reflected the light from deep within the chamber, something vibrantly green... [From.GetFirstName]'s breaths were quick and shallow. 'It.... it cannot be!'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1422: Finally, the deepest secrets of Hermes Trismegistus shall be mine!
EVTDESC_MNM_1423: Our expedition into foreign lands encountered some difficulties, but in the end we made it to the ruins of [ruin_site.GetName] safely. After a fortnight of excavation the servants uncovered the entrance to a hidden underground chamber. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I entered side by side, the air heavy with excitement.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1423: Do my eyes deceive me, or are those symbols hieroglyphs?
EVTDESC_MNM_1424: The bribe we offered the [temple_site.Holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] of [temple_site.GetName] was enough to make [temple_site.Holder.GetHerHim] unlock the inner chambers of the [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship]. We examined every nook and cranny for clues of the scroll's hiding place. On the fifth day, one of the servants announced [Root.GetSheHe] had found a hidden chamber...
EVTDESC_MNM_1425: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I searched every shelf and chest in the dusty old shop. For days on end we did nothing but breathe dust and leaf through boring old texts. They were all full of nonsense! On the fourth day, I was thus incredibly surprised to lay my eyes on the symbols of the Three Primes!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1425: I think I found the tome, [From.GetFirstName]!
EVTDESC_MNM_1426_A: My misgivings arose early after our arrival in Alexandria, but [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] insisted that we must have misinterpreted the map. After every failure, [From.GetSheHe] had a new idea. A suspicion crept upon me... What if the map was forged, and [From.GetFirstName] knew? Was the blasted expedition a plot to ruin me?!
EVTDESC_MNM_1426_B: Our expedition into foreign lands certainly encountered its fair share of difficulties. We dealt with everything from unfavorable weather to lame horses, but in the end, the fraudulent guide was the nail in the coffin. When [Root.GetSheHe] escaped with our last gold, we also discovered that we were in the wrong part of [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
EVTDESC_MNM_1426_C: The bribe we offered the [temple_site.Holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] of [temple_site.GetName] was enough to make [temple_site.Holder.GetHerHim] unlock the inner chambers of the [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship]. We examined every nook and cranny for clues of the scroll's hiding place. After a week of nothing more interesting than the discovery of a stash of lewd letters, we had to admit defeat.
EVTDESC_MNM_1426_D: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I searched every shelf and chest in the dusty old shop. For days at end we did nothing but breathe dust and page through boring old texts. They were all full of nonsense! After a week, we had to admit defeat. We would never uncover anything of worth in this place.
quest_hermetics_find_text_desc: Your colleague [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has found a letter detailing the possible locations of some great old works of Hermeticism. A deal has been struck  [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] shall share the contents of the letter with you, and you shall fund the expedition.
quest_hermetics_find_text_tooltip: If §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! sets out on one of the expeditions suggested by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and finds an old hermetic text, the mission is completed.
EVTDESC_MNM_1431_A:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] is a pompous, featherbrained scoundrel  you know it to be true, [Root.GetSisterBrother]! It is time for [infiltration_target.GetHerHim] to pay for [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] sins. Let us ruin [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory and steal [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] secrets!

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1431_B:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My friend, we have a common nemesis. You know of whom I speak  the despicable idiot [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]! The thought of [infiltration_target.GetHerHim] being a member of our respectable community... it makes me sick! Let us ruin [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory and steal [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] secrets!

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1431_C:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] is a greedy, slothful idiot who deserves none of the riches in [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] possession. What do you say, [Root.GetSisterBrother]  shall we raid [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory and claim that which should be ours?

As above, so below.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
quest_hermetics_infiltrate_laboratory_de: The greedy and paranoid [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] guards [FromFrom.GetHerHis] secrets jealously. A most shameful behavior, indeed! Unlike [FromFrom.GetHerHim], you know how to share. In the spirit of collaboration, you and a colleague has agreed to infiltrate [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s laboratory and either steal or destroy anything of value. Perhaps you will do both!
quest_hermetics_infiltrate_laboratory_to: Your colleague will bring you to the laboratory of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. If you manage to steal or destroy anything and get away unnoticed, the mission is completed.
EVTDESC_MNM_1433:
Most esteemed [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Yet my spies have not found the exact location of [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s laboratory. You need not worry, friend, for they have some promising leads. We will just have to be patient.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_1433: I shall prepare for a swift departure.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1433_TT: As soon as the spies of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has located the laboratory, you will depart.
EVTDESC_MNM_1435_A: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] must be paranoid, for [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory is a fortress hidden away on a remote island. As we cross the dark waters under the cover of night, [From.GetFirstName] tells me about the guard rotation. We will only have one chance to breach the defenses.
EVTDESC_MNM_1435_B: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] has hidden [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory deep in the dungeons of [infiltration_target.Capital.GetName]. [From.GetFirstName] and I have passed unnoticed so far thanks to the intelligence [From.GetHerHis] spies provided, but the last door is heavily guarded.
EVTDESC_MNM_1435_C: It was not hard to locate [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s laboratory, [From.GetFirstName] tells me as we enter the [infiltration_target.Capital.GetHolding]. 'While old [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] has no talent for keeping secrets, [infiltration_target.GetSheHe] does know how to hire proper guards,' [From.GetSheHe] continues, telling me about the obstacle ahead.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1435: I have a way with people and a heavy purse.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1435: I prepared a potion of dreamless sleep for this very eventuality.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1435_TT: Attempt to drug the guards with a potion of your own making.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_1435: You distract them, and I will enter the laboratory.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1435_TT: §Y[infiltration_companion.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to distract the guards. You will have to perform any theft or sabotage yourself once inside, which limits the amount of damage you may accomplish.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_1435: Actually, I have changed my mind...
EVTOPTD_MNM_1435_TT: This is a bad idea. You retreat to the safety of your [Root.Capital.GetHolding].\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1436_A: As we step out of the shadows, the guards draw their blades. Their posture and faces change as I pull the heavy purse from my pocket. After a short exchange of words and coins, [infiltration_companion.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] and I enter through the heavy door. 'What now, [Root.GetSisterBrother]? What course of action would you recommend?'
EVTDESC_MNM_1436_B: By some miracle, [infiltration_companion.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] manages to empty the little vial of potion in a jug before it is brought to the guards. Within a quarter of an hour, they are snoring softly. 'We must hurry  the sedating effect won't last forever,' I whisper as we sneak past. 'What now, [Root.GetSisterBrother]?' [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] asks once we are inside.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1436: If you focus on destruction, I will search for items of value.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1436_TT: You split up to cover more ground. Effective, but riskier.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1436: Let me take care of sabotage. Collect anything useful you come across.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1436: Help me find where [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] keeps [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] valuables.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1436_TT: You stay together. Safer, but not as effective.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_1436: Our goal is maximum damage. Let's get started!
EVTDESC_MNM_1437: First, everything went so well. By some miracle, [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] managed to empty the little vial of potion in a jug before it was brought to the guards. That was half an hour ago! The guards are showing no signs of drowsiness and our time is running out. I whisper apologies as we leave, but [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] does not answer.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1437: That recipe never failed me before, I swear...
EVTDESC_MNM_1438: I had my doubts, but color me impressed! [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] managed to lure the guards away by setting off an alchemical reaction producing the foulest of odors! While the trick was effective, to say the least, I do not know how much time I have. I need to focus. What should I do next?
EVTOPTA_MNM_1438: I shall steal [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s rarest ingredients and most secret tomes!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1438: My focus will be maximum destruction. Where is the fire steel...?
EVTDESC_MNM_1439: I have seen many foolish things in my days, but [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]'s poor attempt at a distraction might just take the prize. I am dumbstruck as [infiltration_companion.GetSheHe] rattles [infiltration_companion.GetHerHis] blade against the wall and begins to wail loudly! When the guard's footsteps draw near, I grab [infiltration_companion.GetHerHim] and run. 'Really, a ghost? No one in their right mind would fall for that!'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1439: There will be no second attempt tonight. Not in a long, long time.
EVTDESC_MNM_1440_A: Just as I am about to pour acid over [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s notes, the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself facing none other but the guards. Our eyes lock for a moment before I drop the acid and run, but it is pointless. Despite the lingering effects of the sleeping potion, they are still faster than me.
EVTDESC_MNM_1440_B: Just as I am about to pour acid over [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s notes, the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself staring into the panicked eyes of [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]. A split second later, I notice the guards holding [infiltration_companion.GetHerHim]. 'Run!' [infiltration_companion.GetSheHe] shouts, but it is too late.
EVTDESC_MNM_1440_C: My hands are deep in one of [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s big ingredient chests when the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself facing none other but the guards. Our eyes lock for a moment before I drop the acid and run, but it is pointless. Despite the lingering effects of the potion, they are still faster than me.
EVTDESC_MNM_1440_D: My hands are deep in one of [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s big ingredient chests when the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself staring into the panicked eyes of [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]. A split second later, I notice the guards holding [infiltration_companion.GetHerHim]. 'Run!' [infiltration_companion.GetSheHe] shouts, but it is too late.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1440: Release me! I'm a colleague of your [infiltration_target.GetMasterMistress]!
EVTDESC_MNM_1451: It seems like my guards have caught a couple of ugly fishes! Apparently [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], along with [From.GetHerHis] accomplice [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName], made an attempt to enter my laboratory and steal my secrets. This insult cannot go unanswered...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1451: Perhaps [From.GetFirstName] is willing to trade a few secrets for [From.GetHerHis] freedom.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1451: Leave them in the dungeon. I will deal with them later...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1451_FAIL_TT: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! refuses to share [From.GetHerHis] secrets and stays imprisoned.
EVTDESC_MNM_1452: I have reached the point where I am willing to shamelessly beg for water when the guards drag me from my cell. I must have fainted, for the next thing I see is [From.GetFirstName]'s scornful face! 'Well, well, well... My guards have caught one laughable crook, indeed!' After some further insults, [From.GetSheHe] offers me my freedom in exchange for some of my deepest secret knowledge.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1452: Give me some water and then I will tell you whatever you wish to know.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1452: You will never be worthy of my secrets!
EVTDESC_MNM_1453: I barely recognized [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] as they dragged [From.GetHerHim] towards me. A few days in the dungeons does that to people, I hear. I am sure I could have asked for [From.GetHerHis] firstborn, so eager was [From.GetSheHe] to have [From.GetHerHis] freedom. [From.GetFirstName] filled notebook after notebook under my stern gaze.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1453: This will be an interesting read, indeed.
EVTDESC_MNM_1454: I barely recognized [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] as they dragged [From.GetHerHim] towards me. A few days in the dungeons does that to people, I hear. It seems like [From.GetSheHe] enjoyed [From.GetHerHis] cell, however, for when I told [From.GetHerHim] of my generous offer, I got nothing but insults and curses in return.
EVTDESC_MNM_1455: I have reached the point where I am willing to shamelessly beg for water when the guards drag me from my cell. I must have fainted, for the next thing I see is [From.GetFirstName]'s scornful face! 'Well, well, well... My guards have caught one laughable crook, indeed! I just wanted to have a look at you before they throw away the key...'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1455: Mercy, mercy! I can't return to that place!
EVTDESC_MNM_1441_A: Who knew the laboratory of [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] would be such a treasure trove? In addition to some rare ingredients and a few items which will fetch good coin in the shadier parts of [Root.Capital.GetName], I came across a most interesting text!
EVTDESC_MNM_1441_B: My search has been most rewarding. [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s ingredient cabinet has a fine assortment of substances and I have found several nuggets of precious metal. My share of the spoils will be a fine addition to my own laboratory!
EVTDESC_MNM_1441_C: For all [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] talk and boasting, I expected more than this. Or, perhaps, [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] is more paranoid than I thought. In any case, I cannot find anything of great value. At least these nuggets of metal will sell for a few coins.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1441: It is better than nothing, I guess.
EVTDESC_MNM_1442_A: If I ever find out who broke into my laboratory, I will kill that vile crook! Not only have my ingredient cabinet and metal collection been pilfered, but my most valued text is gone! My most divine knowledge, my deepest secrets! May the thief rot in hell!
EVTDESC_MNM_1442_B: If I ever find out who broke into my laboratory, I will kill that vile crook! Not only has the thief laid its dirty hands on my precious metals, but my ingredient cabinet has been ransacked also. The culprit must be another follower of the Hermetic arts!
EVTDESC_MNM_1442_C: I should really look over the security of my lab. Last night, some vile person snuck past the guards, but luckily nothing of major value was stolen. Either the thief had no idea of how valuable my ingredients and tomes are, or they were too dumb to find them. The precious metals will cost a fair bit to replace, though.
EVTDESC_MNM_1443_A: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] should really hide [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] gunpowder better! Within half an hour I have compiled enough materials to craft a decent bomb. Considering the many barrels of volatile substances, this should be enough to ruin the laboratory. I light the fuse and run.
EVTDESC_MNM_1443_B: Thankfully, a laboratory is not particularly hard to sabotage. The place is full of acids, volatile substances and old tomes dry as bones. While I do not feel confident enough to risk a great fire, I heave the texts into the furnace and set the ablaze!
EVTDESC_MNM_1443_C: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] should really hide [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] gunpowder better! Within half an hour I have compiled enough materials to craft a decent bomb. I assemble the parts ever so slowly because my hands will not stop shaking. Just as I am about to perform the last step, I drop a vial. I freeze.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1443: Excellent! It will take [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] months, if not years, to recover!
EVTDESC_MNM_1444_A: If I ever find out who broke into my laboratory, I will kill that vile crook! I woke last night as the whole keep shook violently. It seems like someone entered my laboratory and set off an explosion! Luckily, no lives were harmed, but my laboratory is in ruins. There is nothing to save.
EVTDESC_MNM_1444_B: If I ever find out who broke into my laboratory, I will kill that vile crook! It seems as if I have made an enemy, for the intruder focused on destruction rather than theft. Acid has been poured on floors and across work surfaces, pots and glass have been shattered and, worst of all, my furnace is filled with the blackened pages of burnt books!
EVTDESC_MNM_1444_C: I am not sure whether I should be disturbed or amused! This morning, a charred corpse was discovered in my laboratory. Apparently the crook broke in to sabotage my work but managed to kill [From.GetHerselfHimself] in a botched attempt to craft a bomb. I examined the body and the culprit was none other than [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.Society.GetName]!
EVTDESC_MNM_1446_A: I find [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] with [From.GetHerHis] hands deep in a big ingredients chest. Our eyes meet and I nod. It is time to go. [From.GetFirstName] stuff a few more vials and nuggets of metal into [From.GetHerHis] satchel before running after me.
EVTDESC_MNM_1446_B: I follow the trail of overturned chests and broken vials until I find [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. I gesture for [From.GetHerHim] to come with me  it is time to go. [From.GetSheHeCap] stuffs [From.GetHerHis] pockets with a few nearby tools before running after me.
EVTDESC_MNM_1448: As I close my satchel, I hear a loud crash from the other room. As I peek through the doorway, the scene before me is impressive. The warm light of [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s torch illuminates the destruction. Overturned tables, torn books and smashed instruments. I nod appreciatively. 'It is time to leave.'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1448: I wish I could see [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s face when [infiltration_target.GetSheHe] realizes what we've done!
EVTDESC_MNM_1449: As I reach for a nearby tome, a terrifying roar sweeps through the laboratory and the floor shudders underneath my feet. Images of dragons and chimeras flash through my mind before the truth hits me. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] must have set of an explosion. There is no time look for [From.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTA_MNM_1449: No one could have slept through that. I have to run!
EVTDESC_MNM_1450: Once we have left the laboratory far behind us, [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] and I collapse, two bundles of sweaty and shivering limbs. We did it. We really did it, and we got away with it, too! As the laugh erupts from my lips, my body finally relaxes. Next to me, [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] heavy breathing turns into a merry chuckle.
hermetics_scrying_cooldown_tooltip: NOT already carrying a premonition of things to come\n
hermetics_perform_scrying_desc: As a member of [From.Society.GetName], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! may choose to turn to the mystical art of divination in an attempt to foretell the future.
EVTDESC_MNM_1200_A: As I place my hands on the sides of the bowl, the surface of the water is perfectly still. Yet it only takes a few moments before patterns begin to appear in the reflection... Mirror images of the world, the past and the future. I take a deep breath, to attune myself to what I am looking for...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1200: I want to know about battles to come.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1200: I want to know where my relationships will lead.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1200: I want to know what will happen to me as [Root.GetTitle].
EVTOPTA_MNM_1200_TT: You gaze into the mysterious shrouds in the depths of the bowl...\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1201_BATTLE_A: The water is dark. I stare at it, unblinking, until my eyes begin to strain. It takes time, maybe hours, as time becomes fleeting.\nThen I see it. A fierce battle! I can almost hear the clanking of swords.
EVTDESC_MNM_1201_BATTLE_B: It takes a minute, but after a while I am certain of it: I see a lion! Or... No, it's a woman. With the head of a lion!
EVTDESC_MNM_1201_BATTLE_C: I concentrate for a long time, staring into the water. I almost have time to doubt myself, but then I see it: faint ripples, a shadow, then two. It looks like a fire, and a sword.
EVTDESC_MNM_1201_RELATIONSHIP_A: I see... A still pond of water. It is... quiet.
EVTDESC_MNM_1201_RELATIONSHIP_B: At first, all I the water shows me is the reflection of the ceiling. I shake my head. I have to look beyond the material world! I close my eyes, and when I open them again, I see it clearly.\nA bed of flowers, and an urn.
EVTDESC_MNM_1201_RELATIONSHIP_C: I am at first not sure what to make of the strange shape. Maybe I am imagining it, or maybe it is a shadow. Does it matter? I see it clearly: a familiar silhouette, standing under a moon.
EVTDESC_MNM_1201_POWER_A: I see strange patterns... No, wait, a bunch of triangles!
EVTDESC_MNM_1201_POWER_B: There are just lines... Or are they...? Yes, I see a forest. A vast forest!
EVTDESC_MNM_1201_POWER_C: I see a storm. I can almost hear it! Oh, it is actually raining.\n\n... But I still see a thunderstorm.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1201: Marvelous! This is clearly a good omen!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1201: Damnation! This is clearly a bad omen.
good_battle_omen_desc: This character is convinced that they have seen the future and that something great awaits them on the battlefield.
bad_battle_omen_desc: This character is convinced that they have seen the future and that something terrible awaits them on the battlefield.
good_relationship_omen_desc: This character is under the belief that the future holds something wonderful for them and someone they care about.
bad_relationship_omen_desc: This character is under the belief that something unfortunate awaits them and someone they care about.
good_power_omen_desc: This character is under the belief that something wonderful awaits them and their realm.
bad_power_omen_desc: This character is under the belief that something disastrous awaits them and their realm.
EVTDESC_MNM_1202_A: The battle is fierce and I have gained new skills! The vision I have been carrying in my heart certainly holds true! My personal guard are being left behind as I charge into battle. I am amazing!
EVTDESC_MNM_1202_B: The battle rages on and I am surprised by every arrow that I deflect and by every blow that misses me. I have been waiting for something terrible to happen, yet [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] does not seem finished with me. I suppose there is a chance that I have misinterpreted the vision I had? I feel pretty great.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1202: My enemies will learn to fear me!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1202: They will never see me surrender.
EVTDESC_MNM_1203_A: As the battle rages on, I am not surprised by the heavy losses we are taking. Every arrow that sears over my head makes my pulse quicken. Just as I am becoming convinced that this is the battle I saw in my vision, I stumble from a sharp pain in my leg. An arrows sticks out from my knee.
EVTDESC_MNM_1203_B: We have been fighting this war for what feels like an eternity and I fail to see how anything good can come of all this bloodshed. Just as I am beginning to think that I misinterpreted the vision I had, I am hit by something, hard. An arrow sticks out from my knee.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1203: Curses! Where is the glory in this?
EVTDESC_MNM_1204_A: I meet the stare of my newborn [From.GetSonDaughter] for the first time and it is clear that my vision has come true! Rarely have I seen such clear signs of intelligence and ambition in one so young. [From.GetFirstName] is the child that was promised!
EVTDESC_MNM_1204_B: I am not sure what I was expecting, but this child blinks at me with the most curious eyes. I suddenly feel all my worries wash away. I must have misunderstood the vision I had scrying in the water.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1204: I will be the first to admit I was wrong.
EVTDESC_MNM_1205_A: My worst fears have come true. Behind the dull stare of my newborn baby [From.GetSonDaughter] there can be little in the way of brilliance or even ability. In time I will know for sure but I am already convinced that this is the child my vision warned me about.
EVTDESC_MNM_1205_B: I am not sure what I was expecting, but this newborn child blinks at me with the dullest of eyes. I feel my confidence wain as I hold [From.GetHerHim] and I soon give [From.GetHerHim] back to the nurse. I must have misunderstood the vision I had in the water.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1205: There is scarce consolation in this accomplishment.
EVTDESC261_good_battle_omen: A soldier has distinguished himself on the battlefield. Such an asset! This must be what the vision was about!
EVTDESC261_bad_battle_omen: A skillful soldier almost singlehandedly took down the enemy army in a battle today. It makes me doubt the troublesome vision I had.
261_OPTA: I knew something good was going to happen!
261_OPTB: I suppose I could have misunderstood the vision...
fulfilled_vision_great_desc: There is a tenacity to this character, as they believe they can definitely predict the future.
fulfilled_vision_ok_desc: There is an open-mindedness to this character, as they believe it should be possible to predict the future.
fulfilled_vision_bad_desc: This character has a willingness to learn, as they have failed to predict the future at least once.
fulfilled_vision_worst_desc: This character is doubting their own abilities, as they have repeatedly failed to predict the future.
EVTDESC_MNM_1208_A: My lover has passed away. I knew it would happen.
