EVTDESC_MNM_1208_B: My lover has passed away. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1208: Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1208: I must have misunderstood the vision I had. I will do better next time.
EVTDESC_MNM_1209_A: My dear friend has passed. I knew it would happen.
EVTDESC_MNM_1209_B: My dear friend has passed. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1209: Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1209: A heavy price, but I must have misunderstood the vision I had.
EVTDESC_MNM_1210_A: Hah! My rival has passed. I knew it would happen.
EVTDESC_MNM_1210_B: My rival has passed. And here I thought something bad would happen!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1210: Even knowing the future, I could not predict this overwhelming joy.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1210: I am glad I was wrong!
EVTDESC_MNM_1211_A: My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetFatherMother] has passed. I knew it would happen.
EVTDESC_MNM_1211_B: My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetFatherMother] has passed. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1211: Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1211: A heavy price, but I must have misunderstood the vision I had.
EVTDESC_MNM_1212_A: My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetSonDaughter] has passed. I knew it would happen.
EVTDESC_MNM_1212_B: My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetSonDaughter] has passed. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1212: Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1212: A heavy price, but I must have misunderstood the vision I had.
EVTDESC_MNM_1214_A: Some time has passed since... my beloved pet passed. Having thought about it, I realize that this must be what my vision was about...
EVTDESC_MNM_1214_B: Some time has passed since my pet died. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
EVTDESC_MNM_1214_A_lunatic: Some time has passed since... my pet passed. Having thought about it, I have become certain that this is what my vision was about. Perhaps there was a curse, and my vision was the only warning. Oh, that poor little ball of fluff.
EVTDESC_MNM_1214_B_lunatic: It has been some time since my pet left this world. I'm beginning to think it was no curse, but perhaps it was I? WHAT IF I FORETOLD ITS DEMISE?
EVTOPTA_MNM_1214_cat: Oh, my dear cat. Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1214_dog: Oh, my dear dog. Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1214_cat: Oh, my dear cat. I must strive to understand the visions better.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1214_dog: Oh, my dear dog. I must strive to understand the visions better.
EVTDESC_MNM_1215_A: I have gained the [From.GetFullName]! I knew something good would happen!
EVTDESC_MNM_1215_B: I have gained the [From.GetFullName]! This is... not what I expected.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1215: I guess I was wrong about the vision.
EVTDESC_MNM_1219_A: I have lost the [FromFromFrom.GetFullName]! I knew something bad would happen!
EVTDESC_MNM_1219_B: I have lost the [FromFromFrom.GetFullName]! This is... not what I expected.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1219: At least I don't have to worry about the omen anymore.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1219: I guess I was wrong about the vision.
EVTDESC_MNM_1220_A: So I suppose the vision was about me having [Root.GetDisease]. I knew something bad would happen!
EVTDESC_MNM_1220_B: So I suppose the vision was about me having [Root.GetDisease]. That could have been clearer, I think!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1220: At least I don't have to worry about the omen anymore.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1220: I guess I was wrong about it being something positive.
EVTDESC_MNM_1221_A: So I suppose the vision was about my [From.GetRootRelation] having [From.GetDisease]. I knew something bad would happen!
EVTDESC_MNM_1221_B: So I suppose the vision was about my [From.GetRootRelation] having [From.GetDisease]... That could have been clearer, I think!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1221: At least I don't have to worry about the omen anymore.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1221: I guess I was wrong about it being something positive.
EVTDESC_MNM_1222_A: So I suppose the vision was about me being cured of my disease! I knew something good would happen!
EVTDESC_MNM_1222_B: So I suppose the vision was about me having rid myself of disease? That could have been clearer, I think!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1222: I guess I was wrong about it being something negative.
EVTDESC_MNM_1223_A: So I suppose the vision was about my [From.GetRootRelation] combating [From.GetHerHis] disease. I knew something good would happen!
EVTDESC_MNM_1223_B: So I am starting to think that the vision I had was about my [From.GetRootRelation] combating [From.GetHerHis] disease...
EVTOPTB_MNM_1223: I guess I was wrong about it being something negative?
EVTDESC_MNM_1225_C: I am not sure whether it is a new-found interest in [envisioned_friend.GetEducationSubject] that we have been connecting over, or simply the infectious laughter of [envisioned_friend.GetTitledFirstName], but we are spending more and more time together. I feel like we are bonding, like true friends!
EVTDESC_MNM_1225_E: I am told a peculiar tale of an owl, which has taken up residence under the roofing of one of our barracks. The guards have tried chasing it off, but it keeps returning. "Perhaps it is also a seeker?" I offer to one of my advisors, who responds: "My distinguished [Root.GetLordLady], it would make for a very distinguished pet..."
EVTOPTB_MNM_1225_battle: My vision... How could it be so wrong?
EVTOPTA_MNM_1225_relationship: My vision has hinted at this, all along, I think.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1225_relationship: My vision was clearly wrong, but I don't even mind!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1225_power: The symbol of wisdom, by my side. This must be the boon I foresaw!
EVTDESC_MNM_1226_A: During a hunt with my kinsmen, I am struck by the beauty of a white stag. However, the joy is short-lived as the magnificent beast charges at me. I am suddenly reminded of the terrible vision I had, and I yank the reigns of my horse tight in retreat. "Protect the [Root.GetTitle]!" I hear, just before the sound of a flying arrow is cut short. I groan.
EVTDESC_MNM_1226_B: During a hunt with my kinsmen, I am struck by the beauty of a white stag. However, the joy is short-lived as the magnificent beast charges at me. Suddenly reminded of the wonderful vision I had, I attempt to stare the beast down. To my surprise, it has no effect. "Protect the [Root.GetTitle]!" I hear, just before the sound of a flying arrow is cut short. I groan.
EVTDESC_MNM_1226_C: [envisioned_rival.GetTitledFirstName] has been overheard spreading foul gossip about me. I am not certain what I did to deserve this treatment, but remembering my vision of agony, I have decided not to fight it. Perhaps [envisioned_rival.GetHerHis] vile feelings towards me are simply a result of the stars traversing the sky?
EVTDESC_MNM_1226_D: [envisioned_rival.GetTitledFirstName] has been overheard spreading foul gossip about me. I am not certain what I did to deserve this treatment, but remembering my vision, I am beginning to doubt my interpretation of it. Perhaps [envisioned_rival.GetHerHis] hostility is simply a result of the stars traversing the sky?
EVTDESC_MNM_1226_E: There has been a merchant visiting [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] recently. At first it seemed that their odd trinkets and potions were simply the works of a wandering herbalist. However, it appears that the man has swindled several of my subjects for money, using fearful tales of necessary wards and rituals to be performed, 'lest demons will beset us all.
EVTDESC_MNM_1226_F: There has been a merchant visiting [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] recently. Recalling my vision, I initially reacted well to this wandering herbalist, as he seemed to be providing comfort to my subjects, with his trinkets and curious concoctions. However, it appears that the man has swindled several of my subjects for money, threatening that demons will beset us all unless his goods are bought.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1226_battle: The incompetence! I knew something terrible was going to happen!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1226_battle: It hurts! And my vision, how could it be so wrong?!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1226_relationship: Some things cannot be interfered with.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1226_relationship: I will have to deal with [envisioned_rival.GetHerHim] at some point.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1226_power: Superstitious fools! This is just what I warned them about!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1226_power: Superstitious fools! Yet my vision should have warned me...
EVTDESC_MNM_1227: Nothing has happened that I can attribute to my vision in the water. I'm starting to think I didn't see anything at all.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1227_TT: You let go of your premonition.\n
hermetics_perform_scrying_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order to turn to the mystical art of divination in an attempt to foretell the future.
hermetics_make_horoscope_desc: As a member of [From.Society.GetName], you may search the heavens for insight into the future of your child §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!.
hermetics_make_horoscope_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on portraits of your children in order to make them a horoscope.
hermetics_horoscope_cooldown_tooltip: Has NOT already had their horoscope examined\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1250: The stars hold many secrets, but they are not indecipherable. Using the right instruments, and frame of mind, I will uncover the destiny of [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_1250_TT: You prepare your tools and instruments for the long nights ahead.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1251_steward: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed [Root.GetRandomPlanetName] moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for administrative tasks and a practical mind.
EVTDESC_MNM_1251_fighter: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed [Root.GetRandomPlanetName] moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for the battlefield and a combat prowess uncommon amongst most of our members at court.
EVTDESC_MNM_1251_diplomat: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed [Root.GetRandomPlanetName] moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for a position of diplomacy, with wits and charm uncommon amongst most of our members at court.
EVTDESC_MNM_1251_schemer: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed [Root.GetRandomPlanetName] moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for intrigue and cleverness.
EVTDESC_MNM_1251_scholar: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed the moon moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for studying, and an intellect uncommon amongst most of our members at court.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1251: I could not have made up a destiny more fitting for [horoscope_child.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTA_MNM_1251_TT: You are thankful for your findings and will encourage any interest of this kind.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1251: This is not what I have in mind for [horoscope_child.GetHerHim]!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1251_TT: You will seek to discourage these tendencies.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1252_A: My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] has been spending many nights staring at the sky and telling me of the grand things that the stars have in store for me. "You'll make a fine [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] one day", [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] says. While I am not sure what [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] means, I have noticed that [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] looks at me differently lately... Perhaps with pride?
EVTDESC_MNM_1252_B: My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] has been spending many nights staring at the sky. A servant told me that it is for my own good. I am not sure what [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] gets from it, but I have noticed that [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] looks at me differently lately... "What good is another [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]?" [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] sighs, and walks away.
EVTDESC_MNM_1252_C: Before [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] passed away, I'm told that [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] spent many nights staring at the sky and telling me of the grand things that the stars have in store for me. I am not sure what [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] meant, but I I have heard servants whispering about it. They say [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] thought I was destined for greatness.
EVTDESC_MNM_1252_D: Before [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] passed away, I'm told that [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] spent many nights staring at the sky, talking to [horoscope_maker.GetHerselfHimself]. Servants tell me it was about my destiny, and that my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] did not think the stars were in my favor.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1252_1: I wouldn't mind being great at something.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1252_2: That certainly takes the pressure off!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1252_TT: You try to put it out of your mind.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1253_steward: As [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] has been growing older, [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] has been seen expressing [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] sense for organization whenever the opportunity has arisen. I am not even sure where [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] got [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] hands on an abacus, but [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] carries it around wherever [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] goes.
EVTDESC_MNM_1253_fighter: Often found near the sparring grounds, [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] is proving surprisingly apt with a spear. Of course the wooden thing is merely a toy, but the faces of my commanders during their practice with [horoscope_child.GetHerHim] hints of a surprising talent in the [horoscope_child.GetBoyGirl].
EVTDESC_MNM_1253_diplomat: It does not take anybody long to notice that [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] is a thoughtful [horoscope_child.GetBoyGirl], well attuned to the feelings of others. [horoscope_child.GetSheHeCap] is increasingly curious about foreign customs, and is often found engaging in conversation with servants and visitors alike. "[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]? What is it like to grow up outside of the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]?", [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] asked me today.
EVTDESC_MNM_1253_schemer: [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] has always had a keen eye for intrigue. Reading my letters, eavesdropping on council meetings  the [horoscope_child.GetBoyGirl] has little respect for privacy. Yet it is hard to say what motivates [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] mischief. Meanwhile, the court seems to think that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is growing up to be the brightest member of house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
EVTDESC_MNM_1253_scholar: I know that [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] is well-read for [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] age, but I did not realize the extent of it  the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] archivist recently complained to me: "The young [horoscope_child.GetLordLady] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] made notations in the margin of one the works, [Root.GetMasterMistress]..." Flustered, he continues: "I'd consider it blasphemy, but [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] calculations were also right."
EVTOPTA_MNM_1253_TT: In line with [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] destiny, you believe §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! will make great use of this talent.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1253: No! There are many other things I wish [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] would focus on.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1253_TT: You will put efforts into steering §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! into another direction in life.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_1253: The stars will always have their way.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1253_TT: In spite of your initial doubts, you allow §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] presumed destiny.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_1253: This is not the path I chose for [horoscope_child.GetHerHim]!
EVTOPTD_MNM_1253_TT: You will increase your efforts to steer §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! into another direction in life.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1254_steward: As [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] leans over the [inspiring_adult.GetEducationTool], I find myself steering the conversation back to the architecture of our [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. [inspiring_adult.GetSheHeCap] knows of my interests, and I admit it's relaxing to have somebody to talk to about these things. I sometimes wonder whether my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] was right... Am I destined for these matters?
EVTDESC_MNM_1254_fighter: I wipe the sweat from my brow as [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] points out the flaws in my parrying technique. I'm glad that a [inspiring_adult.GetEducationRole] like [inspiring_adult.GetHerHim] takes time out of [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] schedule to spar with me, and fighting has in some ways become part of who I am. I sometimes wonder whether my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] was right... Are my battles already written in the stars?
EVTDESC_MNM_1254_diplomat: As I am walking around the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] catches up with me. "My [Root.GetLordLady], the council is most pleased with your assessment of their proposal", [inspiring_adult.GetSheHe] says, a wide smile on [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] face. [inspiring_adult.GetSheHeCap] has increasingly been encouraging me to partake in diplomatic meetings. "Do you not believe, as your [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother], that it is your destiny, to help people?"
EVTDESC_MNM_1254_schemer: [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] has often inspired me to keep my eyes and ears sharp... So when I find [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] notes carelessly strewn around [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] quarters, I cannot help but wonder if [inspiring_adult.GetSheHe] intended for me to find them. "From every [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], [Root.GetSheHe] could be the one we will remember... Will the young [Root.GetLordLady] refuse what the heavens have so clearly laid out for [Root.GetHerHim]?"
EVTDESC_MNM_1254_scholar: Reading has always come naturally to you, child, [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] tells me, leaning in over my notes. "Your writing is improving as well", [inspiring_adult.GetSheHe] adds, walking back to [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] seat by the window. The [Root.GetCapitalHolding] is unusually quiet today and outside the sun is shining. Lost in thought, my mind drifts to my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]'s horoscope.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1254: Perhaps a [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] is what I am meant to be.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1254: Surely [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] would want me to make my own destiny.
EVTDESC_MNM_1255_A: I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] remains interested in [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Turning my eyes upwards, I give a silent nod to the heavens, thanking the stars for their guidance.
EVTDESC_MNM_1255_B: I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] remains interested in [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Turning my eyes upwards, I take a deep breath. Perhaps the influence of the stars are unavoidable. May be that [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]'s destiny is out of my control.
EVTDESC_MNM_1255_C: I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] is growing reluctant to the idea of becoming a [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]. Sighing, I rub my temples. Perhaps knowing about [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] destiny makes [horoscope_child.GetHerHim] anxious?
EVTDESC_MNM_1255_D: I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] is growing increasingly reluctant to the idea of becoming a [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]. I take a deep breath while I contemplate the stars and their influence over us all.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1255: I believe the heavens have a plan for [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_1255_TT: You wonder what the future will bring.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1255: Actually, I think the stars have something else in store for my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon].
EVTOPTB_MNM_1255_TT: You doubt the importance of the horoscope you made for §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
guided_by_horoscope_stewardship_desc: This child pays attention to details, and likes to draw and study maps.
guided_by_horoscope_martial_desc: This child is often found nearby the military practice grounds.
guided_by_horoscope_intrigue_desc: This child is often found listening in on your conversations.
guided_by_horoscope_learning_desc: This child is usually seen carrying a book under their arm.
guided_by_horoscope_stewardship_adult_de: This character pays attention to details, and keeps a library of maps.
guided_by_horoscope_martial_adult_desc: This character is often found by the sparring grounds.
guided_by_horoscope_intrigue_adult_desc: This character is often found listening in on your conversations.
guided_by_horoscope_learning_adult_desc: This character is usually seen carrying a book under their arm.
horoscope_outcome_artist_desc: An inner conflict of personality has created an eternal suffering within this character.
horoscope_outcome_scatterbrain_desc: An inner conflict of personality has landed this character with some concentration issues.
horoscope_outcome_brute_desc: When it comes to interacting with others, this character is often forceful, but tactless.
horoscope_outcome_arrogant_desc: Some unresolved personal issues has left this character with a need to prove themselves.
horoscope_outcome_jittery_desc: This character is eager to please, but does not seem to trust their ability to do so.
EVTDESC_MNM_1270_A: Over the years, I've always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Even once I officially finished my education, I did not feel satisfied. "There must be more to this", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. I am not sure if I have been guided by the stars, as my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have put it, but I do feel like I can finally be more than what everyone has assumed.
EVTDESC_MNM_1270_B: Over the years, I've always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Even once I officially finished my education, I did not feel satisfied. "There must be more to this", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have had other plans for me, but I feel confident that this is the path the stars laid out before me.
EVTDESC_MNM_1270_C: Over the years, I haven't always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Yet I did not feel satisfied at all, once I officially finished my education. "I think I made a mistake in neglecting these studies", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. I am not sure if I have been guided by the stars, as my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have put it, but I do feel like I can finally be more than what everyone has assumed.
EVTDESC_MNM_1270_D: Over the years, I haven't always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Yet I did not feel satisfied once I finished my education. "I think I made a mistake in neglecting these studies", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have had other plans for me, but perhaps [horoscope_maker.GetHerHis] horoscope was right all along?
EVTOPTA_MNM_1270: I did not even realize that I had it in me.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1270: I will keep honing my skills.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1271: I always had mixed feelings about all of this.
EVTDESC933: A noble in [Root.Location.GetName] caught me while I was spying there!
EVTDESC20331:
I received word that your spymaster [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has been spying in one of my counties. This is intolerable and as to stop further interference I have arrested [FromFrom.GetHerHim]!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC20332:
I received word that you have been spying in one of my counties. I will let it pass. This time.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
decrease_prosperity_custom_tooltip: The §YProsperity§! of the county decreases slightly\n
sabotaged_buildings_desc: A spy has sabotaged building sites in this county.
sabotaged_defences_desc: A spy has sabotaged defenses in this county.
sabotaged_unrest_desc: A spy has incited unrest in this county.
MNM.70020.d: I have successfully managed to sabotage the province of [Root.Location.GetName]. I should inform my liege!
action_organize_spies_mystics_desc: Have your [GetSpymasterName] focus his attention on the local nobles in a county, increasing the likelihood of intrigue events against them. This will also discourage vassals from associating with Factions, or give you the opportunity to recruit new members for your own.
action_uncover_plots_offmap_desc: Order your [GetSpymasterName] to uncover plots and discourage vassals from associating with Factions.
MNM.70022.d: I have found proof that there is a plot brewing in the realm.
MNM.70023.d: My investigation into the rumor of a plot must have alerted someone. Armed thugs are breaking into my room!
MNM.70024.d: You have spent some time investigating one of your liege's vassals, and you feel that you have gathered enough information to gain a leverage that would discourage the vassal from supporting conspiratorial factions in the future.
MNM.78003.d: During my stay at the court of a noble in the realm, I have done my utmost to present my liege in a more favorable light. But sinister forces around me seem to conspire to twist and turn my every action into something dubious and every word spoken into an insult.
MNM.78000.d: During my stay at the court of a noble, I have done my utmost to present my liege in a more favorable light and have him recognized as the benevolent and peaceful ruler [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] is.
MNM.70005.d: I have worked improving the demesne of my liege, and have recently been met with success in my efforts. [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] will surely be pleased!
MNM.78007.d: While managing your liege's demesne you let in a group of what you thought was merchants looking for new business ventures. But as it turns out they were smugglers!
MNM.78008.d: Your incompetent [From.GetJobTitle] has let a group of smugglers into the county of [smuggler_province.GetName]! Apparently [From.GetSheHe] thought they were merchants, what a fool!
MNM.70015.d: While drilling the commanders, [commander_character.GetFirstName] starts mocking your technique. Before you know it, the situation escalates into a full-fledged brawl!
MNM.70016.d: Instead of drilling the commanders, [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetFirstName] has been fighting them! There is truly a lack of discipline in your ranks...
RULE_DEVIL_WORSHIPERS_DEFAULT_DESC: Devil Worshipers will practice their foul magic across the world.
RULE_DEVIL_WORSHIPERS_NONE_DESC: There will be no Devil Worshipers.
MNM.70012.d: I have found a man of great talent that would be willing to serve my liege as a commander, I should send word at once.
MNM.70010.d: After weeks of drilling I believe that one of the commanders my liege ordered me to train, [commander_improved.GetFirstName], has improved significantly!
MNM.70011.d: My [From.GetJobTitle] tells me that one of my commanders, [commander_improved.GetFirstName], has improved significantly!
action_organize_army_desc: The [GetMarshalName] will strive to organize your armies and drill your commanders. Reduces retinue monthly cost.
MNM.70013.o: I think I know who to replace...
the_devil_worshipers_tainted_touch_allow: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not been cursed in the last 10 years
String_origin_of_the_Trinity_before_Mess: the origins of the Trinity in the era before the Messiah
String_Qabalah: the Qabalah's relationship to Hermes Trismegistus
String_unity_with_the_One: how unity with the One is achieved
String_nature_of_Prima_materia: the nature of the Prima materia
String_nature_of_the_Inner_and_the_Outer: the nature of the Inner and the Outer cosmos
String_Prisca_theologia: unity through the lens of Prisca theologia
String_esoteric_meaning_of_the_Caduceus: the esoteric meaning of the Caduceus
String_truth_inherent_to_Divine_Consciou: the truth inherent in Divine Consciousness
String_interaction_of_the_soul_and_alche: the interaction between the soul and alchemy
String_very_definition_of_a_true_magnum_: the definition of a true magnum opus
String_the_nature_of_the_Judgements_and_: the nature of the Judgements and the Bazaar
String_divinity_of_snails: whether snails, due to their spiral shells, are the most Divine creatures
String_snake_or_staff: whether snakes and staves are symbolically the exact same thing
String_why_gold_anyways: how it's always lead that must be transmuted into gold, when beer is just as noble
String_medicinal_application_of_alcohol: the highly medicinal applications of alcohol "when applied internally"
String_emerald_tablet_kept_at_home: whether it's true that I have an emerald tablet at home or not
String_procedure_of_previous_debate: the crazy things that happened at the last Great Debate
String_soul_leaving_body: how it would be incredible if the soul could leave the body temporarily, then return
String_kings_or_angels_higher_ranked: who is more important in the Divine hierarchy, kings or angels
String_inferno_is_maybe_cool: that perhaps eternal torment is not as bad as the laity has been led to believe
String_eternal_life_not_that_great: the pains and troubles that come with eternal life
String_top_ten_alchemists: the top ten alchemists of all time
String_that_feeling: that feeling of Divine presence you get from smelling certain liquids at the moment of synthesis
String_gardening_noble_work: whether gardening is best left for servants, or secretly the most noble work one can do
String_alchemists_make_better_lovers: the obvious reasons for why alchemists make better lovers
String_trinity_or_maybe_quaternity: a Quaternity as the answer instead of Trismegistus Trinity
String_assassins_drugs: You will inhale the drugs provided by the Order, and soon see their effects.
String_assassins_drugs_withdrawal: You will inhale the drugs provided by the Order, and soon see their effects.\nThis will help with your withdrawal, but use comes at a risk.
EVTDESC_MNM_6816: As if from a haze, I emerge, once more standing in the light of the sun. I did not even fully understand what was weighing so heavily on my mind, but its dark grasp has finally loosened.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6816: I feel calmer than I have for a long time.
EVTOPTB_MNM_6816: Demons of the mind, I say to thee, be gone.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6816: The very sight of the world no longer drains me, it emboldens!
EVTOPTD_MNM_6816: The scales of madness have fallen from before my eyes.
EVTDESC_MNM_6817: As my mind perceives the world in new and unexpected ways, the shapes in the smoke filling my chamber crystallize, and I begin to understand.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6817: I see friends past, and friends I have yet to meet...
EVTOPTB_MNM_6817: Great battles play out before me.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6817: Shadows dissipate, revealing all they once hid.
EVTOPTD_MNM_6817: The wisdom of the past, written in ashen clouds.
EVTOPTE_MNM_6817: The flow of gold is as malleable as steam.
EVTDESC_MNM_6818: As my body is purged by the intoxicating smoke, my very being changes, and what once ailed me can no longer touch what I have become.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6818: My affliction has been driven away.
EVTDESC_MNM_6800: It is time to open my mind to visions of paradise. They will ensure the steadiness of my hand as I act on behalf of the order, but how much do I dare reveal to myself?
EVTDESC_MNM_6802_GREAT: Clarity! I can see the world as if I am soaring above it, with eyes as sharp as an eagle. Never before have I felt so aware.
EVTDESC_MNM_6802_GOOD: The visions have revealed much to me. I understand so much more now, even a hint of my own place in the great mosaic of God's plan.
EVTDESC_MNM_6802_BAD: I woke in a haystack outside my tower window. My memories from the day before are hazy, but I remember the sensation of falling through darkness, surrounded by souls twisting and moaning in pain.
EVTOPTA_MNM_6802_BAD: I might have to be more careful.
EVTDESC_MNM_6803: It has been weeks since I last used the hashish, and I find my thoughts returning to that day time and time again. My mind refuses to let go of the visions I had of Paradise, and I'm longing for more.
EVTDESC_MNM_6806: It has been months since the last time I used the hashish, and as the memory of my visions fade, so does my desperate desire to experience it again.
EVTDESCA_MNM_6810: How could I not feel this hunger inside me before? No wonder the world is as it is when a hunger as demonic as this can reside silently for so long in my stomach!
EVTOPTA_MNM_6810: Yes, this chicken might banish my demons.
EVTDESCB_MNM_6810: Through the smoke filling my room I see clearly. Traitors to the left of me and false believers to the right. All of them clamoring for my head. What a fool I have been!
EVTDESCC_MNM_6810: In the darkness of my smoke-filled room, I wonder what the point of it all is. I was supposed to see Paradise. Instead I see the truth, and it has left me empty.
EVTOPTC_MNM_6810: Every day the same, and the world will never change.
diplomatic_insight_desc: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the meaning of friendship and animosity.
martial_insight_desc: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the art of war.
intrigue_insight_desc: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the true intentions of those claiming to be their friend.
learning_insight_desc: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the hidden knowledge of the world.
stewardship_insight_desc: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the exchange of desires.
EVTDESC_MNM_5204: While debating [Custom.GetHermeticDebateSubject], I have the sudden impulse that a comedic story, once told to me by a stable-hand, would underline my point perfectly. Even if it doesn't, laughter might win me just as many allies.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5204: Once upon a time, a servant of mine was shoveling horse dung...
EVTOPTA_MNM_5204_TT: There is a chance the joke doesn't land, but if you do well you might charm everyone's beards off!
EVTOPTB_MNM_5204: This is not the time for foolish tales.
EVTDESC_MNM_5205: '...and if those words, even uttered by a simpleton, does not illustrate my point, nothing ever will.'\nI am unsure if anyone heard my decisive conclusion over the roars of laughter, but it mattered little. The crowd was completely won over by my story.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5205: Just as funny as I am thoughtful!
EVTDESC_MNM_5206: I stand before the room in complete silence for a minute before asking again. 'Get it?'\nSomeone accidentally drops the pin they used to illustrate the Theory of Dancing Angels to the floor. The light ding is as loud as a bell in my ears.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5206: I can't ever show my face to those people again!
EVTDESC_MNM_1289: [Root.GetTitledName] is born under the sign of [Root.GetWesternZodiacSign].
gain_zodiac_trait_effect_tt: You will gain a trait appropriate for your zodiac sign!\n
EVTDESC_MNM_4399: I have abandoned my attempt to better myself in seclusion, and have rejoined the world around me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4399: I am good enough as it is.
quest_secret_religions_societies_prepare: To build the strength of our faith, you must spread the word of [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] as far as it can reach. There is fertile ground within the realm where people seem open to new ideas. Found a community there, and see it blossom.

Use the Prepare Ground power in the province by right-clicking the county shield. This will start your attempt to found a community of believers there. Successfully building a community will complete the mission.
quest_secret_religions_societies_blend_i: It is a challenge to maintain a falsely professed faith at the best of time, but those who would not understand you are more suspicious than ever. You must show them beyond any shadow of a doubt that you believe what you have told them.
Take the decision to Blend In to start your attempt. Successfully convincing those around you that you are a believer of their faith will complete the mission.
EVTDESC_MNM_5201: During a late conversation with a fellow member of [This.Society.GetName], I find myself discussing the power of one's phrasing. When I jokingly suggest that I should attempt to deliver my arguments in verse, [fellow_debater_target.GetTitledFirstName], to my surprise, nods appreciatively. "Do not underestimate the power of a good rhyme", [fellow_debater_target.GetSheHe] says.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5201: Perhaps it is exactly what my theme needs!
EVTOPTA_MNM_5201_TT: The rest of your evening is spent discussing the finer points of poetry.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_5201: Nonsense! I will focus on facts, not embellishments.
EVTOPTB_MNM_5201_TT: You spend the rest of your evening preparing for your next debate, increasing your chances of winning.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_5202: During today's debate, I'm unsettled to find my rival [rival_debater_target.GetTitledFirstName] observing me. Turning back to the rest of the audience, I take a deep breath, before continuing my reasoning. Once I'm finished, I am startled to see that [rival_debater_target.GetFirstName] has stood up, smiling  with a quirked eyebrow [rival_debater_target.GetSheHe] offers me a nod of respect.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5202: I am glad we can see beyond our differences during occasions like these.
EVTDESC_MNM_5203_A: After some time spent listening to the debates between scholars of varying intellect, I admit to occasionally drifting off into my own thoughts... Yet there is one person that keeps bringing my attention back to the present  [striking_debater_target.GetTitledName] has wits and a way with words, unlike any I have seen.
EVTDESC_MNM_5203_B: After some time spent listening to the debates between scholars of varying intellect, I admit to occasionally drifting off into my own thoughts... I suppose I shouldn't be surprised that there is one person that keeps bringing my attention back to the present  [striking_debater_target.GetTitledFirstName] has always had a way with words, as well as an alluring presence.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5203: I... I am not sure what these feelings are!
EVTDESC_MNM_5207: I hear the voice of [fellow_member_1.GetTitledFirstName] before I even enter the room. "[fellow_member_2.GetTitledFirstName], you clearly know nothing of [fellow_member_1.GetHermeticDebateSubject]! Why are we even having this conversation?!"
EVTOPTA_MNM_5207: [fellow_member_1.GetFirstName], there you are! Keep your voice down, would you?
EVTOPTC_MNM_5207: I am sure this is just a misunderstanding.
EVTOPTD_MNM_5207: I should just pretend I wasn't here...
EVTOPTA_MNM_5208_TT: You sabotage the chances of §Y[fellow_member_target.GetTitledName]§! making a good impression during the Grand Debate.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_5208: This is foolish, I respect my fellow scholars.
childish_prankster_desc: This character has acted very unprofessionally during an important scholarly gathering, and is a little embarrassed from the way people shy away from them now.
tarnished_reputation_desc: This character has been the victim of a messy prank involving ink and ruined clothes  it has made them a little skittish around other scholars.
EVTDESC_MNM_5209: These past few days, I've felt an energy rising within me, urging to be used for creativity. "I could build a new laboratory! Wait, no... I should prepare my notes for tomorrow", I mumble. Glancing at a stack of parchments, it occurs to me that I could compose a letter to my dear [inspired_letter_target.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_5209_love_target: Words cannot truly express my love for [inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim], but I'll try.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5209_friendly_target: Inspired words, to show my appreciation for [inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTA_MNM_5209_hostile_target: I'll make it difficult for [inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim] not to like me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5209_TT: My dear [inspired_letter_target.GetRootRelation]... I would not be who I am without you in my life.\nIn the end you toss papers around you, and spend all night perfecting the letter.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_5209_love_target: I've been meaning to put my feelings into words for a long time.
EVTOPTB_MNM_5209_friendly_target: A small poem, to illustrate my appreciation for [inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTB_MNM_5209_hostile_target: Even [inspired_letter_target.GetSheHe] cannot resist a good poem.
EVTOPTB_MNM_5209_TT: I would not be who I am today, were it not for you. You are my sun and moon, my Alpha and Omega.\nIn the end you toss papers around you, and spend all night perfecting the letter.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_5209: Focus! This is an opportune time for my work on the Prima materia.
EVTOPTC_MNM_5209_TT: You spend the rest of your evening researching, increasing your chances of winning the debate.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_5210: I have received a long and heartfelt letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It contains beautiful metaphors about how important I am to [From.GetHerHim], expressed with an eager earnestness I have seldom seen in my [From.GetRootRelation] before. I wonder what prompted this...
EVTDESC_MNM_5211: Many of my fellow debaters often stay up late, honing their arguments well into the night. I'm starting to feel the lack of sleep getting to me... My mind often drifts, leaving me staring into thin air, and while I sift through my notes, looking for points not yet brought up by my peers, my hands show signs of tremors.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5211: This is too important to stop now.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5211_TT: You increase your chances of winning the debate.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_5211: I just want to get some rest, I don't care who wins the debate.
EVTOPTB_MNM_5211_TT: You decrease your chances of winning the debate.\n
brew_happiness_potion_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portrait of any §RDepressed§! or §RStressed§! character in your court, in order to make them a potion that raises their spirits, in exchange for §Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
tooltip_info_omen_tt: This option is available due to you having the §Y[This.GetOmenModifierName]§! modifier.\n[This.GetOmenResultReaction].\n
String_good_battle_omen_bad_event: You are left confused, your self-esteem wounded by the inaccuracy of your vision
String_good_relationship_omen_bad_event: You shake your head, your self-esteem wounded by the inaccuracy of your vision
String_good_power_omen_bad_event: You lock yourself in your quarters, your self-esteem wounded by the inaccuracy of your vision
String_bad_battle_omen_bad_event: You feel defeated, yet strengthened by the accuracy of your vision
String_bad_relationship_omen_bad_event: You feel heart-broken, yet strengthened by the accuracy of your vision
String_bad_power_omen_bad_event: You feel defeated, yet strengthened by the accuracy of your vision
String_good_battle_omen_good_event: You smile triumphantly, encouraged by the accuracy of your vision
String_good_relationship_omen_good_event: You smile blissfully, pleased by the accuracy of your vision
String_good_power_omen_good_event: You smile cheerfully, reassured by the accuracy of your vision
String_bad_battle_omen_good_event: You are pleased, yet confused by the inaccuracy of your vision
String_bad_relationship_omen_good_event: You are pleased, but also confused by the inaccuracy of your vision
String_bad_power_omen_good_event: You are pleased, but also confused by the inaccuracy of your vision
final_horoscope_outcome_for_parent_desc_: I am not sure what my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] has been up to lately, but [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] certainly isn't proving to become the great [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] I once predicted in [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] horoscope.

My [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] has truly found [horoscope_child.GetHerselfHimself] in the destiny my horoscope predicted, so long ago. [horoscope_child.GetSheHeCap] will makes a fine [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole].
fina_horoscope_outcome_for_parent_opt: Maybe it's because [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is born under the [horoscope_child.GetWesternZodiacSign]?
EVTDESC_MNM_1271_A: Perhaps it is a blessing that [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] is no longer with us. [horoscope_maker.GetSheHeCap] would have been distraught to see me not living up to my potential, as the great [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] anticipated of me. May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], forgive me. It's just not who I am.
EVTDESC_MNM_1271_B: I admit that I have perhaps been avoiding my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] lately. [horoscope_maker.GetSheHeCap] is likely disgruntled, or perhaps even disappointed in me, for not living up to my potential as the great [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] long ago predicted that I would become. May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], forgive me. It's just not who I am.
EVTTOOLTIP_WoL_352_ASTROLOGY: Bet that [This.GetFirstName] will respond to you having pegged [This.GetHerHim] as a [This.GetWesternZodiacSign]...
EVTOPTA_WOL_352_ASTROLOGY_compatible: I know, I have thought about it too!
EVTOPTA_WOL_352_ASTROLOGY_mismatch: That's sweet, but I think you've read your charts wrong. No, I don't mind!
EVTOPTA_WOL_352_ASTROLOGY_mismatch_TT: You let the inaccuracy of the comment slide, as there are no TRULY incompatible signs...\n
EVTOPTB_WOL_352_ASTROLOGY_compatible_TT: You are ruled by more than stars.\n
EVTOPTB_WOL_352_ASTROLOGY_mismatch_TT: You could never fall for a [From.GetWesternZodiacSign].\n
because_member_of_society_tt: This option is available due to you being a member of §Y[This.Society.GetName]§!.\n
quest_the_devil_worshipers_demonic_impre: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on a female follower of [Root.GetDWDevil] of child-bearing age in your court and select §Y'Unholy Impregnation'§!
EVTDESC_MNM_7507_SELF: I whispered the words of the summoning spell even though I wanted to shout them at the night sky! The greatest honor was about to be mine. As the final syllables passed through my lips, I shut my eyes and waited in silence, my heart pounding hard with excitement. A warm hand gently squeezed my shoulder.
EVTDESC_MNM_7507_OTHER: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] gladly accepted my proposal. 'I could never imagine a greater honor, [Root.GetSisterBrother],' [From.GetSheHe] she told me as we were about to begin the summoning. Kneeling on the floor and holding each other's hands, we began to chant the magic words. As the stranger entered, I squeezed [From.GetHerHis] fingers and departed.
EVTDESC_MNM_10023_HERMETICS:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you do not live up to the standards expected of our members. While we encourage you to continue your search for knowledge and truth wherever you go, we can no longer include you in our community.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
title_hermetics_apprentice_desc: Hermetic scholars may chose an apprentice. In exchange for tutoring, the apprentice will take care of one's laboratory and assist during experiments.
brilliant_insight_desc: This character had a brilliant insight while working on a new invention.
hermetic_handgun_desc: This thin metal barrel is not an impressive sight, but the destruction it can cause inspires awe and fear in equal measure. Due to a highly explosive black powder it can fire metal balls at deadly speeds.
hermetic_compass_desc: As one spins this beautifully engraved little device, a tiny metal needle will always point towards the northern lodestar. It can be used to navigate even when the stars are obscured.
radius_astronomicus_desc: This staff, with its sliding cross-piece and length markings, is used to determine angles for celestial measurements as well as navigating the seas.
hermetic_cypher_machine_desc: There is more to this round little metal object than what meets the eye. The symbols running along its edge, the inner row being movable through a rotating disc, allows its owner to encipher and decipher with ease.
hermetic_plate_armor_desc: This impressive set of armor is clearly ahead of its time. Consisting of whole plates of metal held together by cleverly designed joints, it provides its wearer with significant defense as well as mobility.
hermetic_glasses_desc: These 'spectacles' consist of two glass lenses set in a metal frame. They allow the elderly, whose eyesight is blurring, to read and distinguish visual details.
giant_crossbow_desc: Atop the walls of the county capital, a gigantic crossbow has been mounted. This intimidating weapon provides a ruthlessly efficient means of defense.
blast_furnace_desc: A great blast furnace has been built in this county. It provides vast quantities of iron at an excellent level of quality.
great_mill_desc: A great wind mill stands in this county. Its construction is ahead of the times, allowing great amounts of grain to be milled at an excellent quality.
EVTDESC_MNM_1460: While I am certainly a great scholar with several fine discoveries to my name, I am not too proud to collaborate with like-minded colleagues. I have contemplated hosting some of my colleagues from [Root.Society.GetName] for an intellectual gathering.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1460: It is time. I shall invite some of my favored colleagues.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1460_TT: You begin to prepare for the intellectual gathering in §Y[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]§!.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1460: I do not have the time nor the coin to host them right now.
EVTDESC_MNM_1461: The preparations have been completed and the invitations have been sent and accepted. My honored guests are already packing their coffers. Soon our gatherings begins  I can hardly wait!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1461: Our work shall be a great tribute to Hermes!
EVTDESC_MNM_1463:
To the esteemed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
Yet again I must thank you for your generous invitation. A gathering of the great minds, such a fine idea! However, I have one small suggestion. I would be delighted if you invited [great_minds_guest_4.GetSocietyRank] [great_minds_guest_4.GetFirstName]. [great_minds_guest_4.GetHerHisCap] indisputable brilliance would be a fine addition to our gathering!

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTD_MNM_1463: I did have [great_minds_guest_4.GetFirstName] in mind, but you see...
EVTOPTD_MNM_1463_TT: Due your diplomatic skills, you can come up with an acceptable reason for not inviting §Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_1463: If you insist, [From.GetSisterBrother]. [great_minds_guest_4.GetSheHeCap] may come along.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1463_TT: §Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§! is also invited to the gathering.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1463: To be honest, I'd rather not have [great_minds_guest_4.GetFirstName] there.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1463: Never! You know what, [From.GetFirstName], you are no longer welcome!
EVTOPTC_MNM_1463_TT: Refuse to invite §Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§! and disinvite §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. This is sure to cause some raised eyebrows among the other guests...\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1464: Finally, my guests are here! After a pleasant dinner we have retired to my study. During the coming weeks, my guests and I have agreed to work on a common project. Our joined ingenuity shall bring about a brilliant new invention! The time has come for me to reveal the direction for our enterprise.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1464: Nothing is deadlier than a sharp mind. Let us invent a machine of war!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1464_TT: Suggest a project with a warfare focus.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1464: The aim should be to improve the prosperity of our lands!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1464_TT: Suggest a project with a prosperity focus.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_1464: The noblest purpose is to further our understanding of the universe.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1464_TT: Suggest a project with a scholarly focus.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1466: As I look around the table, I notice the displeased expression of [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. Our eyes lock for a few seconds and then, defiantly, [From.GetSheHe] stands up. 'Really, [Root.GetHermeticInvention]? I am sorry to say, but your suggestion seems... stale. Unoriginal. I suggest we should give our project a [From.GetHermeticInvention] focus.'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1466: You have overlooked an essential point, [From.GetSocietyRank]...
EVTOPTB_MNM_1466: If you think that would be best, [From.GetSisterBrother]
EVTOPTB_MNM_1466_TT: Let §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! have [From.GetHerHis] way. Everyone starts working on the project, which will have a [From.GetHermeticInvention] focus.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_1466: I am the host and the decision is mine!
EVTOPTC_MNM_1466_TT: You force your own idea. Everyone starts working on the project, which will have a [Root.GetHermeticInvention] focus.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1467: As I look around the table, everyone nods in agreement. 'A fine suggestion, dear [Root.GetSisterBrother],' [great_minds_guest_1.GetSocietyRank] [great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName] exclaims, a wide smile on [great_minds_guest_1.GetHerHis] [great_minds_guest_1.GetFaceDescription] face. 'Tomorrow, we shall begin to work on the project the first thing after sunrise.'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1467_TT: Everyone starts working on the project, which will have a [Root.GetHermeticInvention] focus.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1468: As I suspected, [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s arguments are thin and flimsy. As we debate, it becomes clear to one and all that [FromFrom.GetHerHis] suggestion was born out of spite and an unfounded sense of self-importance. In the end, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is forced to concede.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1468: Now that this minor interruption has been dealt with...
EVTDESC_MNM_1469: While my idea is clearly better, my arguments seem to fail me. The others do not seem convinced by them, at least. [FromFrom.GetFirstName], on the other hand, proves [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself] as a true master of manipulation! Within a quarter of an hour, I must admit myself defeated.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1469: We will do it your way, then...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1469_TT: Everyone starts working on the project, which will have a [FromFrom.GetHermeticInvention] focus.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1470: As I enter the laboratory one morning, I am met by agitated voices. [great_minds_guest_1.GetSocietyRank] [great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName] and [great_minds_guest_2.GetSocietyRank] [great_minds_guest_2.GetFirstName] are gesturing wildly over a set of sketches. They are disagreeing on the direction of the project. [great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName] argues for a riskier, but potentially more rewarding route, while [great_minds_guest_2.GetFirstName] wants to play it safe.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1470: I agree with [great_minds_guest_2.GetFirstName]. Better to be safe than sorry.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1470_TT: You go with the safe option.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1470: [great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName] is right. We must explore our limits!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1470_TT: You go with the riskier, but more innovative option.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1471: I am trying to focus on my working, but it is becoming increasingly difficult! [arguer_1.GetSocietyRank] [arguer_1.GetFirstName] and [arguer_2.GetSocietyRank] [arguer_2.GetFirstName] will never agree on anything. If one says one thing, the other must immediately disagree. Sometimes I cannot help but wonder if they are both possessed!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1471: Listen to me, friends. Surely, this thing between you is simply a misunderstanding...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1471_TT: You try to help §Y[arguer_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[arguer_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! to make up.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_1471_FAIL_TT: your efforts making the problem worse.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1471: Enough! [arguer_1.GetFirstName], pack your coffers and leave!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1471_TT: Decide that §Y[arguer_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! must leave. While the disruptive arguments will be a thing of the past, everyone will remember this failure.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_1471: This cannot continue! Your presence is no longer desired, [arguer_2.GetFirstName]!
EVTOPTC_MNM_1471_TT: Decide that §Y[arguer_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! must leave. While the disruptive arguments will be a thing of the past, everyone will remember this failure.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1472: While my first calm attempts did not make much of a difference, my angry outburst suddenly did. The violent reaction finally brought [arguer_1.GetSocietyRank] [arguer_1.GetFirstName] and [arguer_2.GetSocietyRank] [arguer_2.GetFirstName] to their senses. Now, a few hours later, they approach me to apologize for their petty and lowbrow bickering.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1472_TT: The arguments are over and everyone can continue their work without interruptions.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1473: Calmly, I try to explain the unreasonable nature of their bickering, and how their constant negativity is disruptive to our project. Regrettably, my words seem to have no impact. Actually, I might just have made it worse. 'Do you hear that, [arguer_1.GetFirstName]? You are being disruptive,' [arguer_2.GetFirstName] sneers. And there they go again...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1473_TT: The arguments between §Y[arguer_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[arguer_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! are now worse than ever.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1475: [From.GetFirstName] taps the detail on the sketches in front of us and I nod enthusiastically. 'I agree, [From.GetFirstName]! Surely moving the axis over here would make the mechanism much less prone to error.' During the last few days, [From.GetFirstName] and I have worked so well together. I am so glad [From.GetSheHe] came!
EVTDESC_MNM_1476: The sun set hours ago and I can barely distinguish the details of the sketches in front of me. Everyone else has gone to bed, but I am wide awake. The thoughts are spinning in my head, faster and faster. There is something there, just outside of the boundaries of consciousness. I almost have it!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1476_TT: You have an epiphany which will greatly contribute to the project.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1478_A: The invention, the culmination of our great collaboration, is finally finished! Our accomplishment is twofold  not only have we perfected the recipe for an explosive powder, we have also designed and produced a device which can launch small metal balls at lethal speeds. This 'handgun' is sure to revolutionize warfare!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1478: The enemy will fear to meet me on the battlefield!
EVTDESC_MNM_1478_B: The invention, the culmination of our great collaboration, is finally finished! We have invented a device which always points towards the lodestar of the north, making it possible to navigate even when the celestial bodies are obscured by clouds. It will surely give an advantage to our traders.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1478: The sun and stars hold many truths, but so does our compass!
EVTDESC_MNM_1478_C: The invention, the culmination of our great collaboration, is finally finished! We have designed and constructed an ingenious device to measure angles in the sky. We call it the 'radius astronomicus'. My charts of the stars will become infinitely better and easier to maintain thanks to our invention.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1478: The secrets of the heavens shall be unveiled!
EVTDESC_MNM_1478_D: The hour has finally arrived. Today we test our invention! Together we have devised a huge crossbow which launches large stones. While the weapon is certainly deadly, it is also incredibly intimidating. I will have one mounted on the walls of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
EVTOPTD_MNM_1478: Only the bravest and the most foolish soldiers would dare crossing its trajectory.
EVTDESC_MNM_1478_E: Together my colleagues and I have constructed a huge furnace of a truly ingenious design! It can produce metals in streams so steady and vast that no other method can even hope to rival it. This efficient new invention will make sure we have trading goods and building materials of the highest quality available.
EVTOPTE_MNM_1478: We are masters of metal, my friends!
EVTDESC_MNM_1478_F: The invention is finished! Together we have created our own secret code as well as an instrument to aid in enciphering and deciphering. The idea behind the device might seem simple, but the best one always do. Our cipher disc is quite ingenious, really. Now our secrets will be safe  at least if all of us can be trusted...
EVTOPTF_MNM_1478: Now we may safely share our ideas and discoveries with each other.
EVTDESC_MNM_1478_G: Our invention has been completed. While it is not a weapon, it will offer protection from them. It is a set of armor consisting of several big plates of metal instead of the common mail. The design we have arrived at also allows for impressive mobility.
EVTOPTG_MNM_1478: Fear will never seep into my heart in battle again!
EVTDESC_MNM_1478_H: Many mills dot the landscape around [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] and are vital for the production of food. It is always a good idea to improve on essential constructions, so during the last we weeks we have made several ingenious improvements to old designs. Our new mill is safer as well as more efficient than ever before!
EVTOPTH_MNM_1478: Our mill is a true contribution to society.
EVTDESC_MNM_1478_I: For weeks we struggled to create a lens with new and revolutionary properties, and while we failed to achieve this goal, we came to another realization. What if we took a lens we already had, but changed how we used it, instead? Based on my reading stone, we came up with a new device, the 'spectacles'!
EVTOPTI_MNM_1478: Now I can bring good eyesight with me wherever I go!
EVTDESC_MNM_1479_A: We have had several ideas which were clever but impractical, and a heap more which were just ludicrous. The lack of progress has made everyone tired and irritable. Tonight, at dinner, I finally ended it. We all knew it was the right thing to do. Rest was something none of us had known in weeks, and our other obligations had gone unattended for too long.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1479: Maybe we will have better luck next time.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1479_TT: You and your guest fail to invent something useful.
EVTDESC_MNM_1479_B: We were making such good progress, but now, all is lost! We can never be sure who set of the explosion. Does it really matter? Even if we knew, the disaster could never be undone.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1479_TT: The gathering is over and all progress towards an invention has been lost.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1481: My colleagues have approached me  apparently they have been talking behind my back. They are dissatisfied by the gathering and how it has been managed, and has decided that they will be leaving. 'This venture has no potential, [Root.GetFirstName],' one of them says, in a tone probably meant to be kind. To me, it sounds condescending.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1481: You're not my prisoners. Leave, if that is your wish.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1481_TT: The gathering is over. It ended unsuccessfully.\n
rival_skull_desc: As one stares into the empty sockets of this decidedly human skull, it is not uncommon to experience both fascination and revulsion. It is a reminder of our impending death, and for some, a satisfying deed...
EVTOPTA_RIP_29013_TT: Adds §YSkull of [rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the treasury of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
EVTDESC_MNM_10042: While carrying out my duties for [Root.Society.GetName], I have met [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] on several occasions. These encounters have never ended well. One would be hard-pressed to find a more unsympathetic character! I suspect [From.GetSheHe] is spreading lies behind my back to damage my reputation...
EVTOPTA_MNM_10042: I will confront [From.GetFirstName] and reveal [From.GetHerHis] dishonest ways to the world!
EVTOPTB_MNM_10042: I must be patient, it will surely pay off in the long run.
EVTDESC_MNM_10045: I have encountered [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] many times while carrying out my duties for [Root.Society.GetName], and it is always a pleasant occasion. We can talk for hours, if the time allows, because [From.GetSheHe] never bores me. While our discussions are often lengthy, we always seem to agree on the matters which are most important.
EVTOPTB_MNM_10045: I am probably reading too much into this.
SET_ARTIFACT_CREATION_DATE: Sets the date of creation to $DATE|Y$
WOL_6170_OPINION_EFFECT: All priests and zealous characters in your realm will have their opinion of you changed by §R-25§! for §Y5§! years §Y(Heretic)§!
ingredient_herb2_desc: Ginger Root is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_herb3_desc: Mandrake is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_herb4_desc: Lemon Grass is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_herb5_desc: Nettles is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_herb6_desc: Wormwood is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_herb7_desc: Valerian is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_herb8_desc: Violet is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_herb9_desc: Yarrow is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_animal1_desc: An animal gall bladder is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_animal2_desc: An animal kidney is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_animal3_desc: Animal eyeballs are a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_animal4_desc: Cloven hooves are a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_animal5_desc: Antlers is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_animal6_desc: Snouts are a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_animal7_desc: Animal hearts are a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_animal8_desc: Animal livers are a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_animal9_desc: Animal intestines is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_metal_exotic1_desc: Silver is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_metal_exotic2_desc: Mercury is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_metal_exotic3_desc: Aqua Regia is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_metal_exotic4_desc: Aqua Fortis is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_metal_exotic5_desc: Brimstone is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_metal_exotic6_desc: Gold is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_metal_exotic7_desc: Copper is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_metal_exotic8_desc: Iron is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
ingredient_metal_exotic9_desc: Tin is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
quest_hermetic_gather_ingredients_desc: To perform alchemical experiments a member of the Hermetic society has a demand for rare ingredients with specific attributes.
quest_hermetic_gather_ingredients_toolti: To complete this quest you have to successfully harvest ingredients that can be used in your alchemical experiments.
mediator_desc: This character is proficient at calming down threatening social situations.
hermetics_acquire_ingredients_decision_d: Your apprentice will accompany you on a trip to gather rare ingredients for your alchemical inventory.
EVTTOOLTIPA_MNM_1800: You and [gathering_companion.GetFirstName] prepare to head out on a trip.
EVTTOOLTIPB_MNM_1800: You will start to gather a small hunting party to join you in the forest.
EVTTOOLTIPC_MNM_1800: You head down to the busy market streets of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName].
astronomical_insights_1_desc: This character is spending a lot of their time looking at the skies.
astronomical_insights_2_desc: This character is spending a lot of their nights looking at the skies, odd instruments occasionally falling from their pockets.
astronomical_insights_3_desc: This character is spending the majority of their time secluded in their study, observing the skies  they are often heard reciting strange calculations to themselves.
astronomical_insights_4_desc: This character has become an expert on celestial phenomena, their knowledge being held in high regard by their peers.
increase_astronomical_insight_tt: Your knowledge of stellar phenomena increases.\n
quest_hermetics_observe_sky_desc: One cannot fully understand our place in the cosmos if one does not see to the stars. It is said that the stars contain the truth of all things past and all things to come  by solving their riddles, one could predict anything.
quest_hermetics_observe_sky_tooltip: To complete this mission you have to carefully study the sky and solve the puzzles that connect the physical world with the astral one.
neglected_accounting_desc: This character rather spends time in the clouds than bothering with fiscal matters.
failed_to_predict_star_fall_desc: This character is suffering from low self-esteem after publicly failing to predict a star-fall.
EVTDESC_MNM_1829:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
Dear colleague, I have found the most fascinating phenomena from observing the sky. I am of the firmest belief that the foundation of the cosmos is hiding somewhere out there. In order to reach higher knowledge, you should take my advice and study the skies thoroughly.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank]
EVTDESCA_MNM_1837: After many a night observing the skies I have become certain that there is a lot going on up there, behind the clouds. However, I am considering putting this endeavor to rest, for the sake of my other duties.
EVTDESCB_MNM_1837: After many a night observing the skies I have become certain that there is a pattern to the movement of celestial bodies that I have yet to uncover. However, I am considering putting this endeavor to rest, for the sake of my other duties.
EVTDESCC_MNM_1837: After many a night observing the skies I have started charting the patterns of stars, as well as the movement of certain planets. There is so much to learn! However, my council won't stop complaining about my absence from the court. Perhaps it is time I conclude my research.
EVTDESCD_MNM_1837: After many a night observing the skies I have started charting the patterns of stars, as well as the movement of certain planets. There is so much to learn! However, my council won't stop complaining about my absence from the court. Perhaps it is time I conclude my research.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1837: No, I have to keep going.
EVTDESC_MNM_1840: This has certainly been a very productive evening. I have been able to dedicate all of my thinking to calculate the patterns of the different objects in the sky uninterrupted.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1840: I should always strive to be this productive.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1840: Studying the vast sky gives me new perspectives.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1840: I've found a new meaning in my life.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1841: My [target_spouse.GetHusbandWife] expressed a curious notion, over supper this evening. "I miss your conversation, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [target_spouse.GetFirstName] said, taking another sip of [target_spouse.GetHerHis] drink. "It's all astronomical phenomenon with you these days...! Surely, you could take some nights off from your research?"
EVTDESCB_MNM_1841: Dining with my [target_spouse.GetHusbandWife], the topic of my research came up again. I told [target_spouse.GetHerHim] that I of course regret any ill feelings [target_spouse.GetSheHe] might be experiencing from it, but that I am doing important work. "Honestly, I grow weary of defending myself!", I snapped in the end.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1841_1: One does not simply take a break from this task.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1841_1: Of course, I will spend more time with you, [target_spouse.GetFirstName].
EVTOPTA_MNM_1841_2: Why must we argue about this...?!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1841_2: You are right, [target_spouse.GetFirstName], I will change my priorities.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1842: I am in the middle of adjusting my new sextant, having just spotted what looked like a shooting star, when there is a faint knock on my door. Opening it, I find my [target_child.GetSonDaughter] [target_child.GetFirstName] fidgeting nervously. Hesitantly, [target_child.GetSheHe] speaks: "[Root.GetFatherMother]? I... I can't sleep."
EVTOPTB_MNM_1842: You are too old to be afraid of the dark, [target_child.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_MNM_1843: Making sure that land owners and traders are paying their taxes in a timely fashion is a time-consuming task. Lately, my mind has been more occupied with the task of making sure that the stars are in their correct place, rather than that the taxes are in my coffers.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1843: What is wealth compared to knowledge?
EVTDESC_MNM_1844: [target_friend.GetTitledFirstName] has been very cold to me lately. When I approach [target_friend.GetHerHim] about it today, [target_friend.GetSheHe] asks me point blank where I was. "Was when?", I respond. "We had plans to visit my uncle? The one who likes fishing? I knew you weren't all that excited, but I didn't expect you to simply not show up", [target_friend.GetSheHe] mutters.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1844: I.. I have had many important things on my mind, lately.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1844: I understand why you are upset, and I am so sorry, [target_friend.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_MNM_1845: While in a meeting with my council, I feel a headache rising inside my skull, making it hard to pick up the different conversations in the room. Lack of sleep is clearly taking its toll on me. Shouting erupts in the room  suddenly [councillor1.GetTitledFirstName] shouts my name, bringing my consciousness back to the room. In a threatening tone, [councillor1.GetSheHe] asks if I agree.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1845: I'm sorry, would you care to explain the matter to me again?
EVTDESC_MNM_1846: My careful observations of [This.GetRandomPlanetName] has finally allowed me to conclude that the old projections of the planets path across the sky have been flawed. With some precise adjustments I can present a corrected projection.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1846: This will lead me closer to the truth behind the mysteries of the world.
EVTDESC_MNM_1847: It is an early morning when I, with shaking hand, put my quill down... Is it possible? Have I predicted the traveling of a star-fall? Wiping my brow, I go over my calculations once more  I get the same results, again. It does seem to add up! I lean back in my chair  judging from all the signs, I am fairly certain I know when this marvel will take place.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1847: Come the night, I will gather a crowd to witness it with me!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1847: I should keep this to myself. Just in case I am wrong.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1853: The air is crisp and the sky clear, as people huddle around each other to observe the nightly phenomena I have predicted. Not all are convinced of my promise. As the hour begins to slip away, I hear their skeptical mumbling. Then, suddenly, several "Oooh!" and "Aaah!" take place around me, as people excitedly start pointing upwards. Across the dark heavens, a tiny speck of light is moving, a white trail marking its journey.
EVTDESCB_MNM_1853: The air is crisp, as people gather together at top of the hill, to observe the nightly phenomena I have predicted. Not all are convinced of my promise, and I am beginning to worry. Even if I am right, chances are the star-fall won't be visible tonight, as the weather is particularly cloudy. As the moments pass, one person leaves, and I hear people mumbling. The night grows colder. Eventually, I am left alone on the hill.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1853: This is a night we shall all remember.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1854: The sky is pitch black and clear as I make my way up the hill. Carrying my instruments, I have a good feeling about my calculations  tonight is the night. I begin to unpack, and I am in the middle of adjusting my lenses, when I realize that the star-fall is visible even without my tools. I gasp, my chest filling with jubilant glee. Across the dark heavens, a tiny speck of light is moving, a white trail marking its journey.
EVTDESCB_MNM_1854: I have been camped out on the hill for hours, hoping against hope. Maybe I missed it? Maybe my instruments are too weak? I wait even longer, but eventually it dawns on me  I was wrong. I am not sure how, but there is no star-fall.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1854: This is what it's all about.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1854: How could I have been so wrong?
EVTDESC_MNM_1848: I find myself almost buried under an enormous heap of documents occupying my work desk which I have carefully studied. Yet there is still an absence of any observation about the specific light in the sky between two well-known star formations.
EVTDESC_MNM_1851: On a dark sheet there lies bright dots scattered around, dancing in a random fashion. No matter how long time I spend staring into the sky, no pattern reveals itself for me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1851: There must be something wrong with my instruments.
EVTDESC_MNM_1852: [From.GetBestName] has not only discovered a new bright star in the sky, [From.GetSheHe] has decided to give me the honor of having the sparkling star named after myself!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1852: Do I really deserve this honor?
EVTDESC_MNM_1830: The instruments and tomes that I had to gather for my studies of the secrets behind the stars have finally arrived. Lenses of different shapes and sizes, together with dusty old tomes written by learned people  these will prove invaluable for uncovering the truth.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1830: Now I can carefully observe the sky.
EVTDESC_MNM_1850: It is rare to have a completely clear night-sky to observe, yet tonight the weather conditions are perfect. I smile, as I begin to carefully note down the pattern of the celestial bodies. I feel a surge of energy  never have I had such a spectacular view of my own constellation, [Root.GetWesternZodiacSign]  I can sense my connection to the elements stronger than ever before.
EVTDESC_MNM_5100: Being at the debate is a draining process. I have not had a good night's sleep since I got here. Either I cannot fall asleep due to a searing pain in the back or I get woken up by loud arguments outside about yesterday's debate topics. Days like these I just long for a warm and cozy bed.
EVTOPTB_MNM_5100: I can't take this anymore. I want to go home!
EVTOPTC_MNM_5100: I should use this time for something productive.
nocturnal_studies_desc: While everyone else is still in a deep slumber, this character is already preparing for the coming day.
bad_nights_sleep_desc: This character is suffering from back pain and headaches due to not having had a proper night's sleep in weeks.
mischievous_deeds_desc: This character has recently sabotaged the research of a fellow society member.
EVTDESC_MNM_5101: An opportunity has presented itself for me to level the playing field of the debate. [sabotage_target.GetSocietyRank] [sabotage_target.GetFirstName] a great debater under normal circumstances, [sabotage_target.GetSheHe] is very dependent on [sabotage_target.GetHerHis] meticulous notes.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5101: Perhaps [sabotage_target.GetSheHe] could find some of mine...
EVTOPTB_MNM_5101: It would be a shame if anything happened to those notes.
EVTOPTC_MNM_5101: I will not resort to cheap tricks.
EVTTOOLTIPA_MNM_5101: Plant some forged notes about a ground-breaking discovery in a convenient place.\n
EVTTOOLTIPB_MNM_5101: Attempt to make the notes unusable.\n
