EVTDESCA_MNM_5102: After a tough day full of debates I find myself alone in the corridor. Curiously, I spot some notes forgotten on the floor. The notes speak of [Root.GetHermeticDebateSubject]! This is great, I could use these notes to prepare for my next debate.
EVTDESCB_MNM_5102: After a tough day full of debates I find myself alone in the corridor. Curiously, I spot some notes forgotten on the floor. The notes speak of [Root.GetSillyDebateSubject]! This is great, I could use these notes to prepare for my next debate.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5102: Even someone else's knowledge is the path to success.
EVTOPTB_MNM_5102: I have more confidence in my own work.
EVTOPTC_MNM_5102: This is clearly some made-up nonsense!
EVTTOOLTIP_MNM_5102: You will recite your new-found knowledge in an upcoming debate, as if it were your own.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_5103: While I am sitting and preparing for the debate, studying my notes carefully, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] stumbles and drops everything in [From.GetHerHis] hands. Parchments and quills are strewn everywhere and my notes are now soaked in ink!
EVTTOOLTIP_MNM_5103: Your preparation notes for today are ruined, decreasing your chances of winning the debate.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_5104: I was successful in "accidentally" dropping ink on the notes of [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], ruining them beyond readability. [From.GetFirstName] was however less than happy with my clumsy behavior...
EVTOPTA_MNM_5104: You can't make an omelete without breaking a few eggs.
EVTDESCA_MNM_5015: I performed splendidly in today's debate, much thanks to the brilliant research I found in the hallway. My competitors were left without any good arguments to counter my impeccable logic.
EVTDESCB_MNM_5015: Reciting the notes I found the other day proved to be an unfortunate mistake... The crowd was loud and vigorous, not because they were struck by my burgeoning intellect, but because they were laughing. Someone must have crafted those notes as a joke!
EVTDESCC_MNM_5015: During today's debate I recited the notes I found the other day far too literally... After a short while someone in the audience started shouting and called me out on being a fraud for stealing their work.
EVTOPTA_MNM_5105: With a little bit of fortune anything is possible.
EVTTOOLTIPA_MNM_5105: Your performance greatly impressed everyone present, increasing your chances of winning the debate.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_5105: I was a fool to believe in those notes!
EVTTOOLTIPB_MNM_5105: This embarrassing situation will not soon be forgotten, and decreases your chances of winning the debate.\n
EVTOPTD_MNM_5105: Clearly this must be a mistake, let's calm down for a moment!
EVTDESCA_MNM_5106: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] made a fool of [From.GetHerselfHimself] today at the debate, by citing parts of the forged notes I planted some days ago for [From.GetHerHim] to find. At certain moments [From.GetSheHe] had the whole room veritably bursting to tears laughing!
EVTDESCB_MNM_5106: Despite my best effort [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetBestName] has ignored the notes that I deliberately left in plain sight of [From.GetHerHim].
EVTDESC_MNM_3840: While [From.GetTitledFirstName] has always been a little strange, I never could have known that [From.GetSheHe] was secretly a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3840: That was certainly a daring revelation of [From.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTA_MNM_3949_TT: Publicly you will act in the faith of your liege while you keep your old faith in private.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3949_TT: You fully embrace the faith of your liege.\n
secret_religions_recruit_allow_tt: Shares the same true faith as §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!\n
EVTDESCA_MNM_6995: I am not sure what has happened, but it has been a while since I've had any contact with [satanists_recruiter.GetBestName]. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I retire tonight, I feel convinced that our time together has somehow ended prematurely.
EVTTOOLTIP_MNM_6995: You will have to await a new recruiter from the clandestine society.
EVTDESCA_MNM_6993: I am not sure what has happened, but it has been a while since I've had any contact with [satanists_inductor.GetBestName]. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I retire tonight, I feel convinced that our time together has somehow ended prematurely.
EVTTOOLTIP_MNM_6993: You will have to await a new recruiter from the clandestine society.
EVTDESC_ZP_1: As a pious man, after having read the texts of the Vendidad, you are more aware of the Daevas' presence all around you and the danger they put your family and realm in. So, you have decided that your house shall adopt one of the Good Spirit's Dogs.
EVTOPTA_ZP_1: Vohunazga, the dog without a master.
EVTOPTB_ZP_1: Vanghapara, the dog with a prickly back.
EVTOPTC_ZP_1: Sag-e Aabi, the dog of the water.
EVTDESC_ZP_2: A Vohunazga of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] is known to the people as a kind creature of Ahura Mazda, protecting your capital from the Daevas which roam in the darkness.
EVTOPTA_ZP_2: He shall roam free but protected by the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
EVTOPTB_ZP_2: Take him in! He is one of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
EVTDESC_ZP_3: The dog called Vanghapara is known as a vigilant creature of the Spenta Mainyu. As darkness beckons this dog wakes to keep us safe from its evil creatures. This is why it is such a popular pet among [Root.Religion.GetName] families.
EVTOPTA_ZP_3: The Vanghapara shall protect my home well.
EVTDESC_ZP_4: The dog of the water is the most revered of all the dogs. They are what keeps our fields watered and healthy, our bellies full and worries gone.
EVTOPTA_ZP_4: It is our honor to house the Sag-e Aabi
masterless_dog_desc: This character is the guardian of a masterless dog who defends his home from evil spirits.
house_dog_desc: This character has taken in a dog into his house which defends him from evil spirits.
hedgehog_desc: This character has taken in a hedgehog into his house which happily in return hunts down vermin.
otter_desc: This character is the guardian of an otter which ensures the wellbeing of the realm.
choose_hermetic_art_desc: Choose to focus on one of the three arts within §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!. Doing so will allow you to choose a lifestyle trait.
choose_hermetic_art_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order choose one of the three different arts within the Hermetics, allowing you to decide on your lifestyle.
choose_hermetic_art_allow_tooltip: Is allowed to choose a Hermetic Art at this time\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1900: I have been with the Hermetics for some time and yet, I have not been able to contemplate enough on all of the three arts. If I were to focus on one of the arts I might further increase my understanding of it. But which art should I choose?
EVTOPTA_MNM_1900: Astrology and the study of the stars.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1900: I changed my mind. Perhaps another time.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1900_TOOLTIP: This art will lead to the §YScholar§! trait.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1900_TOOLTIP: This art will lead to the §YMystic§! trait
EVTOPTC_MNM_1900_TOOLTIP: This art will lead to the §YTheologian§! trait
EVTDESCA_MNM_1901: As a scholar, I have dedicated much time to the art of studying the stars and celestial bodies. I learned a great deal in doing so. But I should spend more time with the other arts as well. Which one should I focus on more closely?
EVTDESCB_MNM_1901: To study alchemy and how to reach spiritual transformation is indeed a learning experience. Albeit more difficult than one might imagine. But time has come to also master the other arts. Which one should be my focus?
EVTDESCC_MNM_1901: I have attained great knowledge in the art of Theurgy. Learning about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and divine spirits. Yet, to master the truth and understand it, I will need to learn more about the other arts. Which one should I study next?
EVTOPTA_MNM_1901: I shall learn more about astrology.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1901: The art of Theurgy is important.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1901: I will keep my current art for now.
EVTDESC_MNM_1902: There are many ways in how one may reveal the secrets behind the movement of stars and celestial bodies. I could set up the needed equipment to study them myself. Alternatively, I could look at the existing research of known authors and researchers.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1902: I have to see it for myself.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1902: Looking at the work of others is a good start.
EVTDESC_MNM_1903: Standing outside and gazing upon the night sky is invigorating! I have yet to fully grasp the secrets hidden from me. Knowing that I can find the meaning behind the stars, I refuse to give up.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1903: Time will tell if I am worthy.
EVTDESC_MNM_1904: To master the art of alchemy is not an easy task. It may take years before I can make any notable progress. I must decide how best to pursue this knowledge.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1904: Learning by doing will lead the way.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1904: Careful studies and observation is key.
EVTDESC_MNM_1905: Alchemy is the key component of uncovering the truth, that much I know. But I still have much to learn and discover. Dedication and resolve will be my allies.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1905: So much to learn. So little time.
EVTDESC_MNM_1906: One way to better understand [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is the use of white magic, in which you pray to divine spirits in order to use their guidance. This is known as Theurgy. Another path is that of Goetia. To use black magic by seeking out foul demons and heeding their advice.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1906: Only the divine can teach me.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1906: There is nothing wrong with demons, is there?
EVTDESC_MNM_1907: Divine enlightenment is not something you easily achieve. Even if I have made some progress already, it has been slow and I have merely scratched the surface. How will I ever learn the truth at this pace?
EVTOPTA_MNM_1907: I suppose only [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] can deem me worthy.
theoretical_alchemist_desc: An alchemist who prefers the theoretical approach of careful studies.
experimenting_alchemist_desc: An alchemist who prefers the practical approach of performing experiments.
divine_spirit_alliance_desc: This character prays to divine spirits to better understand [Religion.GetHighGodName].
demon_alliance_desc: This character prays to demons to better understand [Religion.GetHighGodName].
has_not_recently_performed_stargazing: Has NOT invited to stargazing in the past three years\n
AVAILABLE_DUE_TO_OBSERVATORY: This option is available due to you owning an observatory\n
AVAILABLE_DUE_TO_OBSERVATORY_EQUIPMENT: This option is available due to you owning observatory equipment\n
PREPARE_STARGAZING: Make the needed preparations for the coming night.
invite_hermetic_to_stargazing_desc: Invite §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! to a night of stargazing and studies in an attempt to better understand how it works. This is also a good opportunity to get to know each other.
EVTDESC_MNM_1920:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I write to you with a proposition. We are both esteemed members of [Root.Society.GetName] and I think we could learn much from one another. I hereby invite you to a night of discoveries and to study the sky.

Your fellow [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank], [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_1920: I would be delighted to come!
EVTDESC_MNM_1921:
To the [GetFromFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Your invitation arrived as a very pleasant surprise. I would be honored to study with you and will prepare my journey shortly.

Your fellow [From.GetSocietyRank], [From.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1922:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I received your invitation, but I fear that I will have to decline. It is currently impossible for me to make any travel arrangement on such a short notice. I hope you understand.

Your fellow [From.GetSocietyRank], [From.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1926: It seems that more important matters have been brought to me. I will have to cancel the invitation I sent to [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]. The night of studies and stargazing will have to wait.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1926_TOOLTIP: Cancel the planned night of stargazing and notify [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1927:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I fear that urgent matters require my attention for now. We will have to perform our planned studies of the night sky at another time. I pray that you will not be too disappointed.

[From.GetSocietyRank], [From.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1928: My guest [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] has finally arrived. I have been looking forward to the two of us getting together and review the work of each other. There is still some time before nightfall, however. I have a few suggestion of how we could spend the time.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1928: I will show you my instruments.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1928: I have the perfect location in mind.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1928: How about a small feast in your honor?
EVTOPTE_MNM_1928: Time not spent studying is time lost.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1928_TOOLTIP: Show your guest to your observatory.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1928_TOOLTIP: Show your guest the tools you possess to use for stargazing.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1928_TOOLTIP: Show your guest to the nearby location to use for the coming night.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1928_TOOLTIP: Spend the time with a small feast.
EVTOPTE_MNM_1928_TOOLTIP: Spend the time by studying in preparation of the coming night.
EVTDESC_MNM_1930: When arriving in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName] I was greeted with a smile from [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]. I quickly unpacked but I could tell that [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] was eagerly waiting for me. 'I would like to show you my observatory', [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] said as [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] was turning to lead the way. Once inside, carefully crafted tools and lenses could be seen everywhere.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1930: I fail to see the magnificence really.
EVTDESC_MNM_1931: I showed [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] the way to the observatory. When we stepped inside, [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] gazed in wonder at the various tools. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] went on to ask about the different instruments and how to use them. At which times you are more likely to see the stars more clearly. The questions kept coming for quite a while.
EVTDESC_MNM_1932: I lead [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the observatory and waited for [stargazing_guest.GetHerHis] reaction when we stepped inside. At first [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] only looked around. After a while [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] asked a few simple question but I got the feeling that it was not very impressive.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1932: Oh well. We are here to study after all.
EVTDESC_MNM_1933: [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] greeted me when I arrived in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]. After a short conversation [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] lead the way to [stargazing_host.GetHerHis] study. When we stepped inside I immediately noticed all the tools and lenses. It would seem that [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] owns quite a collection of stargazing equipment.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1933: Anyone can acquire such common items, no?
EVTDESC_MNM_1934: I guided [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the study to showcase my stargazing tools. I could see that [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] was delighted as [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] spent quite some time inspecting them. We talked about the tools for quite a while. We even had a long conversation just about lenses. Small lenses and larger lenses, and knowing when to use which ones.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1934: You may use them later tonight.
EVTDESC_MNM_1935: I arrived at the study with [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] closely behind me. 'This is the equipment I have obtained', I explained and gestured towards the neatly ordered collection of tools. [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName] inspected the collection for a moment, but did not look very impressed. Or at least as something [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] has seen before.
EVTDESC_MNM_1936: Upon my arrival in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName], I was received with great splendor. [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] explained that [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] had chosen a perfect location to use during the night. 'This way and I will show it to you.' [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] lead the way to a hill not too far away. The hill had a decent height for its small size and no trees obscuring the view.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1936: This will suit our needs perfectly!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1936: A lonely hill in the middle of nowhere...
EVTDESC_MNM_1937: We walked to the hill of my choice not far away. Once there, [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] took a moment to look at the hill and the sky above. 'This hill should suit our needs perfectly I think.' [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] said while nodding approvingly. We quickly decided on where to set up in order to be able to see as much as possible.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1937: It is all about location, location, location.
EVTDESC_MNM_1938: I walked with [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the nearby hill I had chosen for us. While pointing to a few places that I think would work well for us, I hear [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName] complaining behind me. Clearly disapproved of my choice. 'I suppose it will do. But it seems to be very far away if you ask me.'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1938: Trust me. It offers a better view.
EVTDESC_MNM_1939: When I arrived in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName] I was not only met with a warm smile from [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName], but a grand feast as well! A wide range of courses had been prepared for our pleasure and indulgence. [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] raised a cup in my honor. 'Let us toast for a night of new discoveries!'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1939: A spectacular feast I must say!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1939: Is it not a bit excessive?
EVTDESC_MNM_1940: When [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] entered the dining hall, I think the feast came as a surprise. And a very pleasant one at that. We dined and enjoyed ourselves and had a good time just speaking with each other for the next few hours. 'You have outdone yourself, [stargazing_host.GetFirstName]. This was spectacular!'
EVTDESC_MNM_1941: I showed [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the dining hall and the awaiting feast. The look on [stargazing_guest.GetHerHis] face made it abundantly clear that [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] was not expecting a proper feast. Perhaps [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] was expecting a small dinner? Did I overdo it?
EVTDESC_MNM_1942: [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] was there to welcome me on my arrival in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]. Shortly thereafter we made the way to [stargazing_host.GetFirstName]'s private study, where [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] began to show me his current work and most recent discoveries. 'How better to pass the time before nightfall than to spend it on studies and learning?'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1942: That is why I am here.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1942: Even learning is best in moderation.
EVTDESC_MNM_1943: Knowing that [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] is a learned man I showed him to my study. After discussing my most recently acquired writings I suggested that we sit down and try to learn something from them. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] responded with approval. 'I would never say no to an opportunity of gathering newfound knowledge. That is after all, the reason I am here.'
EVTDESC_MNM_1944: Thinking that [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] would jump at the chance of examining my most recently acquired writings, I showed [stargazing_guest.GetHerHim] my collection. After a moment of glancing through the pages, [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] casually put the writings back in their place. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] then suggested that we rest before the night.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1944: I presume the journey was long?
EVTDESC_MNM_1945: Night is almost upon us and the first stars are finally making themselves visible on the sky outside. I should tell [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] that it is time. Time to see if we can uncover new secrets.
EVTDESC_MNM_1947: [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] and me have been looking at the stars for a few hours already. Suddenly, it occurred to me. Stars are aligned in different patterns, taking on the shapes of different figures. But they are not really moving, are they? They always seem to have the same location in relation to one another.
EVTDESC_MNM_1948: I was reading through our notes when [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] suddenly shouted at me. '[stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]! It just occurred to me!' [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] then went on explaining [stargazing_host.GetHerHis] theory about how the stars never move and how they are related to one another.
EVTDESC_MNM_1950: I was writing down some notes when I heard [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] speak behind me and turned to face [stargazing_guest.GetHerHim]. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] then went on to explain a theory of how the zodiacs are connected with each other how they are aligned in a certain way.
EVTDESC_MNM_1951: When looking at the stars and the patterns they create on the sky, I started thinking on the zodiacs. I quickly explained my newfound theory to [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] who nodded in agreement. The zodiacs are sure to be hiding secrets waiting to be unveiled.
EVTDESC_MNM_1953: After several hours of studying the stars, I saw it. A sphere moving slowly across the sky with a long tail behind it. I called for [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to get [stargazing_guest.GetHerHis] attention. We both marveled at the beauty of it for a while. 'It is clearly something divine about it.' [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName] said after a moment of silence. I could only nod my head in agreement.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1953: It makes us seem so small.
EVTDESC_MNM_1954: After several hours of studying the stars, we noticed a sphere moving slowly across the sky with a long tail behind it. Both me and [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] marveled at the beauty of it. 'It is clearly something divine about it.' [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] nodded slowly in response. 'It is. But it is hardly an omen of the end times like the peasants would make you believe.'
EVTOPTA_MNM_1954: No it is not. But it is beautiful.
EVTDESC_MNM_1955: [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] and I have been taking turns in making observations and recording everything. I cannot say that we have made any significant discoveries so far. We have made some progress, however, and learned a few things we did not know before.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1955: The night is not over yet.
EVTDESC_MNM_1957: We have spent hours observing the stars and trying to look for anything out of the ordinary. Neither [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] nor I has made any noticeable progress so far. With most of the night gone already, it is unlikely that we will accomplish much more.
EVTDESC_MNM_1958: We have spent hours observing the stars and trying to look for anything out of the ordinary. But neither of us has been able to make any significant progress. Which is disappointing, to say the least. But I can see that my host, [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName], is more disappointed than I am. [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] probably had very high hopes for the night.
EVTDESC_MNM_1959: The sky was filled with ominously dark clouds already when we started our observations. As the hours drags on, it is only getting worse. You cannot see anything by now! Not a single star in sight! I suppose we might as well call it a night right here...
EVTDESC_MNM_1962: After spending to night together with [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName], I feel like we have become quite close. We seem to complement each other perfectly and the both of us are having a really good time!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1962: I have gained a new friend!
EVTDESC_MNM_1963: Accepting the invitation to come here and spend the night studying with [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] was the correct decision. I have not had this much fun talking to someone in quite a while. We seem to understand each other perfectly!
EVTDESC_MNM_1965: This night seem to never end. I am wondering why I even invited [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] in the first place. Nothing I have done so far seem to please [stargazing_guest.GetHerHim]. Whenever I try to start a conversation to lighten the mood, [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] only answer with an obnoxious remark.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1965: I cannot wait for you to leave...
EVTDESC_MNM_1966: I should just have thrown away [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] invitation the moment it arrived. This night has been nothing short of horrible. Listening to [stargazing_host.GetHerHim] hurling one insult after the other. One might be thinking if that is the reason why [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] invited me here!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1966: I have never been so offended!
EVTDESC_MNM_1968_A: Dawn is upon us as the first light appears on the horizon. I think we can agree that the night was an immense success. We took plenty of notes and learned a thing or two. Maybe we will have an opportunity to continue our combined research in the future?
EVTDESC_MNM_1968_B: An exhausting night finally ends. We worked throughout the entire night without any sort of noticeable progress at all. While it feels disappointing, I am confident that continued observations will yield superior results.
EVTDESC_MNM_1968_C: Time really do fly when you are having fun. We did not make any sort of noticeable progress in our attempted research. But the night was spent in good company, making it feel much less of a disappointment.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1968_A: Let us do this again sometime.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1968_C: Progress or not. I had a great time!
hermetic_grand_debate_desc: Hold a grand debate for all members of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§! to join. Spending several days discussing and arguing in the name of knowledge and learning.
GRAND_DEBATE_INVITE_TOOLTIP: Send an invitation to all members of [Root.Society.GetName].
GRAND_DEBATE_HOLDING_TOOLTIP: A Grand Debate is NOT currently in progress\n
GRAND_DEBATE_COOLDOWN_TOOLTIP: A Grand Debate has NOT been held in the past 10 years\n
CHRONICLE_GRAND_DEBATE: As a distinguished leader of [From.Society.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited all members to partake in a Grand Debate.
GRAND_DEBATE_PARTICIPANT_OPINION_TOOLTIP: Participating members will gain an increased opinion of §G5§! towards you for five years\n
debater_desc: This character is known to be performing very well in debates and discussions.
EVTDESC_MNM_1980: As I expect many members of [Root.Society.GetName] to appear for the Grand Debate, it is of the utmost importance that everything is to be as flawless as possible. In this spirit the preparations are well underway  my staff has seen to the lodgings and the chef has stocked up the larders. All that is left now is to send out the invitations.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1980: Bring me my most trusted courier!
EVTDESC_MNM_1981: A courier just arrived carrying a letter from [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. Reading the letter, I see that it is an invitation bidding all members of [FromFrom.Society.GetName] to attend the Grand Debate.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1981: A most excellent opportunity to display my knowledge!
EVTDESC_MNM_1983: The guest are arriving in this very moment. It is time for the grand debate to begin and spend the next few days to have each and every one display their knowledge to decide who the best of us is.
EVTDESC_MNM_1989: I have been declared the winner of the grand debate! Showing all that no one is as knowledgeable as me, or has the ability to put forth arguments quite like me.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1989: The sweetest of all sounds is praise.
EVTDESC_MNM_1990: Many distinguished themselves during the debates. None however, performed as well as [From.GetTitledFirstName], who has been declared the winner of the grand debate!
EVTDESC_MNM_1993: After several days of long discussions and much debating, the grand debate is over for now. There might have been a few heated arguments, but I think most attenders would agree that it was a learning experience.
EVTDESC_MNM_1994: I may not have won the grand debate itself, but I have had plenty of success nonetheless. The debates allowed me to learn new ways of putting my education to good use and even how to improve upon it!
EVTDESC_MNM_1994_HOST: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I realize that I have learned new ways of putting my education to good use.
EVTDESC_MNM_1995: The grand debate ends and I was not able to win. I did however, show some skillful debating during a few arguments that got applauded by the others.
EVTDESC_MNM_1995_HOST: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I think that I was able to show some skillful debating during a few arguments that got applauded by the others.
EVTDESC_MNM_1996: The grand debate ends and although I was unable to win, I learned a few things by observing the other participants.
EVTDESC_MNM_1996_HOST: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I did learn a few things by observing the other participants.
EVTDESC_MNM_1997: The grand debate ends and I was unable to win. I cannot say that I learned anything during the discussions either. Study and preparation will be key for the next debate.
EVTDESC_MNM_1997_HOST: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I realize that I have much to learn. I will have to prepare myself better for the next debate.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1997: It was still time well spent.
EVTDESC_MNM_1998: The grand debate ends and I did not achieve anything at all. I got ridiculed for my meager efforts as I was easily outsmarted by my opponents.
EVTDESC_MNM_1998_HOST: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I realize that I did not achieve anything. I got ridiculed for my meager efforts as I was easily outsmarted by my opponents.
society_points_desc: You have $VALUE|Y0$ §Y[Player.Society.GetCurrency]§!.\nThis is the currency which you can spend on the various §YPowers§! unlocked by being a member of §Y[Player.Society.GetNameCap]§!.\nYou gain §Y[Player.Society.GetCurrency]§! by completing missions, as well as on a monthly basis. The monthly gain depends on your stats and traits that are associated with the §Y[Player.Society.GetNameCap]§!.
hermetics_wrote_magnum_opus_duplicate: Does NOT already own Magnum Opuses on all topics.\n
alchemy_good_ste_bonus_desc: This character has received advice on alchemy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very well!
alchemy_ste_bonus_desc: This character has received advice on alchemy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather well.
alchemy_ste_penalty_desc: This character has received advice on alchemy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather poorly.
alchemy_bad_ste_penalty_desc: This character has received advice on alchemy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very poorly!
astrology_good_dip_bonus_desc: This character has received advice on astrology from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very well!
astrology_dip_bonus_desc: This character has received advice on astrology from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather well.
astrology_dip_penalty_desc: This character has received advice on astrology from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather poorly.
astrology_bad_dip_penalty_desc: This character has received advice on astrology from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very poorly!
open_mind_good_lea_bonus_desc: This character has received advice on Theurgy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very well!
open_mind_lea_bonus_desc: This character has received advice on Theurgy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather well.
open_mind_lea_penalty_desc: This character has received advice on Theurgy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather poorly.
open_mind_bad_lea_penalty_desc: This character has received advice on Theurgy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very poorly!
hidden_truth_good_int_bonus_desc: This character has received advice on decrypting hidden truths from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very well!
hidden_truth_int_bonus_desc: This character has received advice on decrypting hidden truths from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather well.
hidden_truth_int_penalty_desc: This character has received advice on decrypting hidden truths from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather poorly.
hidden_truth_bad_int_penalty_desc: This character has received advice on decrypting hidden truths from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very poorly!
divine_summoning_succeeded_desc: This character has had an epiphany as a result of a divine ritual. Integral parts of the world, and the Truths hidden within it, suddenly seem clearer.
divine_summoning_failed_desc: This character was unable to understand the cryptic advice given by a summoned divine being, and is therefore deemed to be an unworthy Hermetic.
EVTDESC_MNM_1622: My [From.GetSisterBrother] in the Hermetic Order, [From.GetFirstName], has stepped forth with an idea for a ritual that might invoke the presence of a Divine Being. The prospect of petitioning the Divine itself for knowledge is tantalizing, and the idea was therefore received with excitement in the Order. The ritual will take place in a few weeks' time.
EVTDESC_MNM_1622_COURT: My dear [GetFromRelation] and [From.GetSisterBrother] in the Hermetic Order, [From.GetFirstName], has stepped forth with an idea for a ritual that might invoke the presence of a Divine Being. The prospect of petitioning the Divine itself for knowledge is tantalizing, and the idea was therefore received with excitement by the Order. The ritual will take place in a few weeks' time.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1622: The secrets of the world shall be laid bare to us!
EVT_TT_1622: Though, what if I am not worthy enough to understand it?
EVTOPTB_MNM_1622: What if we anger the being? We should not meddle in the divine...
EVTDESC_MNM_1624: The time for the ritual has come, and your Order has congregated in a spacious room. Symbols scatter the floor as you chant your hymns. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has provided you all with a new, special type of incense that [From.GetSheHe] claims is necessary to make the eventual connection with the Divine Being. Before long it has permeated the air, and as you inhale more and more of it, hearing the drone of your fellows' chants, you feel your soul disconnect from your body and begin to ascend...\n\n...until it seems to connect with something. An... entity touches your soul, though you cannot perceive it with any senses other than your mind's eye. It must be the Divine Being! You have succeeded! You struggle to control your emotions, and to coalesce all your thoughts into one burning question that you pose to this being...
EVTOPTA_MNM_1624: Oh Divine, pray tell me of the operation of the Sun!
EVTOPTB_MNM_1624: Oh Divine, pray tell me of the operation of the stars!
EVTOPTC_MNM_1624: Oh Divine, pray tell me of the operation of the gods!
EVTOPTD_MNM_1624: Oh Divine, pray tell me of the secrets hidden throughout the world!
EVTDESC_MNM_1626_SUCCESS: In my trance, the Divine Being tells me of great Truths that have been hidden from Man  of alchemy and astrology, of the will of the gods, of the cyphers to ancient texts, and even of things that have not yet come to pass. Once my soul returns to my body, I see the world with new eyes!
EVTDESC_MNM_1626_FAILURE: The Divine Being gave me a cryptic reply to my question, and for many days since the ritual I have tried to make sense of it... Yet, no matter how much time I spend on it, I cannot. Whatever the Being intended for me to know is beyond my capacity to understand  I can only conclude I simply am not worthy of its knowledge...
EVTDESC_MNM_1626_ALCH_BONUS: The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the pursuit of alchemy in its many forms, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!
EVTDESC_MNM_1626_ASTR_BONUS: The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the pursuit of astrology in its many forms, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!
EVTDESC_MNM_1626_MIND_BONUS: The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the pursuit of Theurgy in its many forms, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!
EVTDESC_MNM_1626_TRUTH_BONUS: The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the decryption of hidden secrets throughout the world, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1626: The Divine Being has my total confidence!
hermetics_write_magnum_opus_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own portrait in order to write an enciphered book of your knowledge. This is an artifact with potentially powerful bonuses, which only characters with high learning can decipher.
hermetics_write_theory_paper_desc: Do research and write a theorem paper on a topic, before sending it out for peer review. Should it become accepted by at least 3 out of 5 peers, you will gain a reward.
write_theory_paper_decision_cooldown_tim: Has NOT recently written a theorem paper\n
EVTDESC_MNM_1630: I face the daunting task of researching and writing an entire theorem paper, to be reviewed by my peers... To have it be accepted by the Order would be a great boon to me, but if the quality is found to be lacking it might be a big blow to my prestige.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1630: I will make a decent effort.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1630_TT: The risks and rewards may be what they are, you have neither the time nor the resources to make an extraordinaire effort, and will rely on your intelligence rather than on hard work.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1630: I will ask help from those around me.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1630_TT: With the help from some other bright minds you might well stand a better chance at success!
EVTOPTC_MNM_1630: Surely nobody would notice if I copied from some other works?
EVTOPTC_MNM_1630_TT: The findings of other, brighter minds than yourself might well help the quality of your own paper.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1630: I will make an extraordinary effort! No expense shall be spared.
EVTOPTD_MNM_1630_TT: You will spend extra time and resources on writing the theorem paper, even if this comes to the detriment of managing your realm. Surely this will produce a paper of high quality!
theory_paper_heavy_investment_desc: This character is focusing on writing a theorem paper, and is therefore unable to spend enough time actually governing.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_RITUALS: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on theurgic rituals! It explores potentially new and rewarding ways of summoning divine beings, which might provide a new approach to Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_ASCENSION: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on ascension! It explores the concept of ascension, and new ways by which this state might be achieved, which in turn might provide a new approach to Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_MIND_OF_GOD: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]! It explores the Divine Truth that permeates this world, and might provide a new insight into Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_TRANSLATING_HIEROGLYPH: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on hieroglyphic translation! It explores the hidden meaning in these ancient texts, which might in turn provide a new insight into Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_DISTILLATION: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on distillation! It explores new methods of the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of exciting new alchemical elixirs. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_FERMENTATION: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on fermentation! It explores new approaches to the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of exciting new alchemical elixirs. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_ELIXIR_OF_LIFE: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the mysterious Elixir of Life! It explores the concept, both as a source for life eternal as well as a cure for all diseases, and it delves into potential methods of creating it. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_PILOSOPHERS_STONE: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Philosopher's Stone! It explores the object, and its powers of transmuting cheap metal into gold, as well as how to create it. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_PLANETS: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the planets! It explores astrology, in particular the movement of the planets, and what this could be interpreted as. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_STARS: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the stars! It explores astrology, in particular the constellations, and what truths they contain. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_MOON: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Moon! It explores astrology, and in particular the movement and importance of this heavenly body. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1640_SUN: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Sun! It explores astrology, and in particular the movement and importance of this heavenly body. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1640: I will send it out, at once!
EVTTOOLTIPA_MNM_1640: You send out the paper and await your peers' replies. Hopefully they will be objective when they evaluate it...
EVTOPTB_MNM_1640: No... It's not good enough to be published.
EVTTOOLTIPB_MNM_1640: You destroy the paper. This failure shall never see the light of day!
String_simplistic: it is rather simplistic and not terribly impressive.
String_average: it was a solidly average effort, but nothing more.
String_excellent: it makes some very excellent and intriguing points!
String_revolutionary: it could well revolutionize our understanding on this topic!
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_RITUALS: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on theurgic rituals, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_ASCENSION: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the pursuit of ascension, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_MIND_OF_GOD: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the Mind of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName], and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_TRANSLATING_HIEROGLYPH: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the translation of hieroglyphs, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_DISTILLATION: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on distillation, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_FERMENTATION: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on fermentation, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_ELIXIR_OF_LIFE: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the Elixir of Life, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_PILOSOPHERS_STONE: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the Philosopher's Stone, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_PLANETS: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the importance of the planets, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_STARS: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the meaning hidden in the stars, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_MOON: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the astrological importance of the Moon, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTDESCA_MNM_1641_SUN: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the astrological importance of the Sun, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
EVTTOOLTIPA_MNM_1641: Send word to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! that you endorse [From.GetHerHis] paper.
EVTOPTB_MNM_1641: No, it shall not have my endorsement.
EVTTOOLTIPB_MNM_1641: Send word to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! that you refute [From.GetHerHis] paper.
EVTOPTC_MNM_1641: This paper has been blatantly plagiarized!
EVTTOOLTIPC_MNM_1641: You spread the word of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s plagiarism throughout the Order, shaming [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetSheHeCap] will not be pleased!
EVTDESC_MNM_1642:
Esteemed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Having spent ample time considering your paper's worth, I have decided to endorse your work before the Order. I hope that it shall speedily be added to our library. Well done!

Respectful greetings,
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_MNM_1643:
Esteemed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Having spent ample time considering your paper's worth, I have decided NOT to endorse your work before the Order. In my view, the quality of the work was unfortunately not in keeping with the standards of our library.

Respectful greetings,
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESCA_MNM_1644: Success! Enough peers have endorsed my paper, and so the Order has accepted it into its library. As a result, my standing with the Order has increased measurably.
EVTDESCB_MNM_1644: Failure... The majority of the peers refuted my paper, and so it shall not be added to the Order's library. This is a humiliating blow, and it will take some time to recover my previous standing with the Order.
published_theorem_desc: This character has successfully published a theorem paper.
EVTDESCA_MNM_1645: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s paper that I endorsed recently has now been approved for publishing.
EVTDESCB_MNM_1645: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s paper that I endorsed recently has unfortunately not been approved for publishing...
EVTOPTB_MNM_1645: How did the others not recognize [From.GetHerHis] brilliance?
EVTDESC_MNM_1646: Drat! That nosy [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has somehow discovered that I borrowed elements from other authors... [From.GetSheHeCap] has already spread the word, slandering me before the Order and ensuring my paper will never be accepted.
TOOLTIP_MNM_1641: receives a copy of your theorem paper.
endorsed_theorem_desc: This character endorsed a theorem paper that was later published.
cursed_diamond_desc: A beautiful and glorious diamond of legendary proportions, its owner seems to be continuously plagued by a ceaseless series of unfortunate events.
cursed_diamond_crown_desc: A beautiful crown encrusted with a huge and glorious diamond. Its owner seems to be continuously plagued by a ceaseless series of unfortunate events.
EVTDESC_MNM_1750: Many years of my life have been spent dedicated to [This.Society.GetName]  performing missions and tasks in the interests of the Order and its [Root.GetSocietyRank]. Today all that effort has been rewarded, as I have become the new [Root.GetSocietyRank]. My fellows now look to me for leadership and guidance!
EVTOPTA_MNM_1750: And leadership and guidance I shall provide...
NO_HIGHER_QUALITY_VERSION_ACTIVE: Does NOT have an active higher quality Magnum Opus on the same topic.\n
silver_staff_desc: This silver staff is covered in the most intricate engravings.
derafsh_kaviani_desc: The gem-encrusted and richly-decorated leather banner of Persia. Legend has that it was made from the spear and apron of the heroic blacksmith Kaveh.
mountain_of_light_diamond_desc: This diamond, of unseen proportions, has an origin shrouded in mystery. It has been part of many royal treasuries, and it is claimed to be the cause of both the rise and sudden fall of entire dynasties.
elaborate_danda_desc: The Danda is the scepter by which Krishna steers his herd of cows  it is the handle of the Chatri, or royal umbrella, and it is the foremost symbol of kingship. This particular Danda is unusually ancient and elaborate.
emerald_tablet_desc: Said to have been written by Hermes Trismegistus himself, the Emerald Tablet supposedly holds the secret to the prima materia and its transmutation. Succeeding in deciphering its divine glyphs brings one a step closer to enlightenment and life eternal.
EVTDESC_MNM_9902_A: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered an interesting relic that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there!
EVTDESC_MNM_9902_B: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered a strange item that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of some value to the [original_item_owner.GetManWoman].
EVTDESC_MNM_9906_A: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered a relic of great importance that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there!
EVTDESC_MNM_9906_B: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered an imitation relic that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there! As an obvious and shoddy forgery, I promptly had it destroyed.
EVTDESC_MNM_9906_C: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered a venerated object of some sort that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of great importance to the defenders.
EVTDESC_MNM_9906_D: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered and destroyed a venerated object of some sort that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of great importance to the defenders.
EVTDESC_MNM_9910_A: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered an artifact of enormous importance that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there!
EVTDESC_MNM_9910_B: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away an imitation of one of my artifacts there! As an obvious and shoddy forgery, I promptly had it destroyed.
EVTDESC_MNM_9910_C: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered a holy relic of some sort that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of enormous importance to the defenders, for scores of them died defending it...
EVTDESC_MNM_9910_D: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered and destroyed a holy relic of some sort that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of enormous importance to the defenders, for scores of them died defending it...
MNM.70031.d: I have discovered proof that [suspected_society_member.GetBestName] is a member of [suspected_society_member.Society.GetName]. [Root.Liege.GetName] must be told right away!
DW_text1_desc: This character is known to worship evil forces.
DW_text3: [Root.Liege.GetName] has ordered [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] [Root.Liege.GetMyLordSpiritualName], [Root.Liege.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], to hunt down the secret societies in [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] realm.
Assassin_text1_desc: This character is known to be a member of the Assassins.
under_suspicion_desc: This character is suspected to be part of a secret society.
highly_suspect_desc: This character is almost certainly a member of a secret society!
MNM.6662.d: It could be that I am using the powers of [Root.Society.GetName] too freely, people are becoming suspicious.
evoke_sympathy_of_tt: Has the quest §YEvoke the Sympathy of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3930: One of my [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] fellows, [society_character.GetTitledFirstName], has expressed worry that the stress of keeping my true faith hidden is getting to me. [society_character.GetSheHeCap] is suggesting that an incognito evening at a local tavern would do me good, away from the prying eyes of the court.
EVTDESC_MNM_3932: [society_character.GetSocietyRank] [society_character.GetFirstName] was entirely right that I needed to get away from court, but there is no denying that we got carried away at the tavern. When our [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] leanings became a bit too clear, a local rough suddenly rose from his seat and staggered with raised fists towards [society_character.GetFirstName]. "You'll pay for your heretical words!"
EVTDESC_MNM_9112: The smith I hired has unfortunately died before finishing my order. It won't be easy to find another smith of similar skill... Luckily it seems not all the money I paid had yet been spent, and so I was able to recover a sizeable portion of my investment.
EVTOPTA_MNM_9112: But the amount I lost is also sizeable.
EVTOPTB_MNM_9112: At least it was not a total loss.
EVTOPTC_MNM_9112: Thankfully I didn't lose too much.
must_have_grandmaster_tooltip: Must not be the leader of §Y[Root.Society.GetNameCap]§!\n
must_have_multiple_rank_4: §Y[Root.Society.GetNameCap]§! must allow multiple characters to hold the next rank\n
DW_demonic_impregnation_power_desc: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portrait of a female follower of [Root.GetDWDevil], in order to summon a [Root.GetDWDemon] who can father an unholy child. This can be used on yourself, or on others if they are a mission target.
assassins_drug_effect_power_desc: Enables the decision to take hashish from §YThe Assassins§! in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!, in order to receive helpful visions. This may negatively impact your health.
EVTOPTA_WOL_10116: [steward.GetBestName] is only acting in accordance to [steward.GetHerHis] religion.
recruit_delay_timer_tooltip: Has waited three months since previous recruitment\n
hermetics_write_theory_paper_power_desc: Enables the decision to write a theorem paper and have it be reviewed by fellow members of the Hermetics. If it is accepted, you gain §Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!.\n
EVTDESC39703A: Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. This has given me an opportunity to create a Fraticelli Papacy, which shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.
EVTDESC39703B: Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has therefore seen fit to create a Fraticelly Papacy, claiming it shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.
EVTDESC39704A: As the great city of Constantinople is in Iconoclast hands, I have taken this chance to create the Iconoclast Patriarchate so that it may do away with the heretical idolatry the Ecumenical Patriarchate has long been guilty of. The new Iconoclast Patriarch shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Ecumenical predecessors.
EVTDESC39704B: As the great city of Constantinople is in Iconoclast hands, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has taken this chance to create the Iconoclast Patriarchate, claiming it shall do away with the heretical idolatry the Ecumenical Patriarchate has long been guilty of. The new Iconoclast Patriarch shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Ecumenical predecessors.
EVTDESC39705A: I have granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Fraticelli Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.
EVTDESC39705B: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Fraticelli Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.
EVTDESC39706A: The Hagia Sofia, for centuries the center of Orthodox Christendom, is now back in Orthodox hands. I have granted the cathedral back to its rightful ruler, so that the Ecumenical Patriarch may once again lead the Patriarchate from accommodations befitting his stature. The Ecumenical Patriarch shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his predecessors.
EVTDESC39706B: The Hagia Sofia, for centuries the center of Orthodox Christendom, is now back in Orthodox hands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted the cathedral back to its rightful ruler, so that the Ecumenical Patriarch may once again lead the Patriarchate from accommodations befitting his stature. The Ecumenical Patriarch shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his predecessors.
ingredient_herb1_desc: Hibiscus is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
devout_leader_desc: This character has valiantly led a following of faithful through hardship and oppression.
prepare_grounds_allow_tooltip: NOT currently developing a community in this province
EVTDESC_MNM_3950: In order to make sure that the oppression of [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] followers comes to an end, I have decided to take action. I will focus my efforts on organizing my fellow believers, so that we in time, when we are too many to be ignored, can express our faith without any fear of repercussions!
EVTOPTA_MNM_3950: When the time is right we will proclaim our faith!
EVTDESC_MNM_3951: Even though I am now publicly proclaiming the greatness of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I will still hold my [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] ideals in my heart.
EVTDESC_MNM_10024: [From.GetName] has fallen out of favor and no longer has any members. I have therefore decided to become the new founder and leader of this Society.
EVTOPTB_MNM_10024: No, this is not what I had in mind.
acquire_ingredients_effect_tooltip: You call upon your apprentice to accompany you in a venture to gather ingredients with alchemical properties.\n
BUILDING_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION: Has a building under construction in $HOLDING|Y$
NOT_SPECIFIC_BUILDING_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION: Does not have $BUILDING|Y$ under construction in $HOLDING|Y$
EVTDESC_MNM_3413: The spies I ordered to watch over [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] have brought me some disappointing news. As far as they have been able to determine, [secret_religion_inductee.GetFirstName] has not read the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I left [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHim]. They suspect [secret_religion_inductee.GetSheHe] has gotten rid of the holy text.
EVTDESC_MNM_6001:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I have decided to grant your request for a loan. I trust that you pay the sum back within a reasonable time and as soon as you are able.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_MNM_1441_steal_text: You steal a great hermetic text. It will be added to your treasury.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_1441_steal_ingredient: You steal a hermetic ingredient. It will be added to your treasury.\n
assassins_scare_ruler_desc: While carrying out [From.GetHerHis] tasks for the Assassins, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has become proficient in the skills of blackmail and intimidation. [From.GetSheHeCap] can attempt to use [From.GetHerHis] experience to scare §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! in order to get a favor on [From.GetHerHim].
EVTDESC_MNM_6980: When I met [From.GetTitledFirstName] the other day, I inquired about [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetMatterOfImportance]. [From.GetSheHeCap] certainly seemed to notice my veiled threat, but [From.GetHerHis] reaction was not what I expected. [From.GetFirstName] laughed right into my face!
EVTDESC_MNM_6950: My target, the despicable [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], has died at my hands. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] got the end that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] deserved. The Grand Master will be pleased.
EVTOPTA_MNM_4405_tt_success: dealing with vice by practicing it moderately without getting noticed.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_4405_tt_fail: attempting to practice the vice moderately, but it is not quite enough to restore focus.
openly_adopt_faith_trigger_tooltip: There are others in the realm sympathetic to the struggles of [Root.Society.GetName]
openly_adopt_faith_effect_tooltip: All sympathizers of the true faith will be encouraged to openly express their beliefs\nAfter this [Root.Society.GetName] will be no more, and you will no longer be able to recruit secret sympathizers
EVTOPTA_MNM_1837_TT: You will keep studying the stars, increasing your chances of successfully finishing your mission.\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_1837_TT: You are satisfied with your progress and will conclude your research, letting your mission come to an end.\n
EVTDESC_MNM_3811: At long last, we reap the rewards of our hard work. Any fellow [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] willing shall join me in this victory, as I find peace and prosperity in revealing the struggle which has been going on in our lands.
EVTOPTA_MNM_3811_TT: All your fellow followers of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], within your realm, will convert to your true religion, while others will be offered the choice to follow suit!\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3202_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: §Ysignificantly increasing§! the progress of your mission, by you remembering the perfect line\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3202_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: §Ydecreasing§! the progress of your mission, by you failing to remember a good line\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3202_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: §Yincreasing§! the progress of your mission, by you successfully intimidating §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]§!\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3202_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: §Ysignificantly decreasing§! the progress of your mission, by you failing to intimidate §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]§!\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_3202_TOOLTIP: You slip a pouch of money into [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] hand, not affecting the progress of your mission.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3204_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: You §Ysignificantly increase§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! is humbled and impressed by your words.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3205_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: You §Ydecrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! is unimpressed by you.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_3206_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: You §Yincrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! will stop spreading rumors.\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_3207_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: You §Ysignificantly decrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! refuses to be intimidated.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3209_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: §Ysignificantly increasing§! the progress of your mission\n
EVTOPTB_MNM_3209_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: §Ysignificantly decreasing§! the progress of your mission\n
EVTOPTC_MNM_3209_TOOLTIP: You distract §Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]§! by changing the subject completely, not affecting the progress of your mission.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3211_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: You §Ysignificantly increase§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledName]§! is moved by your words.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3212_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: You §Ydecrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledName]§! is unsettled by your words.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3213_TOOLTIP_SUCCESS: You §Yincrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledName]§! is calmed by your words.\n
EVTOPTA_MNM_3214_TOOLTIP_FAILURE: You §Ysignificantly decrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! is unsettled by your behavior.\n
EVTOPTA_3221_TOOLTIP: You §Yincrease§! the progress of your mission.\n
EVTOPTA_3222_TOOLTIP: You §Ydecrease§! the progress of your mission.\n
EVTOPTA_3223_TOOLTIP: You §Ysignificantly increase§! the progress of your mission.\n
EVTOPTA_3224_TOOLTIP: You §Ysignificantly decrease§! the progress of your mission.\n
known_secret_society_member: Known Member of a Secret Society
known_secret_society_member_desc: This character is known to associate with criminal secret societies.
council_power_increased: The power of the Council increases!
faction_powerful_vassal_takeover_desc: Members seek to remove §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§! from power and significantly increase the Council's power. Once this faction is sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
EVTDESC8221:
Rather than letting civil war tear the realm apart, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to give up [From.GetHerHis] title for the good of the realm. We have chosen [new_title_holder.GetFullName] as our new ruler. Your valuable support in this matter will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC8222: Under pressure from a powerful Faction, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! has agreed to abdicate the throne. Hail the new ruler, §Y[new_title_holder.GetFullName]§!!
obedience_tooltip: Lower ranking members are very likely to agree to your diplomatic requests.
EVTOPTA_MNM_1446: So, what is my share of the spoils?
EVTOPTA_MNM_1467: I am glad we are of one mind, honored colleagues.
LEAVE_SOCIETY_DESC: Are you sure you wish to leave your Society? Your rank and power within the Society will be forfeit, even if you rejoin, and any society-related event chains or missions will end. You will also be unable to join another society for a period of $COOLDOWN|Y$ days.
PEACE_ENFORCE_NOT_ON_COOLDOWN_NO_DATE: §YRealm Peace§! has not been used in the last §Y$YEARS$ years§!.
quest_secret_religious_societies_sympath: Evoke the Sympathy of a Ruler
EQUIP_DESC: Some artifacts need to be equipped in order to provide their bonuses.
CANT_EQUIP_NO_ROOM: §RCan't Equip: No more room in the $SLOT|Y$§R slot!§!
on_indian_pilgrimage_desc: The character is currently away on a great pilgrimage.
